column3: Alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ Kristo lótsulá wú há anɩ ámʋ ɩlasúná anɩ alɩá ɔdwɛ gyí. Mʋ́ sʋ ilehián ánɩ́ anɩ ɛ́ abówu há anɩ aba alɩ kɛ́n.
Asa béfi Israelfɔsʋ Katsʋn Nkɛ ámʋ gyí asɩ á, Yesu lɛ́bɩ ánɩ́ mʋ brɛ́ lafʋn ánɩ́ mɛ́dalɩ ɔyɩ́ ánfɩtɔ yɔ́ mʋ Sɩ wá. Ɔlɔdwɛ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋgyi mʋ klɛ ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ nfɩ ámʋ alɩɩ yɔ́fʋn mʋ owukɛ́.
Amɛndɩ Bulu lénya ɔblɔ́ wá nfí adʋana (40) kɛ́kɛ́? Megyí amʋ́ kɛ́n lɔ́bwɛ lakpan, bowu sin dimbísʋ́ ɩnʋ nɩ́?
Mlɩbu Bulu fɛ́ alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ nyebí bʋtobú amʋ́ akwɩɩ́pʋ́ amʋ. Mlɩmáha tsiátɔ́ laláhɛ amʋ́ʋ́ iletsiá mlɩtɔ brɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ mlɩméyín tɔtɔ tsú Yesu ɩwɩ ámʋ igyi mlɩsʋ.
Tsúfɛ́ Bulu lótsu mʋ́ ánɩ́ ahá fɛ́ɛ́ bʋbʋ asʋtɔ-ɔnlɩn, alɩá ɩbɔ́bwɛ obówun amʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ nwɛ sʋ.
Ɩnʋ nonu ɔmɛ kʋ lɛ́dalɩ tsu mbwɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋtsie nkpa ana ámʋtɔ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Ayó olónká kʋlɛ ntɛ́ɛ ɩmɔ olónká asa ɩbɔ́bwɛ ɛkɛwʋ́lɛ ɩkɔká.* Támɛ máyintá nfɔ mʋ́a wáɩn-nyí mʋ́.”
Mlɩba ɩwɩasɩ Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́, mɛ́nɩ obótsu mlɩ fʋ́á.

Bulu lalɛ́ ɛkɛ yáɩ́ ánɩ́ ɔbɔ́tsʋn ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ alalɛ́ yáɩ́ ámʋsʋ gyi ɔyɩ́tɔ́ ɔhagyíɔha asʋ́n ɔnɔkwalɩsʋ. Odeklé ɔbɛ́ɛ ahá bʋbɩ́ɩ ánɩ́ ɔnɔkwalɩ igyi. Mʋ́ sʋ́ ɔlɔkʋsʋ́a ɔhá ámʋ tsú afúlitɔ nɩ́.”
Ɩsá akɔpʋ́ ámʋ bɔlʋ obungyo-awu, bwɛ́ mʋ́ owíepa bun mʋ nwun, bɔwa mʋ ligá pɛpɛ kʋ.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ ndekléá asʋrapʋ amʋ́ʋ́ bʋmɔkʋ́dan amʋ bʋwúna tsia akúlu kwɩɩ abí, abʋkɩ amʋ́ wóyísʋ́, mɛ́nɩ bʋmɛ́ɛha anɩ alupʋ́‡ ɔkpa abʋblɩ anɩ ɩwɩ asʋn laláhɛ kʋkʋ.
Nɩ́ ndɛ mlɩ bláa mbɛ́ɛ, mbʋ mɩ́ Sɩ́ ámʋtɔ, mʋ ɛ́ ɔbʋ mɩtɔ á, mlɩhɔ mɩ gyi. Nɩ́ mlɩmɔ́ɔhɔ asʋ́n ámʋsʋ gyi óó á, ofúla amʋ́ʋ́ ndɛbwɛ ámʋ sʋ mlɩhɔ mɩ gyi.
Ɩnʋ bɔtswɩ lowu mʋa afúlitɔ fɛ́ɛ́ wá ogyá ánɩ́ ɩtamaduntɔ. Ɩ́nɩ gyí lowu nyɔɔsɩ nɩ.

Nɩ́ alɩ ígyi á, tɛkɩ ilehián ánɩ́ Kristo obétsiá wun ɩwɩɔsɩn wú tsé dú tsé lafa, tsú brɛ́á ɔyɩ́ lefi asɩ ɔpá. Mboún alalɛ́ ɩwɩ ɔwan ɔyɩ́ ɔnɔ́mɔbɩ́ ánfɩ, pʋ́ mʋ ɩwɩ bɔbɔ afɔdɩɛ ɔtsáwʋlɛ pɛ́ pʋ́lɛ́ ahá tsú amʋ́ lakpantɔ.
Olenya klʋn kpá amʋ́ nfí adʋana (40) kɛ́kɛ́ dimbí ámʋsʋ.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ mɩ́ apíó, nɩ́ mleyéfia ɔpʋ́nʋ́ ámʋ asɩ á, mlɩtsia gyo aba.
Brɛ́á ndɛkɩ́ɩ a, Okúfabi amʋ lɛ́maɩ́n atɔ́ siesɩá bɔpʋtan ɔwʋlʋ́ ámʋ ɔnɔ́. Ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ lɛkpɩnkɩ́ kʋ́klʋ́kʋ́ʋ́, owí lebi tuun fɛ́ tati bibi, ɔtsra ɛ́ lɛpɛ kɔɔ fɛ́ obugya.

Bulu létsinkí atsɩ akʋ afúli há amʋ́. Ahá bɛpɩtɩ́ amʋ́ akʋ atɔ́ alɩɩ mɔ́ amʋ́. Mʋ́ óó á, bʋmotsulá kíná Bulu. Ɩlɔwa amʋ́ ɔdwɛá bɔ́mɔ amʋ́ dʋn ánɩ́ béyinkí Bulu ɔma, mɛ́nɩ Bulu ɔbɔ́kʋsʋ́a amʋ́, bénya nkpa ánɩ́ ɩbʋ alɛ́ dʋn.

Támɛ Paulo lɛ́bláa ahá akɩtápʋ́ amʋ akʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Bʋmegyi anɩ asʋ́n, támɛ banwɛ́n anɩ atɔ́ ɔbʋntɔ. Romafɔ anɩgyí, támɛ bawá anɩ obu. Ntogyi sʋ bʋdekléá bési anɩ ŋáintɔ? Ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ! Asʋ́n agyípʋ́ amʋ onutó bʋbá bɛlɛ anɩ.”

Mose Mbla ámʋ lɛ́blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mátɔ mbʋa.” “Mámɔ ɔha.” “Máwi atɔ́.” “Mápɛ ansɩ́ fʋ́ ba atɔ́sʋ́.” Ɩ́nɩ pʋ́ mbla tráhɛ amʋ fɛ́ɛ́ nwun gyí mbla kʋlɛ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩlɛblɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Dwɛ fʋ́ bá fɛ́ fʋ́ ɩwɩ” ámʋ.
Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔdɩn ansɩ́ ánɩ́ mɛ́lɩan mʋ tɛhá mʋ ɩwɩ tɛtɩn, fɛ́ alɩá mʋ ɩwɩ lɛtɩn.
Tsúfɛ́ nhɩ́ɛ́ ndekléá négyi Bulu mbla ámʋsʋ tsú mɩ́ klʋntɔ.
Mlɩhɩɛ nya ansigyí anɩ Wíe sʋ brégyíbrɛ́! Ntráa ndɛ mlɩ bláa mbɛ́ɛ, mlɩhɩ́ɛ nya ansigyí!
Brɛ́á nɛdamlí mbɛ́ɛ ankɩ ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔdɛ mɩ́ asʋ́n bláa a, nowun sika pɛpɛ ɔkandɩ́ɛ-oyíá ɩbʋ abámbi asienɔ́.
Amɛndɩ Bulu lɛ́ka ntam há ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Nɩ́ bówie mɩ́ ɔkpʋ́nʋ́ ɔdakpá ɩnʋ fíín! Nɛká nɔtʋ́n?” Megyí ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ bɔkʋsʋ́ lɩ́ɩ́ mʋsʋ ámʋ?
Awikplu pʋ́ ogyo atswapʋ́ ahá ánɩ́ begyankpá ba fɛ́ɛ́ bʋgyi. Akúfa amʋ bʋmɛbɩ amʋ́ ɔmɛ.
Nkpábi, mlɩnya mlɩ awíe ifú, amlɩpʋ obú ha amʋ́. Megyí amʋ́á bolwií, bʋbʋ awɩtɔlɛ há mlɩ nkʋlɛ. Mlɩbu amʋ́á bʋbʋ owuntɔlɩn mlɩsʋ ɛ́.
Bɛlahá akʋ bɔwa afunu dɩ́nká mʋsʋ bɛɛ, “Oyin ánfɩ tɔtɔ́ɩ́ wɔ Bulu ɔtswɛ́kpa wankɩ́hɛ́ pʋ́ Mose mbla ámʋ ekekegyíɛkɛ.
Nkpa pɔpwɛ anfɩ itsú Bulu wá. Mʋlɔ́tsʋn Kristosʋ bwɛ́ anɩ ánfɩ anɩgyí mʋ alupʋ́ ánfɩ mʋ anyawíe. Alapʋ́ agyʋ́má ánfɩ wá anɩ ɩbɩtɔ, ɔbɛ́ɛ alɛ́ɛ aha bambá ɛ́ anyawíe ha mʋ.
Apíó, mlɩpʋ Bulu ɔnɔ́sʋ́ atɔɩ́pʋ́ amʋ́ʋ́ bɛblɩ́ Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ bwɛ mlɩ atosuánhɛ. Bowun asʋ́n tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ, támɛ benya klʋn.
Ɩbɛ́ba ánɩ́ ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ okpólí anɩ Wíe a, ɔbɛ́ha mʋ obénya nkpa.” ’ ”
blɩ́ bɛɛ, “Amen! Ɩkanfʋ́, numnyam, nyánsa, ɩpán, obú, túmi pʋ́ ɔwʋnlɩ́n ɩbwɛ́ɛ mʋ klɛ brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́! Amen!”
Mlɩ alɛ́ ɩmátsu mlɩ imi bwɛ, atati yílé dɩdá ntɛ́ɛ sika atɔ́á ɩbʋ ibíá watɔ.
Mʋ́ sʋ máha anɩ Wíe asʋ́n ámʋ blɩ́ ɩwa fʋ́ pɛ́lɩ. Máha mɩ́ obudɩ ɛ́ ɩwa fʋ́ pɛ́lɩ. Mboún wa klʋn Bulu túmitɔ, afʋtsula wun ɩwɩɔsɩn ánɩ́ ilehián asʋn wankláán ámʋ sʋ.
Amʋ́ sʋ nɔpʋ ɩwɩ há fʋ́, mɛ́nɩ amʋ́ ɛ́ bɔ́tsʋn ɔnɔkwalɩ amʋsʋ mlí fʋ́ klɛ́.
Mʋ́ sʋ tsinki, afʋwa fʋ́ atɔ tráhɛ amʋ ɔwʋnlɩ́n, tsúfɛ́ idekléá iwu. Nawun ánɩ́ fʋ́ bwɛhɛ́ lesian mɩ́ Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́.
Ɔbɔpʋ sáásɩ́ lɛ́tsɛɩ́ mʋ klɛ wá ntsu tsʋnhɛ pʋ́ abʋnkpabi fɛ́ɛ́tɔ́. Mʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ ilemlí obugya.

Hógyi sʋ ɔkpa lafínkí há anɩ ngya. Ɩ́nɩá anɩ Wíe Yesu sʋ́ Bulu awɩtɔlɛ anfɩ laba anɩsʋ, anɩlapʋ́ hogyi nyá ɔlɩɩ́kpá ngya a, ɩhɩ́ɛ́ bʋ anɩ ɔdwɛ. Tsúfɛ́ anɩdɩ́n ansɩ́ ánɩ́ abébenya mʋ numnyam amʋ kʋ.
Ɩwánkɩ mlɩ ánɩ́ mbʋa ɔtɔpʋ́, ɔhakpan ntɛ́ɛ ɔnsɩ́pɛ ɔwapʋ́ ɔkʋkʋ méenya ogyíkpá Kristo mʋa Bulu iwíegyí ámʋtɔ. (Tsúfɛ́ ɔnsɩ́pɛ ɔwapʋ́ gyí fɛ́ ɔkpɩ ɔtswɛ́pʋ).
Hógyi lɛ́ha Abraham lóbu Bulu brɛ́á Bulu lɛ́bláa mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, ɔdálɩ mʋ ɔmátɔ́, ɔyɔ ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ ánɩ́ mʋ Bulu lɛ́hɩɛ há mʋsʋ. Ɔlɛnatɩ́ dálɩ mʋ ɔmátɔ́, omeyín ɔtɩ́nɛ́á ɔyɔ́.
Mlɩmánu ntá bʋ́, tsúfɛ́ iteyíntá ɔha. Mboún mlɩha Ɔŋɛ́ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ ɔbʋla mlɩ brégyíbrɛ́.
Ahá tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ bóbuo amʋ́ tsiátɔ́ laláhɛ pʋ́ pɛ́lɩla anfɩ. Amʋ́ sʋ ahá bɔ́kpɔɩ́ ɔnɔkwalɩ ɔkpa ámʋ.
Kristo sʋ ɔkpa latíí há anɩ afʋnka anyɔ ámʋ fɛ́ɛ́. Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ ámʋ sʋ abɛ́talɩ́ ba anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́.

Anɩlawánlɩ́n ɔwʋlʋ́ sɩ́sɩ́ ahógyipʋá bʋmegyí Yudafɔ dodo. Anɩlɔ́wanlɩ́n anɩaa, anɩlablɩ́ ánɩ́ bʋmágyi atogyihɛá bapʋ́há ɩkpɩ. Bʋmágyi obugya pʋ́ ɔbwɩá bapʋ́sa mɔ. Bʋmáwa atsɩ mʋ́a ayin asʋ́n ɛ́.”
Mʋ́ʋ́ Petro lɛ́fɩtɛ́ mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Anania, ntogyi sʋ́ fahá Ɔbʋnsám lagyi fʋsʋ, fapʋ́ kɔ́ba amʋ́ʋ́ fenya ámʋ kʋ ŋáín, bɔ́wa afunu suná Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́?
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ anɩmɛ́ɛtrá bwɛ fɛ́ nyebíá ahá ánɩ́ amʋ́ ɔnɔ́ bʋ ɔdwɛ bɛ́talɩ́ pʋ́ amʋ́ atosunáhɛ́ pɔpwɛ kugyíkʋ bɛmlɛ́, fɛ́ alɩá ntsu tɛdá ɔklʋn ya ɔtɩ́nɛgyíɔtɩ́nɛ́á ideklé.
Ntɛ́ɛ mlɩméyín ánɩ́ aha laláhɛ bʋmóowie Bulu iwíegyí ámʋtɔ? Mlɩmámlɛ́ mlɩ ɩwɩ. Ahá ánɩ́ bʋtɔwá atsɩ mʋ́a ayin asʋ́n, ɩkpɩ atswɛ́pʋ, mbʋa atɔpʋ́, ayin ánɩ́ bʋtekle amʋ́ aba ayin,
Mlɩmáha asi anɩ ofíakpa yɔ, fɛ́ alɩá akʋ bʋdɛbwɛ. Mboún mlɩha atra wa aba ɔwʋnlɩ́n tsɩ́a. Tsúfɛ́ mlɩdéwúun ánɩ́ anɩ Wíe ɔbákɛ ámʋ ɩdɛkpʋkpɛ́ bá.

Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩmɔ tsiátɔ́ dada amʋ́ʋ́ ɩbʋ mlɩtɔ ámʋ. Mʋ́gyí; atsɩ mʋ́a ayin asʋ́nwa, ifintotsiá, ɔwɔ́lɩ laláhɛ mʋ́a pɛ́lɩla. Ɔyɩ́ ánfɩtɔ atɔ wankláán ɩmápɛ mlɩ ansɩ́, tsúfɛ́ ɔnsɩ́pɛ igyi fɛ́ ɔkpɩsúm.

Támɛ anɩ mʋ́ á, wankɩtɔ abí anɩgyí. Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩha agyi ɩwɩsʋ. Mlɩha Kristo hógyi pʋ́ anɩ abadwɛ ɩbwɛ kántɔ́-atíntɔ tin anɩ kántɔ́. Mʋ ɔkpakɩ́ɩ ánɩ́ ɔbɔ́hɔ anɩ nkpa ɩbwɛ́ɛ kʋtʋpa ánɩ́ ibun anɩ nwun.
Tsúfɛ́ Bulu mɛ́ha anɩ ɔŋɛ́á abɔ́pʋnyá ifú, mboún mʋ́á ɩtɛhá anɩ túmi, ɔdwɛ pʋ́ ɩwɩsʋgyí.
Nɩ́ ɔkʋ ɔblɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Nyin Bulu,” támɛ ɔtamagyi mʋ mblasʋ á, ofunupʋ ogyi. Ɔma ɔnɔkwalɩ.
Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩbwɛ kʋlɛ, amlɩtsula dwɛ aba tsu mlɩ klʋntɔ. Mlɩbwɛ agywɩɩn kʋlɛ, amlɩyɔ agyʋ́má wa abatɔ pʋha mɩ́ ansigyí ɩfʋn.
Ɩnʋ bekle abʋkɩta mʋ, támɛ bʋmɔpʋ ɩbɩ da mʋ, tsúfɛ́ mʋ brɛ́ mɔkʋ́fʋn.
Bla amʋ́ fɛɛ, bʋpʋ́ʋ amʋ́ kɔ́ba bwɛ yilé, amʋ́ yilébwɛ imoni. Bʋsánkɩ ɩbɩtɔ abʋkie atɔ́.
Bɛbláa mʋ bɛɛ, “Nɩ́ ɔhá ánfɩ mɔ́kʋ́bwɛ́ lakpan á, tɛkɩ anɩmɛ́kpa mʋ ba fʋ.”

Nɩ́ ɔkʋ ɔlɛ́ ɛkɛ ɔkʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ igyi ɛkɛ yílé á, ɔdɛ mʋ́sʋ́ gyí pʋtsú Bulu fʋ́á. Nɩ́ ɔkʋ ɛ́ tegyi tógyítɔ́ á, ɔdɛ mʋ́ gyí pʋtsú anɩ Wíe fʋ́á. Nɩ́ ɔkʋ ɛ́ tamagyi iye a, mʋ ɛ́ ɔdɛ mʋ́ kisí pʋ́tsú anɩ Wíe fʋ́á. Tsúfɛ́ amʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ bʋtɛdá Bulu ɩpán mʋ́sʋ́.
Mlɩ ɔkpakɩ́ɩ amʋ sʋ mlɩnya ansigyí, amlɩlɩɩ kínkín mlɩ ipiantɔ. Mlɩbɔ mpáɩ brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́tɔ́.
Ɔlɛbláa ɩsá akɔpʋ́ ɔhandɛ ámʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, ogyóo Paulo ɩwɩ wankláán, ɔha mʋ otsia iwilwiitɔ. Ɔhá mʋ aba ɔkpa abʋkɩ mʋsʋ.
Otenyá klʋn há tógyítɔ́, ɔtɔhɔ asʋ́nsʋ́ gyi. Mʋ ansɩ́ tɛdɩ́nká asʋ́nsʋ́, ototomi ɛ́.
Támɛ anɩbʋ mʋ́sʋ́ anɩdɛ́ Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ ɔkan da. Tsúfɛ́ anɩlɔ́hɔ mʋ gyi fɛ́ alɩá Israel ɩlʋ ɔwapʋ́ ámʋ lɔ́wanlɩ́n wá Bulu asʋ́n ámʋtɔ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Nɔhɔ Bulu gyi. Mʋ́lahá sʋ́ ndɛ mʋ́ ɔkan da nɩ́.”
Apíó, anɩdɛ́ mlɩ ɔlá da anɩaa, mlɩtɔɩ kpla awʋlɩyɔpʋ́. Mlɩwa afúpʋ́ atɛtɔ-ɔnlɩn. Mlɩbʋa amʋ́á bapɔn, amlɩnya klʋn ha ɔhagyíɔha.
Onuusɩ lɛ́tsɛɩ́ mʋ klɛ wʋ́lɩ́ ɔbwɩ ámʋ owíe obíásʋ́. Ɔbwɩ ámʋ iwíe ogyíkpá fɛ́ɛ́ iloklun. Ɩwɩɔsɩn sʋ mʋ abúopʋ amʋ bɔwɩ amʋ́ ɔdandʋ.
Iwilwii mʋ́a nwewúun ɩtʋ́ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋdɛ mbla ánfɩsʋ gyí amʋ, pʋ́ ahá ánɩ́ bʋhɩ́ɛ́ bʋgyi Bulu ahá!*
Bosuná mʋ anɩ Wíe ɔkpa ámʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ Yesu ɩwɩ ɔnɔkwalɩ amʋ blɩ́ tɛhɩ́ɛ́ wá mʋ ansigyí. Támɛ Asú Ɔbɔpʋ́ Yohane asúbɔ ámʋ pɛ́ oyin.
Mʋ́ sʋ nɩ́ fʋdegyí o, fʋdenúu o, bwɛ mʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ pʋwa Bulu numnyam.

Mlɩ mʋ́ á, Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ́ʋ́ Kristo lɔ́pʋwá mlɩtɔ ámʋ bʋ mlɩtɔ. Mʋ́ sʋ imehián ánɩ́ ɔhaa ɔbɛ́trá suná mlɩ atɔ́. Tsúfɛ́ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ tosúná mlɩ tógyítɔ́. Mʋ atosunáhɛ́ ɛ́ igyi ɔnɔkwalɩ onutó. Ɩ́nɩ sʋ mlɩkɩta tɔ́á olosuná mlɩtɔ, amlɩtsia Kristotɔ.
Alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔŋɛ́ ɩma ɔhatɔ ógyi itowuhɛ́ ámʋ a, alɩ nɩ́ yilébwɛ mɛmá hógyisʋ ɛ́ igyi hógyi wúhɛ́ nɩ.
Paulo lɔ́tɔɩ́ tá á, ɔlɛlɛ bodobodo ipín, dá Bulu ɩpán amʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ ansɩ́tɔ́, ɔlɛmaɩ́n kʋ wá gyí bɩ.
Mboún mlɩha awanlɩn ɔwʋlʋ́ bláa amʋ́ anɩaa, bʋmágyi atogyihɛá bapʋ́há ɩkpɩ, tsúfɛ́ mʋ́ ɩwɩ mɛtɩn. Bʋmáwa atsɩ mʋ́a ayin asʋ́n. Bʋmágyi ɔbwɩá bɔpʋsáa mʋ mɔ́ pʋ́ obugya.

Ɩnʋ Paulo lɛ́bláa mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Fʋ́ Bulu ɔbɛ́da. Fabwɛ́ ɩwɩ fɛ́ buntíiá bakpá mʋ́ afá futútú, fabetsiá asɩ fɛɛ fɔ́pʋ Mose Mbla gyi mɩ́ asʋ́n. Fʋdɛ ahá bláa fɛɛ bʋdá mɩ́ ansɩ́tɔ́. Fʋ́ mʋ́ megyí mbla ámʋ fatʋ́n a?”
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ séi á, Bulu mɛ́ɛtrá ha ahá ánɩ́ amʋ́a Kristo Yesunyɔ babwɛ́ kʋlɛ ɩpɔ́n.
Megyí alɩá Bulu obénya ɔblɔ́ wa anɩ, bɩ́tɩ́ anɩ ɩsʋ sʋ́ ɔlɛlɛ anɩ. Mboún alɩá ɔbɔ́tsʋn anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristosʋ hɔ anɩ nkpa sʋ.
Ɔbɛ́dalɩ yɛ́mlɛ́ ɔmá-ɔmá ánɩ́ bʋbʋ ɔyɩ́ afʋnka ana, igyi Gog mʋ́a Magog amʋ, mɛ́nɩ ɔbɛ́kpa ahá tsɔtsɔɔtsɔá bʋma ɩklátɔ buo ɩwɩ ya ɩsá.
Tɛkɩ brɛ́ ámʋ a, alɩ́ mlɩtɔ akʋ mlɩgyí nɩ́. Támɛ Bulu labie mlɩ ntsu, alabwɛ́ mlɩ mʋ ahá. Alatsʋn mʋ Ɔŋɛ́ ámʋ pʋ́ anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristosʋ tsú mlɩ ánɩ́ mlɩ asʋ́n da ɔkpa mʋ ansɩ́tɔ́.
Mʋ́ sʋ́ ndɛ ɩwɩɔsɩn ánfɩ odu wúun nɩ. Támɛ mmɛdɛ́ pɛ́lɩ nya, tsúfɛ́ nyin ɔhá ánɩ́ nahogyi. Nyin ánɩ́ ɔbɛ́talɩ́ gyo ɩtɔ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɔpʋwá mɩ́ ɩbɩtɔ ámʋ ɩwɩ alɩɩ yɔ́fʋn mʋ ɔbákɛ.
Mlɩha Bulu Ɔŋɛ́ ámʋ ɔkpa mlɩ, amlɩbɔ mpáɩ brégyíbrɛ́. Mlɩkʋlɩ Bulu, ɔtsa mlɩ ɔkpagyíɔkpasʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩdɩnka ansɩ́ ɩwɩsʋ. Mlɩmási mpáɩ bɔ há Bulu ahá fɛ́ɛ́.

Mɩ́ Paulo, mɩ́a Silwano pʋ́ Timoteo dɛ́ ɔwʋlʋ́ ánfɩ wanlɩ́n sɩ́sɩ́ ɔpasua ánɩ́ ígyi anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu mʋa anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo klɛ́, ɩbʋ Tesalonika wúlutɔ. Anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu mʋa anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo bʋgyíi mlɩ bʋalɛ, abʋha mlɩ iwilwii.
Mlɩha ɔhagyíɔha owun ánɩ́ mlɩlólwií. Anɩ Wíe ɩbábɩ lafʋn.
Tsúfɛ́ brégyíbrɛ́á mlɩdɛ́ bodobodo anfɩ gyí, nu ntá tsú ɛwɛ ánfɩtɔ á, mlɩdɛ́ anɩ Wíe lowu ámʋ ɔkan da kpɛ́fʋn brɛ́á obéyinkí bá.
Nɩ́ bokókóli anɩ Wíe hógyitɔ á, ɔbɛ́tsa mʋ ɩlɔ, ɔbɔ́kʋsʋ́. Nɩ́ alabwɛ́ lakpan kʋ á, Bulu obési mʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ kíé mʋ.
Nɛdá Bulu ɩpán. Mʋ ndɛpʋ klʋn ánɩ́ ɩmɛdɛ́ mɩ́ ɩpɔ́n ha súm, fɛ́ mɩ́ anáin. Timoteo, nɩ́ ndɛ mpáɩ bɔ ɔpa mʋ́a onyé á, ntɛkáɩ́n fʋ́sʋ́ brégyíbrɛ́.
Bɛbláa abʋ mʋ́a abʋtá ámʋ bɛɛ, “Mlɩkpa bun anɩsʋ, mɛ́nɩ owíe obíásʋ́ otsiápʋ́ amʋ omóowun anɩ, Okúfabi amʋ ɔmɛ́ɛbɩtɩ́ anɩ ɩsʋ!

“Ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔbʋ asʋ onúu asʋ́n ánɩ́ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ dɛ́ ɔpasua ámʋ bláa asɩ. “Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ olegyi ɩsʋ obégyi atogyihɛ amʋ́ʋ́ bɔpʋŋáín ámʋ kʋ. Nɛ́trá ha okugyíɔkʋ ibwi futútúá bɔwanlɩ́n ɩdá pɔpwɛ dɩ́nká mʋ́sʋ́. Mʋ nkʋlɛ ɔbɛ́bɩ dá ámʋ. Ɔhaa mɛ́ɛbɩ mʋ́ tsɩ́a mʋtɔ.”
Amʋ́ ɔnsɩ́pɛ sʋ bɛ́kpɛkpɛ́ɛ asʋ́n blɩ́ pʋ́swɩ́ɩ́ mlɩ kɔ́ba. Asʋ́n ogyípʋ́ Bulu lɛ́da ɩwɩsʋ ɔyɩ́ ɔpá ánɩ́ ɔbɛ́bɩtɩ́ amʋ́ ɩsʋ, hɩ́ amʋ́.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ Bulu ɔbɔ́pʋ afunu ɔŋɛ́á mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ bʋ ɔnlɩn wá amʋ́tɔ́, mɛ́nɩ bɔ́hɔ afunu asʋ́nsʋ́ gyi.
Bulu asʋn wanlɩ́nhɛ́ amʋ lɛ́blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mlɩ Yudafɔ bwɛhɛ́ sʋ ahá ánɩ́ bʋmegyí Yudafɔ bʋdɛ Bulu ɩwɩ asʋn laláhɛ blɩ́.”
Alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ Yane mʋa Yambre bɔkʋsʋ́ lɩ́ɩ́ anɩ náin Mosesʋ ámʋ a, alɩ́ ahá ánfɩ ɛ́ bakʋ́sʋ́ lɩ́ɩ́ ɔnɔkwalɩ asʋ́n ámʋsʋ nɩ́. Amʋ́ agywɩɩn lawú. Hógyitɔ ɛ́ á, bʋma ɔlɩɩ́kpá.
Ahá ánɩ́ ntɔdwɛ́ á, amʋ́ ntɔwá ɩyɩn wa, bɩ́tɩ́ amʋ́ ɩsʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ wa nsi, afʋdamli klʋntɔ.
Anɩ hógyi sʋ́ Bulu latsú mʋ́ ánɩ́ anɩ asʋ́n da ɔkpa. Mʋ́ sʋ anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo lalá anɩa Bulunyɔ nsɩnɛ́.
Tsia kɩ fʋ́ tsiátɔ́ pʋ́ atosunáhɛ́ amʋ. Tomi bwɛ mʋ́ alɩ, mɛ́nɩ fɔ́hɔ fʋ́a asʋ́n ámʋ anupʋ́ nkpa.

Netsiá yɔ́ Yudafɔ ofíakpa kugyíkʋtɔ, ntɛhá bʋtɛkɩ́tá amʋ́, bɩ́tɩ́ amʋ́ ɩsʋ, hɩ́ɛ́ amʋ́ bʋtɛblɩ́ Yesu ɩwɩ abususʋ. Amʋ́ ɩwɩ ɔblɔ́ sʋ ntɛdɩ́nká amʋ́sʋ́ yɔ́ ɔmá bámbásʋ́ yɛ́kɩ́tá amʋ́, bɩ́tɩ́ amʋ́ ɩsʋ.
Tsiátɔ́ dada bwɛhɛ́ tɛlɩn ɔwan. Mʋ́gyí; atsɩ mʋ́a ayin asʋ́nwa, agywɩɩn laláhɛ bwɛ, ifintotsiá,
Megyí odupʋ́ mʋ́a ntsu ɔwʋlɩ́pʋ́ lɔ́bwɛ tɔtɔ. Bulu nkʋlɛ tɔ́bwɛ, tsúfɛ́ mʋtɛ́há mʋ́ ɩtɛdan.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ ɔŋɛ́tɔ́ atokiehɛ́ kugyíkʋ mɛdɛ́ mlɩ hián séi ánfɩ mlɩhɩ́ɛ́ mlɩdɛ́ ɛkɛá anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo obótsu ɔsʋ́sʋ́ ba bɛlɛ ɩwɩ ɔwan ɔkpa kɩ́ɩ anfɩ.
Ɩnʋ nonu ɔmɛ kʋ tsú ɔsʋ́sʋ́ fɛ́ ntsu lábʋ́lá, ɩdɛkpa yi, ntɛ́ɛ ɔpráda dɛ́pʋtɩ́, ntɛ́ɛ fɛ́ nsankuo tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ bʋdɛda.
Bulu ɔnɔ́sʋ́ atɔɩ́pʋ́ amʋ fɛ́ɛ́ bɛblɩ́ bɛɛ lɛ́lɛ́, ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔlɔhɔ Kristo gyi a, Bulu obési mʋ lakpan fɛ́ɛ́ kíé mʋ Kristo dátɔ́.”
Akʋ bapʋ́ ansɩ́ dɩ́nká ánɩ́ bénya numnyam, ɩdayilé pʋ́ nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá. Mʋ́ sʋ banyá klʋn bʋdɛ yilé bwɛ ekekegyíɛkɛ. Amʋ́ Bulu ɔbɛ́ha nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá nɩ́.

Mɩ́ Yohane dɛ́ ɔwʋlʋ́ ánfɩ wanlɩ́n sɩ́sɩ́ Kristo ɔpasua asienɔ́á mlɩbʋ Asia ɔmátɔ́. Ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ oletsiá, ɔbʋ ɩnʋ, ɔbɛ́laba amʋ mʋa Ɔŋɛ́ asienɔ́ ánɩ́ bʋlɩɩ́ mʋ owíe obíá ansɩ́tɔ́ pʋ́ Yesu Kristo bʋgyíi mlɩ bʋalɛ, abʋha mlɩ iwilwii. Mʋgyí ɔdansɩyin ɔnɔkwalɩpʋ, ogyankpapʋá ɔlɔkʋsʋ́ tsú afúlitɔ, ɔyɩ́tɔ́ awíe fɛ́ɛ́sʋ́ ogyípʋ́. Mʋtɔdwɛ́ anɩ, ɔlɔpʋ mʋ obugya ká anɩ nwunsʋ ɩkɔ, sí anɩ lakpan kíé anɩ.
Paulo lɛ́bláa amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Yohane lɔ́bɔ ahá ánɩ́ badámlí klʋntɔ asú. Ɔlɛbláa amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ bʋhɔ́ɔ ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ obuo mʋ ɔbá ámʋsʋ gyi. Mʋgyí Yesu.”
Ɩ́nɩ fɛ́ɛ́ ilosuná ánɩ́ anɩ Wíe yin alɩá ɔbɛ́lɛ yilé abwɛpʋ́ tsú ɩsɔ́kɩtɔ, pʋ́ alɩá ɔbɛ́bɩtɩ́ lalahɛ abwɛpʋ́ ɩsʋ yɔ́fʋn ɛkɛá obégyi amʋ́ asʋ́n.
Támɛ ɔsʋ́sʋ́ ɔmá ánɩ́ ɩbʋ akɩ́lɛ dʋn mʋ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ bɛdalɩ mʋ́tɔ́ ámʋsʋ amʋ́ ansɩ́ dɩn. Mʋ́ sʋ ɩma Bulu pɛ́lɩ ánɩ́ bɛ́tɩ mʋ bɛɛ, amʋ́ Bulu. Tsúfɛ́ alalá wúlu kpɔnkpɔɔnkpɔntɩ kʋ yáɩ́ há amʋ́.
Máyaa asʋ nú atsɩ dɛhɛn ɔtɛ pʋ́ mʋ́á imotsú Bulu ɩwɩ. Mboún hɩɛ fʋ́ ɩwɩ, afʋsum Bulu wankláán.
Nowun ánɩ́ bɛnatɩ́ tsʋn ɔyɩ́tɔ́ fɛ́ɛ́, káfía Bulu ahá pʋ́ amʋ́ wúlu yiléá Bulu tekle, támɛ ogyá lɛkpa tsú ɔsʋ́sʋ́ bɛhɩ amʋ́ akɔpʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ plɩ́plɩ́plɩ́plɩ́.
Mʋ́ sʋ ɔlɛblɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, bʋbɔ́ amʋ́ asú Yesu Kristo dátɔ́. Mʋ́ ɔma a, bokokóli Petro bɛɛ, otsía amʋ́ wá kpalobí.
Fʋtɛkɩ fʋ́ ɩwɩ ansibi abwiepʋ́ ɔkpapʋ́, fʋ́gyi fɛ́ ɔkandɩ́ɛ há ahá ánɩ́ bʋmeyín Bulu, basin oklúntɔ.
Ɩ́nɩ gyí tɔ́á Kristo lɛ́hɩɛ ɔbɛ́ɛ mɛ́ha anɩ, igyi nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá ámʋ nɩ.
Támɛ ɔhá ánɩ́ mʋ nyánsa itsú ɔsʋ́sʋ́ á, gyankpapʋ, mʋ ɩwɩ lɛtɩn. Ololwií, ɔtɔdwɛ́ ahá, ɔtɛba ɩwɩasɩ. Otowun ahá nwɛ, ɔtɔbwɛ́ yilé. Ɔtamafútí fɩtátɔ kɩ, ɔtɔbwɛ́ atɔ́ tsú mʋ klʋntɔ.
Ɔsɩ́ ámʋ tɔdwɛ́ mʋ Bi ámʋ, alapʋ́ túmi fɛ́ɛ́ wá mʋ ɩbɩtɔ.
Ahá bʋkɩ bɛɛ, Bulu tesi tsiá tɔ́á alahɩ́ɛ́á ɔbɔ́bwɛsʋ. Megyí alɩ ígyi, mboún klʋn otenyá há mlɩ; mɛ́nɩ ɔhagyíɔha ɔbɛ́damlí klʋntɔ sí lakpan bwɛ, tsúfɛ́ omedékléá ɔhaa ɔbɔ́fwɩ.
Mɩ́ nkʋlɛ sʋ mʋ́ á, tɛkɩ mlétsiá kpankʋ fɛ́ mɩ́, támɛ ɔhagyíɔha bʋ mʋ́á Bulu lɔ́pʋkíé mʋ. Ɔmɔbwɛ anɩ fɛ́ɛ́ kɛ́kɛ́ɛ. Ɔhagyíɔha mʋa mʋ klɛ.
Mlɩdunka ɔdwɛ ɔkpa, amlɩdunka ɔŋɛ́tɔ́ atokiehɛ́ ɛ́. Mʋ́á ɩdʋn a, Bulu ɔnɔ́ asʋ́nblɩ́.
Tsúfɛ́ Bulu ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɛblɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Wankɩ ɩdálɩ tsu oklúntɔ!” ámʋ kɛ́n lahá mʋ wankɩ amʋ ɩdɛwankɩ́ anɩ klʋntɔ. Ɩlahá anɩlabɩ́ ánɩ́ mʋ numnyam amʋ ɩdɛwankɩ́ Yesu Kristo ansɩ́tɔ́.
Alɩ brɛ́ ámʋtɔ á, Yudayin ɔkʋá bʋtɛtɩ́ mʋ Apolo laba ɔbʋ Efeso wúlutɔ. Bɔkwɩɩ́ mʋ Aleksandria, wúlu ánɩ́ ɩbʋ Egyipte ɔmátɔ́. Oyin tɔɩ́, oyin Bulu asʋn wanlɩ́nhɛ́ amʋ ɛ́ wankláán.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ́ Yesu ɛ́ lówu mmuátse, mɛ́nɩ ɔbɔ́pʋ mʋ onutó obugya gyʋ́ra mʋ ahá, amʋ́ lakpan sʋ nɩ́.
Suna ɩ́nɩ aná, afʋtɔɩ kpla amʋ́ abʋgyi mʋ́sʋ́. Fʋbʋ ɔkpa wá ɩyɩn wá amʋ́, nɩ́ bʋmɛdɛ́bɩ bwɛ́. Máha ɔhaa ɔkɩ fʋ́ ansɩ́tɔ́ kótíkótí.
Alɩá Bulu lɛ́lɛ mʋ ɔdwɛ súná anɩ gyí, ɔlɔpʋ mʋ Bi ɔkʋkʋ́nʋ́ ɔkʋlɛ amʋ sɩ́sɩ́ ɔyɩ́tɔ́, mɛ́nɩ abɔ́tsʋn mʋsʋ nyá nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá.
“Mɩ́ Sɩ́! Ndeklé mbɛ́ɛ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ fɔpʋhá mɩ́ ámʋ bétsiá mɩ́ wá ɔtɩ́nɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ mbʋ amʋ. Fówun bówun numnyam amʋ́ʋ́ fɔwa mɩ́ ámʋ. Tsúfɛ́ fʋtɔdwɛ́ mɩ́ asa fɔbwɛ ɔyɩ́.
Ɔtɩ́nɛgyíɔtɩ́nɛ́á bʋna á, bʋdɛ ahá yintá, bʋdɛ ahá ipiantɔ wa.

Anɩbʋ igyí ɔhapʋ́ dɛhɛn kpɔnkpɔntɩ ánɩ́ aladá fá ɔsʋ́sʋ́ yɔ́ ɔbʋ Bulu wá. Mʋgyí mʋ Bi Yesu. Ɩ́nɩ sʋ mlɩha akɩta Yesu anfɩ́ anɩdɛ́ mʋ ɩwɩ adánsɩɛ gyí anfɩtɔ kínkíínkín. Anɩmádɩnkɩ́ ansɩ́ mʋsʋ.
Tsúfɛ́ anɩ ansɩ́tɔ́ anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu lɔ́pʋ obú mʋ́a numnyam kpɔnkpɔɔnkpɔntɩ há Yesu, brɛ́á Bulu Onumnyampʋ amʋ ɔmɛ lɛdalɩ tsu ɔsʋ́sʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Ɔ́nɩ gyí mɩ́ Bí ɔdwɛpʋ́á olegyi mɩ ansɩ́ nɩ́.”
Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ nkʋlɛ tɔ́bwɛ́ ɩ́nɩ fɛ́ɛ́, oteye atokiehɛ́ ánfɩ há ɔhagyíɔha alɩá odeklé.
Ɔbɔpʋ náásɩ́ lɔ́fʋlɩ́ mʋ klɛ. Ɩlɔwɔ owí mʋ́a ɔtsra pʋ́ ntsrakpabitɔ yée asatɔ iku kʋlɛ. Mʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ lodun. Ɩ́nɩ sʋ ɔyɩ kɛhɛ mʋ́a owi tahɛ́tɔ́ yée asatɔ iku kʋlɛ ɛ́ loklun.
Ahá ámʋ fɛ́ɛ́ bowunáa kɩ́tá Sostene ánɩ́ ogyi Yudafɔ ofíakpa ɩnʋ ɔhandɛ, dá mʋ ɩnʋ. Támɛ Galio mótsu kʋkʋ lɛ́ mʋ́tɔ́.
Bɛtrá bwɛ ánɩ́ bɛ́kɩtá mʋ, támɛ ɔlɛdalɩ amʋ́ ɩbɩ, nátɩ́ sí amʋ́.
Mʋ́ sʋ abatɔ tamawú anɩ. Ɩbʋ mʋ́tɔ́á anɩ ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ anfɩ idewu mʋ́, támɛ Bulu dɛ́ anɩ ɔkláa ɔwʋnlɩ́n wa ekekegyíɛkɛ.
Ɩnʋ Maria lɔ́pʋ ofobí fánfáánfán ánɩ́ ɩbʋ ibíá prɛntʋa yílé ɔbɔ bɛtsɛɩ́ wʋ́lɩ́ Yesu ayabisʋ, ɔlɔpʋ mʋ nwunsʋ-imi tsítsi mʋ́. Ofobí ámʋ ɔfan lɔhɔ wóyí ámʋtɔ fɛ́ɛ́.*

Hógyi lɛ́ha ɔlɔyɔ́bwɛ ɔfɔɔ́ ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ amʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lɛ́hɩɛ yáɩ́ há mʋ amʋsʋ. Tati-obuto oletsiá ɩnʋ. Alɩ kɛ́n Isak mʋa Yakob ánɩ́ Bulu lɛ́hɩɛ ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ amʋ yáɩ́ há ɛ́ betsiá tati-mbuto ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ amʋsʋ nɩ́.
Mɩ́ apíó, mlɩkasɩ mɩ́ tsiátɔ́. Mlɩkasɩ atɔ́ tsu ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ bakásɩ́ anɩ tsiátɔ́ ámʋ wá.
Mlɩtsu ɩkʋ lɛ mlɩ aba asʋ́ntɔ́. Nɩ́ mlɩdɛ́ mʋ́ bwɛ alɩ á, mlɩdɛ́ Kristo mbla ámʋsʋ gyí nɩ.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ séi á, mlɩbɩ ánɩ́ yilébwɛ tɛ́há Bulu totsú ɔha ánɩ́ mʋ asʋ́n da ɔkpa mʋ ansɩ́tɔ́, megyí mʋ hógyi pɛ́.
Séi á, nkálɩ abɛ́blɩ́? Abɛ́blɩ́ anɩaa, Bulu asʋ́n mɛda ɔkpa lóó? Ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ!
Mlɩhɔ mlɩ aba Akristofɔá bʋma ɔwʋnlɩ́n hógyitɔ wa mlɩtɔ. Nɩ́ bɛɛ tɔkʋ bʋ alɛ́ ntɛ́ɛ ɩma alɛ a, mlɩmágyi amʋ́ nwɛ́ɛn.
Ɩnʋ, ɩsá lɛda ɔsʋ́sʋ́. Bulu-ɔbɔpʋ dɛhɛn Mikael mʋa mʋ aba abɔpʋ bɔkɔ bʋ́tɩ́ ámʋ mʋa mʋ aba abɔpʋ.
Ɔblɔ́ ɩkɩ́tá mlɩ á, mlɩmáha mʋ́ ɩha amlɩbwɛ lakpan. Ɩmátsiá mlɩtɔ yɔ́fʋn owi tahɛ́.
Mlɩmápʋ lalahɛ ká lalahɛ ɩkɔ. Ntɛ́ɛ nɩ́ ahá besíá mlɩ á, mlɩmásia amʋ́ ká ɩkɔ. Mboún mlɩyula amʋ́, tsúfɛ́ Bulu lɛ́tɩ mlɩ ánɩ́ mlɩbóyulá ahá, mɛ́nɩ obóyulá mlɩ.
Ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɔwa mɩ́ sɩ́sɩ́ ámʋ buo mɩ. Ɔmɔkʋ́yínkí mɩ́ ɔma, tsúfɛ́ tɔ́á itegyi mʋ ansɩ́ ntɔbwɛ́ brégyíbrɛ́.”
Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩkʋsʋ, amlɩda ɩwɩsʋ. Ɔnɔkwalɩwa ɩbwɛ́ɛ ɔfɛ́á ɩklɩ mlɩ osíésʋ́. Yilébwɛ ɩbwɛ mlɩ kántɔ́-atíntɔ.

Ntsrakpabi asienɔ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ fowun mɩ́ gyɔpɩtɔ pʋ́ sika pɛpɛ ɔkandɩ́ɛ-oyí abámbi asienɔ́ ámʋ asɩ nɩ́. Ntsrakpabi asienɔ́ ámʋ igyi ɔpasua asienɔ́ ámʋ abɔpʋ. Ɔkandɩ́ɛ-oyí abámbi asienɔ́ ámʋ ɛ́ gyí ɔpasua asienɔ́ ámʋ.

Támɛ anɩlawun Yesu. Bulu lɛ́ba mʋ asɩ dʋn mʋ abɔpʋ brɛ́ itinbí kʋtɔ. Awɩtɔlɛ Bulu lɔ́wa bwɛ́ mʋ́ alɩ, tsúfɛ́ ɔlɛha Yesu lówu ɔhagyíɔha nwunsʋ. Anɩlabɩ́ ánɩ́ séi á, Bulu lapʋ́ numnyam pʋ́ obú dɩ́nká mʋsʋ, ɩwɩɔsɩn ámʋ́ʋ́ olowun, wú ámʋ sʋ.
Tsúfɛ́ Bulu onutó dɛ́ agyʋ́má yɔ mlɩtɔ. Alahá mlɩlatsúlá mlɩdɛ́ mʋ apɛ́ mʋ́a tɔ́á otekle bwɛ.
“Nabláa mlɩ asʋ́n ánfɩ fɛ́ɛ́, mɛ́nɩ ansigyí ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩbʋ mɩtɔ ámʋ bétsiá mlɩtɔ. Fówun ansɩ́ bégyi mlɩ wankláán.

Mɩ́ Paulo ánɩ́ anɩ Nkpa Ɔhɔ́pʋ Bulu mʋa Kristo Yesuá anɩ ansɩ́ dɩn mʋsʋ lɔ́bwɛ mɩ́ sumbí ɔyɔpʋ́, dɛ́ ɔwʋlʋ́ ánfɩ wanlɩ́n sɩ́sɩ́ fʋ́ Timoteo ánɩ́ fʋ́gyi mɩ́ bí onutó Yesu hógyi amʋtɔ. Anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu mʋa anɩ Wíe Kristo Yesu bʋgyíi fʋ bʋalɛ, abʋwun fʋ nwɛ ha fʋ́ iwilwii.
Atsɩ ámʋ ɛ́ bʋdɩ́da tati ɔkpa wankláánsʋ́. Amʋ́ atɔ dɩdáhɛ́ máwɔ ansíbi. Bʋmádʋn imi bwɛ, wá sika atɔ́, dɩ́dá atatiá ɩbʋ ibíá dʋbɩ.
Ɩnʋ ɔlɔbwɛ mplɩ, wíé amʋ́tɔ́, gyáa amʋ́a mbwɩ ámʋ fɛ́ɛ́ dálɩ. Olowutá kɔ́ba atsɛ́pʋ amʋ mpʋ́nʋ́ dá, dá amʋ́ kɔ́ba sáɩ́n.
Bulu lábwɛ́ anɩ alɩ ánfɩ anɩgyí. Alabwɛ́ anɩ aha pɔpwɛ tsʋn anɩa Kristo Yesunyɔ ɩkʋlɛbwɛsʋ, mɛ́nɩ abɔ́bwɛ yilé ánɩ́ mʋ onutó ɔlɛla yáɩ́ há anɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ abwɛ́ɛ.
Mɩ́ apíó adwɛpʋ́, mlɩmáha asʋn wunhɛ kpɔnkpɔɔnkpɔntɩ ánfɩ bʋdɛpʋsɔ mlɩ kɩ anfɩ ibwie mlɩ ɔnɔ́. Mlɩmákɩ mʋ́ ánɩ́ asʋn pɔpwɛ dɛ́ mlɩ tʋ.
Mlɩha anya ansigyí, ɩwɩ ɩsankɩ anɩ, awa mʋ numnyam! Tsúfɛ́ Okúfabi amʋ ɔká otsiákɛ lafʋn. Mʋ ka ámʋ lahɩ́hɩ́ɛ ɩwɩ tá.”
Mlɩpʋ Bulu nkpahɔ́ɔ amʋ bwɛ mlɩ kʋtʋpa. Mlɩkɩta Bulu asʋ́n ámʋtɔ, ɩbwɛ mlɩ ɩsátɔ́ ɔdayí ánɩ́ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ tɛhá mlɩ.
Ɩnʋ á, olowun ánɩ́ Egyipteyin dɛ́ mʋ apíó Israelfɔ ámʋtɔ ɔkʋ da. Mʋ́ sʋ ɔlɔyɔ ɔyɔ́hɔ mʋ pio ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩdɛ mʋ dʋ́ʋn amʋ, ilemlí mʋa Egyipteyin amʋ nyɔ. Ɩnʋ ɔlɛda Egyipteyin ámʋ mɔ́.
Támɛ apíó, mlɩ mʋ́ á, yilébwɛ ɩmáta mlɩ ɔŋɛ́.
Mlɩda ɩwɩsʋ, amlɩlɩɩ kínkíínkín mlɩ hógyitɔ. Mlɩwa klʋn, amlɩwa ɩwɩ ɔwʋnlɩ́n.
Mboún ɔkpɩ Molok tati-obu pʋ́ Refan ntsrakpabi ɔkpɩ mlɩlɔ́bwɛ sʋ́rá, nátɩ́ tswɛ. Ɩ́nɩ sʋ négya mlɩ yɔ́wa Babilonfɔ ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ ɔma ɔtɩnɛkʋ.’
Mʋ́ sʋ apíó, mlɩlɩɩ kínkíínkín, amlɩkɩta ɔnɔkwalɩ amʋ́ʋ́ anɩlósuná mlɩ ámʋtɔ, mʋ́á anɩlɛ́bláa mlɩ pʋ́ mʋ́á anɩlɔ́wanlɩ́n sɩ́sɩ́ mlɩ fɛ́ɛ́.
Bulu onutó lɛ́la anɩ yáɩ́ há mʋ́, ɔlɔpʋ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ wá anɩtɔ. Mʋ́gyí ibwiá ɔlɛdɩnká mʋ́sʋ́ nɩ́.
Ilehián ánɩ́ bétsiá asɩ díín, ba ɩwɩasɩ súan atɔ́.
Nɩ́ ɔkʋ ɔdá ɔpasua ɔhandɛ asʋ́n súná fʋ́ á, máhɔ mʋ́, nkɛ́tɩ fanú mʋ́ tsú ahá abanyɔ́-abasá ɔnɔ́ asa.
Mlɩlata aba puta Bulu ɔdwɛtɔ. Kristo ɔpasua ámʋ fɛ́ɛ́ bʋdɛ mlɩ tsiá ha.
Bɛ́kpa ɩsɩ wá nwuntɔ, gyi awɩrɛhɔ, blɩ́ bɛɛ, “Gyɔwɩ nɩ́. Wúlu yilé, gyɔwɩ nɩ́! Fʋ́ nyatɔ anɩ ntsusʋ ayibi awíe fɛ́ɛ́ anɩlanyá ɩwɩ tsú. Fʋ́ ɩwɩsʋ atɔ́ fɛ́ɛ́ lahɩ́ ɔtsáwʋlɛ pɛ́!”
Mlɩkɩ alɩá anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu tɛhɩ́ɛ́ dwɛ́ anɩ sʋ́ bʋtɛtɩ́ anɩ mʋ abí. Lɛ́lɛ́ á, mʋ abí anɩgyí. Támɛ tɔ́á sʋá ɔyɩ́ ánfɩtɔ ahá bʋmeyín anɩ gyí, bʋmeyín anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu.

Nyasubi mʋ́a mbitebí, mlɩ ɛ́ mlɩpʋ obú há mlɩ ahandɛ. Mlɩ fɛ́ɛ́ mlɩpʋ ɩwɩasɩbá kpa aba. Tsúfɛ́ bɔwanlɩ́n wá Bulu asʋ́n ámʋtɔ bɛɛ, “Bulu tɔkʋ́sʋ́ lɩ́ɩ́ ɩwɩ atsupʋ́sʋ́, támɛ ɔtɔwá awɩtɔlɛ há ahá ánɩ́ bɛba ɩwɩasɩ.”

Ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ! Megyí alɩ ígyi! Nɩ́ afunupʋ ahá fɛ́ɛ́ bʋgyi óó á, Bulu mʋ́ á, ɔnɔkwalɩpʋ ogyi. Igyi fɛ́ alɩá Owíe Dawid lɛ́bláa Bulu ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Nɩ́ fɔtɔ́ɩ́ á, ahá bʋblɩ́ bɛɛ fʋ́ asʋ́n igyi ɔnɔkwalɩ. Nɩ́ begyi fʋ́ asʋ́n ɛ́ á, bʋblɩ́ bɛɛ fʋ́ asʋ́n da ɔkpa.”
Igyí ahapʋ́ dɛhɛn amʋ ɛ́ bahá mʋ túmi bɛɛ, ɔbá Damasko bɛkɩtá ahá ánɩ́ bʋtɔbɔ́ mpáɩ fʋ́ dátɔ́ fɛ́ɛ́.”

Bɩ́mbɩ́ ámʋ a, Bulu ɔnɔ́sʋ́ atɔɩ́pʋ́ afunupʋ betsiá Bulu ahátɔ. Alɩ kɛ́n bétsiá mlɩtɔ nɩ́. Bɔ́bwɛ hɩ́ɛ́ɛ́ pʋ́ amʋ́ onutó atosunáhɛ́á ɩtɔmɔ́ bɔwa mlɩtɔ. Bɔ́kʋsʋ́ lɩ́ɩ́ amʋ́ Wíe amʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɔhɔ amʋ́ ámʋsʋ kʋ́ráá, pʋ́hɩ́ amʋ́ ɩwɩ.

Mʋ asʋn blɩ́hɛ́ anfɩ sʋ á, Yudafɔ ahandɛ amʋ bekle ánɩ́ bɔ́mɔ mʋ ɔkpagyíɔkpasʋ. Tsúfɛ́ megyí ɔkpʋ́nʋ́ ɔdakɛ́ mbla ámʋ nkʋlɛ tʋ́ʋn sʋ, mboún ɔlɛblɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, mʋ sɩ gyí Bulu, ilosuná ánɩ́ mʋa Bulunyɔ bʋgyi kɛ́kɛ́ɛ.
Mɩ́ apíó, ntɛkánfʋ́ mlɩ, tsúfɛ́ mlɩ ansɩ́ dɩn mɩ́sʋ́. Mlɩdɛ́bwɛ dɩ́nká Kristo atosunáhɛ́ amʋ́ʋ́ nɔpʋhá mlɩ ámʋ sʋ.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ́ Owíe Dawid lɛ́blɩ́ mʋ ɩwɩ asʋ́n ɔbɛ́ɛ, ‘Brégyíbrɛ́ á, ntowun anɩ Wíe mɩ́ ansɩ́sʋ́. Tsúfɛ́ ɔlɩɩ́ mɩ́ gyɔpɩsʋ, sʋ tɔtɔ mɔ́ɔwa mɩ́ ifú.
Bulu lakwɩ́ɩ́ mlɩ pɔ́pwɛ. Megyí nyankpʋsa ánɩ́ oméetsiá nkpa wá ɔpásʋ́ ɔlɔtsʋn kwɩɩ́ mlɩ. Mboún Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩbʋ nkpa, ɩbʋ ɩnʋ brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́tɔ́ amʋsʋ ɔlɔtsʋn kwɩɩ́ mlɩ.
Mʋ́ alɩ sʋ mlɩlɛ mlɩ lakpan blɩ, amlɩkokoli Bulu ha aba, mɛ́nɩ ɔbɛ́tsa mlɩ ɩlɔ. Ɔhá ánɩ́ mʋ asʋ́n da ɔkpa mpáɩ tɔwá ogyá. Ɩtɔyɔ́ agyʋ́má wankláán.
Ɔnɔkwalɩ ndɛ mlɩ bláa. Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔlɔhɔ mɩ gyi bʋ nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá.
“Mméesi mlɩ tswɩ fɛ́ awumbi. Néyinkí bá mlɩ wá.
Ɩbʋ mʋ́tɔ́á labi ámʋ ɩhɩ́ɛ́ ɩtsɔ! Gyankpapʋ gyí, Bulu lɔ́pʋ mʋ klʋnsʋ asʋ́n wá Yudafɔ ɩbɩtɔ.
Nkpábi, mlɩbu mlɩ awíe. Mlɩnya amʋ́ ifú, amlɩbu amʋ́ tsu mlɩ klʋntɔ fɛ́ alɩá mlɩtobú Kristo.
Bulu lalɛ́ mʋ yilé pʋ́ mʋ awɩtɔlɛ ɔwan súná fʋ́, alanyá klʋn há fʋ́, támɛ fʋmobu mʋ. Ntɛ́ɛ fʋmeyín ánɩ́ alɩá fɛ́damlí klʋntɔ yínkí ba mʋ wá sʋ alalɛ́ mʋ awɩtɔlɛ súná fʋ́?
Tɔ́á ɩtɛhá anɩtɔwá klʋn yɔ́ Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́ gyí, akʋ́lɩ́ mʋ tógyítɔ́á igyi mʋ apɛ́ á, otonú anɩ ɔmɛ.
Buluá bʋtɛkɩ ɔkpa há ogyi. Ndɛ mʋ kokóli mbɛ́ɛ, ɔhá ɩwɩ lwii mlɩ, ansɩ́ igyí mlɩ amlɩhɔ mʋ gyi. Mʋ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ ɔháa mlɩ túmi, mɛ́nɩ mʋ ɔkpakɩ́ɩ mɔ́ɔkpɔn mlɩ.
Ndobíi kʋ ɩbʋ mantáa ɔtɩ́nɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ bɛda Yesu mántá oyikpalíhɛsʋ ámʋ. Bolotí bʋtátɔ́ bwɛ́ mʋ́ fúli-ɔbɔ́ ɩnʋ. Bʋmɔkʋ́púlá ɔhaa mʋ́tɔ́ kɩ.

Támɛ begyi ɔbwɩkɩ́tá-atɔ amʋsʋ, bɛkɩtá mʋa mʋ ɔnɔ́sʋ́ ɔtɔɩ́pʋ́ amʋ́ʋ́ ɔtɔbwɛ́ osúna akpɔnkpɔntɩ mʋ ɩdátɔ́ ámʋ. Ofúla amʋ ɔlɔpʋmlɛ́ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔbwɩkɩ́tá-atɔ amʋ nsʋhɩ́ɛtɔ dɩn amʋ́sʋ́, bʋtosúm ɔkpɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ bɔpwɛ lɩan ɔbwɩ ámʋ nɩ. Bɔtswɩ ɔbwɩ ámʋ mʋa mʋ ɔnɔ́sʋ́ ɔtɔɩ́pʋ́ amʋ wá ogyá paatɩ kpɔnkpɔntɩá ogyá mʋ́a atonkodu ɩhɩ́ɛ́ detsií mʋ́tɔ́.
Bulu asʋn wanlɩ́nhɛ́ lɛ́trá blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Nɩ́ akʋ́n dɛ fʋ́ olupʋ́ á, ha mʋ atɔ́ ogyi. Nɩ́ ɔmɛwʋ́lɩ dɛ mʋ a, ha mʋ ntsu onu. Nɩ́ fɔbwɛ́ mʋ́ alɩ á, ɩbɛ́ha pɛ́lɩ bɛ́kɩtá mʋ ɔbɛ́tsɛ.”*
Mlɩha Kristo asʋ́n ámʋ ɩhɩɛ bʋla mlɩ klʋntɔ, ɩha mlɩ nyánsa. Mlɩpʋtɔɩ kpla aba, suna aba atɔ́. Mlɩwa Israelfɔ ɩlʋ, ɔsankuosʋ ɩlʋ pʋ́ ɔŋɛ́tɔ́ ɩlʋ mlɩ klʋntɔ pʋtsu Bulu fʋa, pʋda anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu ɩpán.
Akúlu, mlɩ ɛ́ mlɩdwɛ mlɩ aká. Mlɩmábwɛ amʋ́ kpóunkpóun.
Nɩ́ Okristoyintse ɔkʋ bʋ asʋrapʋ mʋ abusuantɔ á, ɔkɩ́ɩ amʋ́sʋ́. Ɔmási amʋ́ tswɩ ɔpasua ámʋsʋ, mɛ́nɩ ɔpasua ámʋ bénya ɔkpa kɩ amʋ́á bʋma ɔhaasʋ.
Adánsɩɛ ámʋ gyí, Bulu lapʋ́ nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá há anɩ tsʋn mʋ Bi ámʋsʋ.
Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔbʋ Bulu mʋ Bi ámʋ bʋ nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá. Alɩ kɛ́n ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔma Bulu mʋ Bi ámʋ má nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá nɩ́.
Mʋ́ sʋ nɩ́ Bulu mʋ Bi ámʋ ɔhá mlegyi ɩwɩ á, mʋ́mʋ́ mlɩlagyi ɩwɩ fɛ́ɛ́.
Mʋ́ sʋ ndɛ ɩpa bwií há mlɩ mbɛ́ɛ, mlɩmáha abatɔ iwu mlɩ, ɩwɩɔsɩn ánfɩ ndewúun ha mlɩ ánfɩ sʋ, tsúfɛ́ ɩbɔ́wa labi há mlɩ.
Tsúfɛ́ ahá ámʋ odu á, megyí anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo bʋdesúm. Amʋ́ ɔwɔ́lɩ laláhɛ bʋdesúm. Bapʋ́ amʋ́ ɔnɔwankɩ pʋ́ ahákanfʋ́ bʋna bʋdɛ ahá ánɩ́ bʋmeyín ɔlala mlɛ́.
Lalahɛ sɔ́ɔ́n bʋ amʋ́tɔ́. Ɩkʋ gyí; lakpanbwɛ, opotsuawa, olu, ɔnsɩ́pɛ, ahámɔ, mblɩ́kpɛ́ɛ, ahámlɛ́, agywɩɩn laláhɛ bwɛ pʋ́ ahátsíi.
Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ́ʋ́ ɔbʋ anɩtɔ ámʋ ɔtsáa fʋ́, afʋtalɩ gyo ɩtɔ wankláán ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɛha fʋ́ ámʋ ɩwɩ.
Nɩ́ ɔkʋ lódu tsiátɔ́ laláhɛ wá mʋ klʋntɔ á, lowu ɔbɔ́kpɔtɩ́ tsú mʋ́tɔ́. Támɛ nɩ́ ɔlɛha Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ lódu tsiátɔ́ wankláán wá mʋ klʋntɔ á, ɔbɔ́kpɔtɩ́ nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá tsú mʋ́tɔ́.
Mlɩmáha asɔ Kristo kɩ fɛ́ alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ amʋ́tɔ́ akʋ bɔbwɛ, awɔ bodundun amʋ́ mɔ́ ámʋ.
Otobú atɔ́, ɔma ɔnsɩ́pɛ. Ɔtamakɔ́sɩ́ nyá ɔblɔ́, ɔtamahɔ asʋ́n wá ɩwɩtɔ.
Bɔwa kántɔ́ atíntɔ ánɩ́ bɔpʋ dátɔ bwɛ́. Nɩ́ bʋdefulí á, amʋ́ atɛ totsúlá fɛ́ mpɔnkɔ mʋ́a keké tsɔtsɔɔtsɔá bʋsrɩ́ bɔyɔ́ ɩsá.
Nɩ́ mmɔkʋ́bláa amʋ́ asʋansʋ á, tɛkɩ bʋma ɩpɔ́n kʋkʋ gyí. Támɛ séi ánfɩ mʋ́ bʋma ɔnɔ́ lɛ́.
Mlɩkɩ mlɩ nátɩtɔ ɔmátɔ́fɔtɔ. Nɩ́ ɔkpa ifínkí há mlɩ á, mlɩmáyintá mʋ́.
Mlɩbɩ ánɩ́ brɛ́á bɛda Yesu mántá oyikpalíhɛ amʋsʋ á, mʋa anɩ tsiátɔ́ dada amʋ lówu, mɛ́nɩ anɩmɛ́ɛtrá bwɛ lakpan nkpábi.
Tɔ́á abɔ́pʋbɩ́ Bulu abí pʋ́ Ɔbʋnsám abí gyí, ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔtamabwɛ́ yilé, ntɛ́ɛ dwɛ́ mʋ ba mégyí Bulu mʋ bi.
Tsúfɛ́ ɔha ánɩ́ lakpan lagyi mʋ tsiátɔ́sʋ tolú Bulu. Ɔtamagyi Bulu mblasʋ, tsúfɛ́ ɔmɛ́ɛtalɩ́ gyi mʋ́sʋ́ ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ.
Mʋ́ sʋ ansɩ́ tegyi mɩ, ntɔtɔ́ɩ́ ansigyísʋ́. Nyankpʋsa ngyi. Lowu da gyo mɩ́, támɛ ndɛ Bulu ɔkpa kɩ́ɩ.
Ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ! Tɔ́á ndɛblɩ́ gyí, nɩ́ akpɩpʋ́ bɛhá ɩkpɩ igyí a, ɔŋɛ laláhɛ bɔpʋhá, megyí Bulu. Mʋ́ sʋ mmedékléá mlɩa ɔŋɛ laláhɛ mlɔ́bwɛ kʋlɛ.

Bulu ɔnɔ́sʋ́ atɔɩ́pʋ́ pʋ́ atɔ́ asunápʋ́ akʋ betsiá Antiokia ɔpasua ámʋtɔ. Amʋ́gyí: Barnaba, Simeon ánɩ́ bʋtɛtɩ́ mʋ Obibi, Lukio ánɩ́ otsú Kirene ɔmátɔ́, Manaen ánɩ́ bɛyaɩ́ mʋa Galilea ɔmásʋ́ ogyípʋ́ Herodenyɔ tsukʋlɛ pʋ́ Saulo.
Mlɩmáha ɔkpa ɔhaa ɔpʋ́ʋ asʋ́n ánɩ́ ɩma labi kʋkʋ mlɛ́ mlɩ. Tsúfɛ́ tsiátɔ́ laláhɛ anfɩ odu sʋ́ Bulu tenyá ɔblɔ́ bɩ́tɩ́ ahá ánɩ́ bʋbʋ asʋtɔ-ɔnlɩn ɩsʋ nɩ́.
Ilehián ánɩ́ mlɛ́ka amʋ́ itin, tsúfɛ́ bʋdɛ atɔ́á imehián ánɩ́ bosunátɔ́. Ɩ́nɩ lahá abusuan tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ bafwɩ́ ɔkpa. Bʋdɛ mʋ́ bwɛ ɛ́ pʋ́dúnká sika ɔkpa laláhɛsʋ tsú ahá wá.
(Yesu lɛ́bláa mʋ alɩ, tsúfɛ́ oyin ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔbɛ́lɛ mʋ há. Mʋ́ sʋ ɔlɛblɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Megyí mlɩ fɛ́ɛ́ lálɩn” nɩ.)
Yesu lɛ́blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Ɔnɔkwalɩ ndɛ mlɩ bláa. Ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔdʋ́ tsʋn akúfa ɩbansʋ wíé mʋ́tɔ́, ɔmɔtsʋn ɔkpa ɔnɔ́ á, owikplu pʋ́ ogyo otswapʋ́ ogyi.
Basí ɔkpa wankláán ámʋ tswɩ, yɔ́ bʋbuo Beor mʋ bi Bulu ɔnɔ́sʋ́ ɔtɔɩ́pʋ́ Bileam bwɛhɛ́ laláhɛ. Ɔlɔdwɛ sika ánɩ́ obénya tsú lalahɛbwɛtɔ.
Mʋ́ ɔma a, Yudafɔ, ɔmátɔ́fɔ pʋ́ amʋ́ ahandɛ bɔbwɛ agywɩɩn bɛɛ, bɔ́wa sumbí ayɔpʋ́ ámʋ ɩwɩɔsɩntɔ, dá amʋ́ abwi mɔ́.

Yesu lɛ́fɩtɛ́ mʋ otse saasɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Yohane mʋ bi Simon, fʋtɔdwɛ́ mɩ́ lɛ́lɛ́?” Ɩlɛhan Petro, tsúfɛ́ otse saasɩ Yesu lafɩ́tɛ́ mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Fʋtɔdwɛ́ mɩ́?” á. Mʋ́ sʋ ɔlɛlɛ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mɩ́ Wíé, fʋ́ onutó fʋyin tógyítɔ́. Yɛ́ɛ fʋyin ánɩ́ ntɛhɩ́ɛ́ dwɛ́ fʋ́!” Yesu lɛ́bláa mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Kɩ mɩ́ akúfa amʋsʋ.
Tógyítɔ́á mʋ́ ɩwɩ mɛtɩn, mbusuo abɔpʋ́ ntɛ́ɛ afunupʋ bʋmóowie wúlu amʋtɔ, nkɛ́tɩ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ bɔwanlɩ́n amʋ́ adá wá Okúfabi amʋ nkpa ɔwʋlʋ́tɔ́ amʋ nkʋlɛ.
Ɔtsɩ ámʋ lɔ́wa atadɩɛá igyi faasɩ ntsu mʋ́a pɛ́pɛ. Ɔlɔwa abutó wʋlɩhɛ ɔtsan-ɔtsan, ɔdɛ sika pɛpɛ owebi mʋ gyɔpɩtɔ. Akisítɔ pʋ́ mʋ obu-ɔnɔ́tsiá ifin lɔbʋlá mʋ́ dɛ́dɛ́ɛ́dɛ́.
Mʋ́á ɩdʋn a, ɔdwɛ tɔ́bwɛ́ anɩ fɛ́ɛ́ ɩkʋlɛ. Ɩbwɛ́ɛ mlɩ tati dɩdáhɛ́.
Yesu lɛ́bláa amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Brɛ́ lafʋn ánɩ́ bɔ́wa Nyankpʋsa-Mʋ-Bi ámʋ numnyam.
Fɛɛ bʋmátɔ mbʋa, támɛ fʋdɛ mbʋa tɔ? Fɛɛ bʋmásum ɩkpɩ, támɛ fʋtowí ɔkpɩasɩ atɔ́.
Ɩna alɩ mbla ánfɩ sʋ lakpan lénya ɔkpa pʋ́ ɔnsɩ́pɛ kugyíkʋ wá mɩ́tɔ́. Tsúfɛ́ nɩ́ mbla ámʋ má ɩnʋ á, tɛkɩ lakpan má túmi mɩ́sʋ́.
Nɔ́kɔ hɔ fʋ tsú ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ ndɛ fʋ́ wa sɩ́sɩ́, bʋgyi fʋ́ onutó ahá Yudafɔ pʋ́ amʋ́á bʋmegyí Yudafɔ ɩbɩtɔ.

Tsúfɛ́ brɛ́ ámʋ a, aha mimláhɛ anɩ ɛ́ anɩgyí. Asʋtɔ lɔ́wa anɩ ɔnlɩn. Anɩlɔ́fwɩ, mlí nkpábi há ɔwɔ́lɩ laláhɛ pʋ́ atɔ́á ɩtɔwá ɔha ansigyí. Anɩléyintá brɛ́ súsu lalahɛ mʋ́a tɔ́á ɩdɛ anɩ ansɩ́ pɛ ɩwɩ. Ahá bolu anɩ, anɩ ɛ́ anɩlólu amʋ́.
Nlɩɩ́ Bulu mʋa Kristo Yesu pʋ́ Bulu-abɔpʋ ánɩ́ alalɛ́ ansɩ́tɔ́, ndɛ fʋ́ hɩɛ mbɛ́ɛ, fʋgyí asʋ́n ánfɩsʋ wankláán. Mákɩ ɔhaa ansɩ́tɔ́ ntɛ́ɛ fútí fɩtátɔ kɩ.
Mʋ́ sʋ ɩmákpɔn mlɩ. Mlɩkɩta ɩwɩ, amlɩlɩɩ kínkín, tsúfɛ́ mlɩbʋ ɩkɔká kpɔnkpɔɔnkpɔntɩ Bulu wá.
Tɔ́á ɩhɩ́ɛ́ dehián gyí, ɔhá ánɩ́ bapʋ́ agyʋ́má wá mʋ ɩbɩtɔ obégyi ɔnɔkwalɩ.
Petro létsiá Simon ánɩ́ ɔtɔyɔ́ ɔwʋlʋ́-kpákpá ɩwɩ agyʋ́má wá Yopa ɩnʋ wá ɔpá.
Mlɩméyín ánɩ́ Bulu ɔtswɛ́kpa mlɩgyí, Bulu Ɔŋɛ́ ámʋ tsie mlɩtɔ?
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ mɩ́ apíó, Yesu obugya amʋ sʋ anɩbʋ ɔkpa wíé ɔsʋ́sʋ́ Ɔwankɩ́kpátɔ Ɔwankɩ́kpá ɩnʋ faan.
Yesu lɛ́trá bláa amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mɩ́ mʋ́ nɔyɔ́. Mlódunká mɩ́. Mlówu wá mlɩ lakpantɔ. Mlɩmɛ́ɛtalɩ́ ba ɔtɩ́nɛ́á nɔyɔ́.”
Mʋ́ sʋ ɩ́nɩá Bulu lalɛ́ mlɩ pʋ́bwɛ́ mʋ ahá ánɩ́ amʋ́ ɩwɩ latɩn pʋ́ mʋ adwɛpʋ́ á, mlɩha nwewúun, awɩtɔlɛwa, ɩwɩasɩbá, ilwií pʋ́ klʋnya itsia mlɩtɔ.
Nɩ́ mlɩtɔ ɔkʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ mósum mɩ́ á, ilehián ánɩ́ obóbuo mɩ, mɛ́nɩ obétsiá ɔtɩ́nɛ́á mbʋ. Nɩ́ ɔkʋ dɛ́ mɩ́ sum á, mɩ́ Sɩ́ ɔbɔ́wa mʋ numnyam.”
Ɔbwɛ́ɛ ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔtɛkɩ mʋ wóyísʋ́ wankláán, mʋ abí bɛba ɩwɩasɩ, bʋtobú mʋ ɔkpagyíɔkpasʋ.
Mlɩpʋ asʋ́n ánfɩ kɩta klʋn wa aba ɩwɩtɔ, pʋwa aba ɔwʋnlɩ́n, fɛ́ alɩá mlɩdɛ́ mʋ́ bwɛ dodo.
Asʋ́n ánɩ́ mlɩlónu tsú brɛ́á mlɩlémlí Akristofɔ gyí, adwɛ́ɛ aba.
Asʋ́n ánɩ́ ndɛ há mlɩ gyí, ɔyɩ́tɔ́ lawá ɔnlɩn séi. Mʋ́ sʋ nahogyiá ɩbʋ alɛ́á ɔhagyíɔha obétsiá alɩá otsie yaɩ́.
Yudafɔ ɔhandɛ ɔkʋ létsiá, bʋtɛtɩ́ mʋ Nikodemo. Farisiyin ogyi.
Alɩ́ ɩlɛba ha obu-ɔnɔ́ otsiápʋ́ Rahab ɛ́ nɩ́. Bulu lótsu mʋ ánɩ́ mʋ asʋ́n da ɔkpa, tsú tɔ́á ɔlɔbwɛ sʋ. Ɔlɔpʋ Yudafɔ akʋá bɛba bʋdɛ ansɩ́ wa kɩ mʋ ɔmátɔ́ ŋáín, ɔlɛha amʋ́ bɛtsɛ ɔkpa srɩ́.
Támɛ Bulu ɔbɔ́hɔ ɔtsɩ nkpa tsʋn ɩkwɩ́ɩsʋ.* Nɩ́ ɔlɛtalɩ́ kɩ́tá mʋ hógyi pʋ́ mʋ abadwɛtɔ, ɔlɛha mʋ ɩwɩ lɛtɩn, oletsiá nkpa ɛ́ wankláán.
Israel Bulu lɛ́lɛ anɩ anáin bwɛ́ mʋ ahá. Ɔlɛha bɛklɛɩ́ brɛ́á bʋgyi afɔɔ́ Egyipte ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ. Ɔlɔpʋ mʋ túmi kpɔnkpɔɔnkpɔntɩ kpá amʋ́ dalɩ ɔmá ámʋtɔ.
Bulu yín nyankpʋsa klʋntɔ. Ɔlɔpʋ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ há amʋ́, fɛ́ alɩá ɔlɔpʋhá anɩ pʋ́súná ánɩ́ alahɔ amʋ́.
Tsúfɛ́ Bulu lɛ́blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mátɔ mbʋa.” Mʋ kɛ́n lɛ́blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mámɔ ɔha” ɛ́ nɩ́. Mʋ́ sʋ nɩ́ fʋmɔkʋ́tɔ́ mbʋa, támɛ famɔ́ ɔha a, fʋmɔkʋ́kíná Bulu mblasʋ gyí nɩ?
Ntɛhá amʋ́ nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá. Bʋmóowu ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ. Ɔhaa mɛ́ɛtalɩ́ swɩ́ɩ́ mɩ́ amʋ́.
Bulu tɛ́há anɩ iwilwii. Ɩmɔ́ɔwa ɔpá á, ɔbɛ́tsa Satansʋ mántá ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ tántáántán, mlɛ́lɩɩ́ mʋsʋ. Anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo ogyíi mlɩ bʋalɛ, ɔlɩɩ mlɩ ɔma.
Bɔ́bwɛ ɩwɩ fɛ́ Bulu bʋdesúm, támɛ békiná mʋ túmi. Lɛ ɩwɩ lɛ ahá ánfɩ odutɔ.
Alɩ kɛ́n ɩbʋ mʋ́tɔ́ ánɩ́ anɩtsɔ́, támɛ anɩa Kristonyɔ anɩlabwɛ́ ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ ɔkʋlɛ nɩ. Mʋ́ sʋ anɩgyí ntobí ɔtsan-ɔtsan ánɩ́ anɩtsátsáa abasʋ, anɩlɔ́bwɛ ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ ɔkʋlɛ amʋ.
Asʋ́n ánfɩ bʋ mʋ́tɔ́. Yɩrɩ ɩwɩ afʋsuna mʋ́ wankláán, mɛ́nɩ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ amʋ́ ansɩ́ dɩn Bulusʋ ámʋ bétsiá bwɛ́ yilé brégyíbrɛ́. Mʋ́gyí tɔ́á ɩbʋ alɛ́, ɩbɔ́wa labi há ɔhagyíɔha nɩ.
Alɩ́ Bulu asʋn wanlɩ́nhɛ́ anfɩ ɩlɛba mʋ́tɔ́ nɩ́. Ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Abraham lɔ́hɔ Bulu gyi. Mʋ́ sʋ́ Bulu lóbu mʋ yilé ɔbwɛpʋ́,” tɩ́ mʋ mʋ nyawie nɩ.
Mɩ́ apíó, nɩ́ mlɩlahɔ numnyam Owíe Yesu Kristo gyi a, mlɩmáfutí fɩtátɔ kɩ.
Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ lɛ́trá blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Bʋtekle asʋkpan blɩ́. Bʋtɔpʋ́ amʋ́ ɔnɔ́ mlɛ́ ahá. Amʋ́ ɔnɔ́tɔ́ asʋn blɩ́hɛ́ tɔmɔ́ fɛ́ ɩwɔ elín.”
Alɩ kɛ́n lehián ánɩ́ oyin ɔbɔ́dwɛ mʋ ka fɛ́ mʋ ɩwɩ nɩ́. Oyin ánɩ́ ɔtɔdwɛ́ mʋ ka tɔdwɛ́ mʋ onutó ɩwɩ.
Nkálɩ anɩdɛ́blɩ́ ngya? Anɩdɛ́blɩ́ anɩaa, ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋmegyí Yudafɔ ámʋ bʋmɔbɔ mbɔ́dɩ́ kʋkʋ, asa Bulu lɛ́ha amʋ́ asʋ! Hógyi sʋ́ benya mʋ́.
Ilehián ánɩ́ ɔbɛ́kɩtá hógyi asʋ́n ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩlalɩn ɔwan ámʋtɔ wankláán, mʋ klʋn ɛ́ mɛ́ɛtrá ha mʋ ɩpɔ́n.

Ilehián ánɩ́ amʋ́á amʋ́ awíe bʋbʋ ɔpasua ámʋtɔ bóbu amʋ́ awíe amʋ dʋn. Séi kʋ́ráá ilehián ánɩ́ bóbu amʋ́ dʋn nɩ, tsúfɛ́ ahógyipʋ bʋgyi, bʋtɔdwɛ́ amʋ́ ɛ́. Afunu Atosunáhɛ́ Pʋ́ Atonyahɛ́ Onutó Ɩ́nɩ aná gyí tɔ́á fʋsúna amʋ́, afʋwa amʋ́ atɛtɔ-ɔnlɩn abʋbwɛ nɩ́.
Ɩbʋ mʋ́tɔ́ ánɩ́ amʋ́tɔ́ akʋ bʋmɔhɔ Bulu asʋ́n ámʋsʋ gyi. Támɛ amʋ́ tsiátɔ́ anfɩ odu ɩbɛ́talɩ́ há Bulu obési tɔ́á ɔlɛhɩɛ ánɩ́ ɔbɔ́bwɛ lóó?
Támɛ ɩsá akɔpʋ́ ámʋtɔ ɔkʋlɛ lɔ́pʋ mʋ pɩ́a wɔ Yesu abɩntɔ, ntsu mʋ́a obugya lɛfɛn dalɩ.
Mbla ánɩ́ ndɛpʋhá mlɩ gyí; mlɩdwɛ aba fɛ́ alɩá ntɔdwɛ́ mlɩ.
Mlɩmápʋ mlɩ nyankpʋsa-oyí ɩwɩ atɔ́ há lalahɛbwɛ. Mboún mlɩpʋ mlɩ ɩwɩ fɛ́ɛ́ ha Bulu, fɛ́ ahá ánɩ́ alakʋ́sʋ́a amʋ́ tsú afúlitɔ ba nkpatɔ, ɔpʋ mlɩ bwɛ tɔ́á ɩda ɔkpa.
Támɛ anɩmégyí fɛ́ ahá ánɩ́ badámlí ɔma há Bulu, bafwɩ́. Mboún anɩgyí ahá ánɩ́ amʋ́ hógyi lahɔ amʋ́ nkpa.
Mʋ́ ɔma a, Bulu ɔbɔ́hɔ Yudafɔ fɛ́ɛ́ nkpa. Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ lɛ́blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Sion wúlutɔ Nkpa Ɔhɔ́pʋ amʋ ɔbɛ́lɩn tsu. Ɔbɛ́ba bɛha Yakob abí-aná fɛ́ɛ́ bési lalahɛ bwɛ.
Yudafɔ lɔ́mɔ Bulu ɔnɔ́sʋ́ atɔɩ́pʋ́ pʋ́ anɩ Wíe Yesu. Amʋ́ kɛ́n lagya anɩ lɛ́ ɔmá ámʋtɔ. Bʋtamakle ahá asʋ́n, bʋtamagyi Bulu ansɩ́.
Mɩ́ apíó, lakpan ɩwɩ afɔdɩɛ kʋkʋ ɩtráa ma ɩnʋ há anɩ, nɩ́ akɩ ansɩ́ bwɛ́ lakpan brɛ́á anɩlabɩ́ ɔnɔkwalɩ amʋ.
Anɩa Kristo Yesunyɔ ɩkʋlɛbwɛ ánfɩ sʋ Bulu lakʋ́sʋ́a anɩa mʋnyɔ tsú lowutɔ, alahá anɩ otsiákpá Kristo wá. Anɩa mʋnyɔ abégyi iwíe ɔsʋ́sʋ́.
Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩtɔ okugyíɔkʋ ɔmátrá wa afunu. Ɔhagyíɔha ɔbláa mʋ ba Okristoyin ɔnɔkwalɩ. Tsúfɛ́ anɩ fɛ́ɛ́ anɩgyí nyankpʋsa-oyí ɔkʋlɛ amʋ ɩwɩ atɔ́.
Támɛ anɩmési ɩwɩ há amʋ́ kpalobí kʋ́ráá, mɛ́nɩ ɔnɔkwalɩá ɩbʋ asʋn wankláán ámʋtɔ ɩmɛ́ɛtsɛ ha mlɩ.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔtɛblɩ́ ɔblɩ́ɩ bámbá ɔkʋ́lɩ Bulu mʋ́ asɩnu, mɛ́nɩ ɔbɛ́talɩ́ lɛ mʋ́ asɩ súná mʋ́ anupʋ́.

Alɩ brɛ́ ánfɩtɔ fɛ́ɛ́ á, Saulo mɔ́kʋ́sí Yesu akasɩ́pʋ́ amʋ bláa ɔbɛ́ɛ, mɔ́mɔ amʋ́. Mʋ́ sʋ ɔlɔyɔ Bulu igyí ɔhapʋ́ dɛhɛn wá yɔ́kʋlɩ́ mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, ɔwánlɩn ɔwʋlʋ́ pʋlɛ mʋ suna Damasko Yudafɔ ofíakpa ahandɛ, mɛ́nɩ nɩ́ mʋ ɩbɩ da oyin ntɛ́ɛ ɔtsɩ ɔkʋ, ɔna anɩ Wíe ɔkpa ámʋsʋ a, mɛ́kɩtá mʋ, kpá mʋ ba Yerusalem.
Nɛbá fʋ́ wá séi. Támɛ brɛ́ ánfɩ ntráa mbʋ ɔyɩ́tɔ́ nfɩ ndɛ asʋ́n ánfɩ blɩ́, mɛ́nɩ bénya ansigyí fɛ́ alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ mɩ́ ɛ́ mbʋ ansigyítɔ́ amʋ.
Mlɩha ansɩ́ mboún igyi mlɩ ánɩ́ mlɩdɛ́ Kristo asʋn wunhɛ amʋ kʋ wúun, mɛ́nɩ ansɩ́ bɛtrá hɩɛ gyí mlɩ ɛkɛ ámʋ́ʋ́ mʋ numnyam bɛ́lɩn ɔwan ámʋ.
Nowun pututɔ-mbwɩ pʋ́ wúlutɔ mbwɩ, mbwɩá bʋbʋ ayín, támɛ bʋtɛká abɔnɔ pʋ́ ɔyɩ́tɔ́ mbubwi fɛ́ɛ́ ɔhráda ámʋtɔ.
Séi gyí brɛ́á mlɛ́lɛ ɔblɔ́, ɔblɔ́kpán, olu, abakpɔɩ́, asʋkpan blɩ́ aná lɛ́ mlɩtɔ nɩ́.
Tati-obubí abwɛpʋ́ amʋ́ ɛ́ bʋgyi. Mʋ́ sʋ Paulo létsiá amʋ́ wá, mʋa mʋnyɔ betsiá bwɛ́ tati-obubí ámʋ fɛ́.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ mlɩmáha lakpan igyi mlɩ nyankpʋsa-oyí ánfɩ ibówu ánfɩsʋ, mɛ́nɩ ɩmɛ́ɛha ɔwɔ́lɩ laláhɛ igyi mlɩsʋ, amlɩbwɛ tɔ́á ideklé.
Anɩdɛ́ amʋ́ ɔlá da anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo ɩdátɔ́ anɩaa, bʋsíi natɩ́ tsʋn, abʋyɔ agyʋ́má nya amʋ́ atogyihɛ.
“Anɩ anáin anfɩ bɛfɛ amʋ́ gyama Yosef, mʋ ɩwɩ olu sʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ ɔlɔyɔ yɛ́bwɛ ɔkpábi Egyipte ɔmátɔ́. Támɛ Bulu lɛ́lɩɩ́ mʋ ɔma,
Amʋ́tɔ́ ɔkʋlɛ dá gyí Agabo. Ɔlɔkʋsʋ́ lɩ́ɩ́, blɩ́ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ túmitɔ tswɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Akʋ́n kpɔnkpɔntɩ kʋ bɛ́ba Roma ɔmátɔ́ fɛ́ɛ́.” Ɩlɛba mʋ́tɔ́ brɛ́á Roma Owíe Klaudio tsie obíásʋ́.
Brɛ́á Paulo lɛ́blɩ́ asʋ́n ánfɩ tá á, mʋa amʋ́nyɔ fɛ́ɛ́ bɛda akpawunu bɔ́ mpáɩ.
Ahá ánɩ́ bʋgyi Kristo klɛ́ bamɔ́ amʋ́ tsiátɔ́ dada pʋ́ amʋ́ ɔwɔ́lɩ laláhɛ Kristo Yesu oyikpalíhɛ amʋsʋ.
Apíó aba, nɩ́ mlowíe ɩkplán mʋ́a asʋn wunhɛtɔ á, ansɩ́ ɩhɩ́ɛ gyi mlɩ.
Mʋ́ sʋ nɩ́ anɩdɛ́blɩ́ anɩaa, anɩa mʋnyɔ anɩdɛ́ mbagyí, támɛ anɩtráa anɩná oklúntɔ á, anɩdɛ́ afunu wa. Anɩmɛ́dɛ́bwɛ dɩ́nká ɔnɔkwalɩ asʋ́n ámʋsʋ.
Atowunhɛ amʋtɔ á, olowun ánɩ́ ɔsʋ́sʋ́ lafínkí, tɔkʋá igyi fɛ́ ɔhráda tɛ́ɩ́hɛ́, bʋdɛ mʋ nsiebí ana, ɩdɛkplɩ́ ɩbá ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ.
Anɩtɔ akʋ atsú Partia, Media, Elam, Mesopotamia, Yudea, Kapadokia, Ponto, Asia,
mɛ́nɩ mlɛ́talɩ́ tsíá tsiátɔ́á ɩbɔ́wa anɩ Wíe numnyam, amlɩgyi mʋ ansɩ́ ɔkpagyíɔkpasʋ. Ɔháa amlɩbwɛ yilé brégyíbrɛ́, trá bɩ Bulu tsɩa.
Mɩ́ bí Timoteo, atɔ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lɛ́lɛ súná tsú fʋ́ ɩwɩ ámʋ sʋ́ ndɛ mbla ánfɩ wa há fʋ́. Pʋ asʋ́n ánfɩ yɔ agyʋ́má, afʋpʋkɔ atosunáhɛ́ wankláán ámʋ nwunsʋ.
Ɩ́nɩ fɛ́ɛ́ ɔma a, nonu ɔmɛ kʋá igyi fɛ́ ɔdɔm ánɩ́ bʋdɛkplʋ́n kʋklʋ́kʋ́ʋ́ ɔsʋ́sʋ́. Bʋdɛblɩ́ bɛɛ, “Halelúia!* Anɩ Bulu tɔhɔ ahá nkpa. Mʋ nkʋlɛ bʋ́ʋ túmi mʋ́a numnyam,
Asa mlɩlémlí Akristofɔ á, asʋtɔ-ɔnlɩn mʋ́a lakpanbwɛ sʋ mlɩgyí ɔŋɛ́tɔ́ aha wuhɛ́.
Mlɩmɛ́ɛtalɩ́ pʋ́ anɩ Wíe ɛwɛ tin ɔnɔ́, láyɔ́pʋ ɔŋɛ laláhɛ ɛwɛ ɛ́ tin ɔnɔ́. Mlɩa Kristo mlɩmɛ́ɛtalɩ́ wá ɩbɩ gyi atɔ́, mlɩa ɔŋɛ laláhɛ ɛ́ amlɩwa ɩbɩ gyi atɔ́.
Bulu latɩn mlɩ ɩwɩ. Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩmáwa atsɩ mʋ́a ayin asʋ́n, wá hakpan, ntɛ́ɛ ɔnsɩ́pɛ.

Ɔhá ánɩ́ mʋ ɩwɩ lɛ́tɩn Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́ á, tógyítɔ́ ɩwɩ lɛ́tɩn ha mʋ. Támɛ tɔtɔ ɩwɩ mɛ́tɩn ha lalahɛ ɔbwɛpʋ́á ɔtamahɔ Yesu gyi. Lɛ́lɛ́ mʋ́ á, mʋ agywɩɩn layíntá, mʋ klʋn ɛ́ ɩlasí mʋ ɩpɔ́n ha sʋ ɔtamabɩ́ yilé ntɛ́ɛ lalahɛ.
Ahá ánɩ́ bonu mʋ asʋn blɩ́hɛ́ anfɩ fɛ́ɛ́ ɔnɔ́ lobwie amʋ́. Mʋ́ sʋ bɛfɩtɛ́ bɛɛ, “Megyí mʋdɛ́ Yesu asúmpʋ́ mɔ Yerusalem nɩ? Megyí amʋ́ ɔkɩtákpá ɔlɛba nfɩ, ɔkpa amʋ́ ya igyí ahapʋ́ dɛhɛn amʋ?”

Támɛ Yesu igyíha agyʋ́má ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lɛ́ha mʋ amʋ lɛ́hɩɛ́ fʋ́á dʋn ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ igyí ahapʋ́ dɛhɛn amʋ klɛ́. Ntam pɔpwɛ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩbʋ anɩa Bulu nsɩnɛ́, Yesu gyí mʋ́ ɔma ɔlɩɩ́pʋ́ amʋ ɛ́ ɩhɩ́ɛ́ bʋ alɛ́ dʋn ntam dada amʋ. Tsúfɛ́ ɔlɛhɩɛ atoyiléá mɔ́bwɛ há anɩ wá mʋ́tɔ́.
Tsúfɛ́ nɩ́ ntsie nkpa á, ntsie ha Kristo. Nɩ́ nowú ɛ́ á, ɩbɔ́wa mɩ labi dʋn.
Nyin ánɩ́ Bulu ámʋ́ʋ́ olefi agyʋ́má wankláán ámʋ asɩ mlɩtɔ ámʋ kɛ́n ɔbɔ́yɔ mʋ́sʋ́ alɩɩ yɔ́fʋn Kristo Yesu ɔbákɛ amʋ.

Anɩyin ánɩ́ Bulu mʋ Bi ámʋ laba. Alahá anɩlanú asʋ́n asɩ, mɛ́nɩ abɛ́bɩ Bulu Ɔnɔkwalɩpʋ amʋ. Anɩa mʋnyɔ anɩlabwɛ́ kʋlɛ, anɩa mʋ Bi Yesu Kristo ɛ́ anɩlabwɛ́ kʋlɛ. Lɛ́lɛ́ á, mʋ nkʋlɛ pɛ́ gyí Bulu Ɔnɔkwalɩpʋ pʋ́ nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá ámʋ nɩ.
Alɩágyíalɩ́á igyi mlɩ mʋ́ á, iwilwii itsía mlɩa ɔhagyíɔha nsɩnɛ́.
Mlɩha akɩta tɔ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ anɩdɛ́ mʋ́ ɩwɩ adánsɩɛ gyí, anɩdɛ́ mʋ́ ɔkpa kɩ́ɩ amʋtɔ kínkín, tsúfɛ́ Ɔnɔkwalɩpʋ Bulu gyí. Ɔbɔ́bwɛ tɔ́á ɔlɛhɩɛ ánɩ́ mɔ́bwɛ há anɩ.
“Iwilwii ndɛ mlɩ ha! Napʋ́ mɩ́ iwilwii há mlɩ. Megyí mʋ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔyɩ́tɔ́fɔ bʋtɛhá ámʋ odu. Mlɩmáha opúni itsii mlɩ. Ifú ɛ́ mákɩtá mlɩ.
Mʋ́ sʋ anɩtɔwá klʋn brégyíbrɛ́. Ɩbʋ mʋ́tɔ́á brɛ́ ánfɩ anɩbʋ ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ-ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ anfɩtɔ á, anɩbʋ ɩfɔ́ anɩ Wíe wá.
Nɩ́ ɔkʋ onú mɩ́ asʋ́n, támɛ omegyi mʋ́sʋ́ á, megyí mɩ́ ɔbɛ́ha mʋ ɩpɔ́n. Tsúfɛ́ mmɛba asʋ́n ogyíkpá. Ahá nkpa ɔhɔ́kpa nɛba.
Mlɩmábwɛ mlɩ ɩwɩ fɛ́ Kain. Ɔlɔbwɛ Ɔbʋnsám mʋ bi, mɔ́ mʋ gyama. Ntɔ lɛ́ha sʋ́ ɔlɔmɔ mʋ? Ɔlɔbwɛ ɩtɔ laláhɛ, mʋ gyama mʋ́ lɔ́bwɛ ɩtɔ wankláán sʋ ɔlɔmɔ mʋ.
Ɔpʋ nsɩnɛ́ ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ kugyíkʋ lɔ́fwɩ, abʋ ɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́ ɩlɛŋa.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ ɔmá kɛ́ɩ́n ánɩ́ bʋma ɩklátɔ, bʋtsɔ fɛ́ ntsrakpabi ntɛ́ɛ ɔpʋ ɔnɔ́ ɩsɩ bɛlɩn tsu Abraham ánɩ́ aladan tsʋn ɩkwɩ́ɩsʋtɔ.
Mlɩha awa Bulu numnyam, akanfʋ mʋ anɩaa, “Fʋ́gyí Owíeá fʋ́ iwíegyí tamamɔ́ ɔnɔ́. Bulu Ɔkʋkʋ́nʋ́ ɔkʋlɛ, bʋtamapʋ́ ansíbi wun fʋ. Fʋbʋ ɩnʋ brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́, fʋtamawú! Amen.”
Bulu-ɔbɔpʋ amʋ lɔ́kplʋn blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mlɩnya Bulu ifú, amlɩwa mʋ numnyam, tsúfɛ́ mʋ asʋ́ngyíbɩ lafʋn. Mlɩsum mʋ. Mʋlɔ́bwɛ ɔsʋ́ mʋ́a asɩ, ɔpʋ mʋ́a ntsu fɛ́ɛ́!”

Brɛ́á akasɩ́pʋ́ amʋ bɛba bʋdɛklɛɩ́ á, ɩtrɛ́ lɛda Yudafɔ Griiki ablɩ́pʋ́ amʋ́ʋ́ bʋtɛblɩ́ Hebri ɔblɩ́ɩ amʋ nsɩnɛ́. Griiki ablɩ́pʋ́ amʋ bɛɛ, ekekegyíɛkɛ, nɩ́ bʋdɛ atɔ́ yée a, bʋtamahá Griikifɔ asʋrapʋ amʋ.
Asʋn wunhɛ ánfɩ aná sʋ Bulu lɛ́tɩ mlɩ nɩ́. Tsúfɛ́ mlɩ sʋ Kristo onutó ɛ́ lótomi tsʋn asʋn wunhɛtɔ pʋ́bwɛ́ mfántʋ́hʋ́n há mlɩ, mɛ́nɩ mlɩ ɛ́ mlɔ́tsʋn mʋ́sʋ́.
Brɛ́á anɩbʋ mlɩ wá kʋ́ráá á, anɩlɔ́wa mbla há mlɩ anɩaa, “Ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔmɔyɔ agyʋ́má mágyi atɔ́.”
Tsúfɛ́ dwɛ́ Bulu lɛ́hɩɛ dwɛ́ anyánkpʋ́sa. Mʋ́ sʋ ɔlɔpʋ mʋ Bi ɔkʋkʋ́nʋ́ ɔkʋlɛ pɛ́ ámʋ há, mɛ́nɩ ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔlɔhɔ mʋ gyi omóowu, mboún obénya nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá.
Ɛkɛ ɔkʋ ɔŋɛ laláhɛ lɛ́fɩtɛ́ amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Nyin Yesu, nabɩ́ Paulo, mlɩ ɛ́ mɛ́, amɛndɩ mlɩgyí?”
Ɩnʋ nowun ánɩ́ ɔbwɩkɩ́tá-atɔ amʋ mʋa ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ awíe pʋ́ amʋ́ ɩsá akɔpʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ bɛkpa aba bɔyɔ́kɔ ɔpɔnkɔ futútúsʋ́ ɔdɩnkápʋ́ amʋ mʋa mʋ ɩsá akɔpʋ́.
Anɩlówie ntsusʋ-yibi kʋá itsú Adramitio fʋ́n, ɩyɔ́ ɔpʋ ɔnɔ́ awúluá ɩbʋ Asia ɔmátɔ́. Makedoniayin Aristarko, otsú Tesalonika amʋ ɛ́ bʋ anɩtɔ.
Mlɩkaɩn obu adɩpʋ́sʋ́, fɛ́ mlɩa amʋ́nyɔ dá obu. Mlɩkaɩn ahá ánɩ́ bʋdɛ ɩwɩɔsɩn wúunsʋ, fɛ́ mlɩa amʋ́nyɔ dɛ́ ɩwɩɔsɩn ámʋ wúun.
Mlɩ atɔ bwɛhɛ́ pʋ́ mlɩ asʋn blɩ́hɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́ ɩbwɛ́ɛ anɩ Wíe Yesu ɩdátɔ́, amlɩpʋ ɩpán ha anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu tsʋn mʋsʋ.
Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ akasɩ́pʋ́ bʋyée atɔ wankláán ánɩ́ bʋbʋ ɩkʋ ha amʋ́ asunápʋ́.

Brɛ́ ámʋtɔ á, Bulu mɔ́kʋ́nyá há Abraham ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ anfɩ yabi oyíkpa kʋlɛ kʋ́ráá. Támɛ Bulu lɛ́hɩɛ mʋ asɩ yaɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, mʋa mʋ abí-aná obégyi ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ anfɩ ɛkɛkʋ́. Alɩ brɛ́ ámʋtɔ á, Abraham mɔ́kʋ́kwɩ́ɩ́ obí.
Owíe anfɩ lɔ́wa owuntɔlɩn anɩ anáin amʋsʋ. Ɔlɛka amʋ́ hɩ́ɛ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, bʋtswɩ́ɩ amʋ́ abi bɔbwɛ tsalɩfwɩ abʋwu.
Mʋ́ʋ́ Petro mʋa mʋnyɔ bɔpʋ ɔkpa bɔyɔ́ opulákpá ɩnʋ.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ ntɔbɔ́ mbɔ́dɩ́ ánɩ́ mɩ́ klʋn méetsiá há mɩ́ pɔ́n Bulu mʋa anyánkpʋ́sa fɛ́ɛ́ ansɩ́tɔ́ brégyíbrɛ́.

Amʋ́ pɛ́lɩla bʋ nyányáa fɛ́ ntsusʋ-afuá ɩtɛda bobun ogbémgbesʋ. Bʋgyi fɛ́ ntsrakpabiá ɩna dɛtsʋ́ʋn nwʋlʋ́táasʋ kɛkɛ. Amʋ́ otsiákpá gyí oklún tuun ánɩ́ Bulu lɛ́layáɩ́ há amʋ́ brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́tɔ́.
Megyí ɔhaa wá notsúa mʋ́, ntɛ́ɛ ɔkʋ lósuná mɩ́. Yesu Kristo onutó lɛ́lɛ mʋ́ súná mɩ́.
Tsúfɛ́ brɛ́á anɩbʋ anɩ tsiátɔ́ dada amʋtɔ á, mbla ámʋ lɛ́ha anɩ ɔwɔ́lɩ laláhɛ legyi anɩsʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ anɩlɔ́bwɛ tɔ́á ɩtɔpʋ́ lowu ba.

Ɔnɔkwalɩ ndɛ mlɩ bláa, mmɛdɛ́ afunu wa. Ɩ́nɩ sʋ́ Bulu lɛ́lɛ mɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, mbwɛ́ɛ mʋ asʋ́n ɔkan ɔdapʋ́, mʋ sumbí ɔyɔpʋ́ pʋ́ osunápʋ́ ha ahá ánɩ́ bʋmegyi Yudafɔ, mɩ́ ambla amʋ́ ɔnɔkwalɩ asʋ́n tsú Yesusʋ hógyi ɩwɩ nɩ́.
Ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔdɛ Bulu mblasʋ gyí a, mʋa Bulu babwɛ́ kʋlɛ. Bulu bʋ mʋ klʋntɔ. Tɔ́á itosúná anɩ ánɩ́ ɔbʋ anɩ klʋntɔ gyí Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɔpʋhá anɩ ámʋ.
Mlɩmákɩ mlɩ nkʋlɛ klɛ́, mboún mlɩkɩ mlɩ aba ɛ́ klɛ́.
Mlɩ fɛ́ɛ́ mlɩtsia wankláán. Mlɩmátsu ɩwɩ. Mlɩpʋ ɩwɩ manta ahá ánɩ́ ahá bʋtamabú amʋ́. Mlɩmákɩ mlɩ ɩwɩ ánɩ́ mlɩdʋn akʋ.
Mlɩlɛ ɔnsɩpɛkpan, olu pʋ́ ɔblɔ́kpán, ɩtrɛ́, isia pʋ́ lakpan kugyíkʋ agywɩɩn lɛ mlɩtɔ.
Bulu lɔ́pʋ mʋ asʋ́n wankláán ámʋ wá mɩ́ ɩbɩtɔ, ánɩ́ ndáa mʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ ɔkan suna mlɩ, ampʋsum ɔpasua ámʋ.
Mʋ nwun pʋ́ mʋ imi fɛ́ɛ́ lofulí fɛ́ opuli mpútɔ́ ntɛ́ɛ ɔhráda. Mʋ ansíbi aklambi ɛ́ lɔwankɩ́ fɛ́ ogyá mpɩmpɩ.
Ɩ́nɩ fɛ́ɛ́ bɔ́wa labi há mlɩ, mɛ́nɩ nɩ́ Bulu hɩ́ɛ́ ɔdɛ awɩtɔlɛ wa, kpá ahá ɔdʋdʋɔ ba Kristo wá á, bɛ́hɩɛ dá mʋ ɩpán, wá mʋ numnyam.
Ɔhá ánɩ́ ogyi mɩ́ ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ, nu mɩ́ obugya tsie mɩtɔ, mɩ́ ɛ́ ntsie mʋtɔ.
Marta lótsulá mʋ́sʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Ee! Mɩ́ Wíe, nahogyi ánɩ́ fʋ́gyí Kristo, (ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu ladá mʋ ofúli), Bulu mʋ Bi ámʋ́ʋ́ bɛɛ ɔbɛ́ba ɔyɩ́tɔ́ ámʋ nɩ.”
Ahógyipʋ amʋ bɛlɛ ansɩ́ kɩ́tá sumbí ayɔpʋ́ ámʋ atosunáhɛ́, amʋ́ ɩkʋlɛbwɛ tógyítɔ́tɔ́, ɔpasua ámʋtɔ atogyihɛtɔ yée pʋ́ mpáɩbɔtɔ́.
Yilébwɛ fʋtekle. Fʋtekísí lalahɛ fɛ́ɛ́. Mʋ́ sʋ mɩ́, fʋ́ Wíe Bulu nalɛ́ fʋ́, dá fʋ́ ofúli. Napʋ́ ansigyí wá fʋ́tɔ́ dʋn fʋ́ aba.”
Ɔlɛha bɛtɩn Yohane mʋ pio Yakobo ɔdayítɔ́.
Asʋ́n ánɩ́ ɩma asɩ, imosuná Bulusúm mádalɩ fʋ́ ɔnɔ́, tsúfɛ́ ɩtɛhá ɔha mʋa Bulunyɔ nsɩnɛ́ tɔwá ɩfɔ́.
Ɔhá ánɩ́ otolú mʋ ba gyí ahá ɔmɔpʋ́. Mlɩyin ánɩ́ ahá ɔmɔpʋ́ ɔkʋkʋ má nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá.

Brɛ́á begyi nyankɩ atogyihɛ amʋ tá á, Yesu lɛ́fɩtɛ́ Simon Petro ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Yohane mʋ bi Simon, fʋtɔdwɛ́ mɩ́ dʋn fʋ́ aba ánfɩ lóó?” Petro lɛ́lɛ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Ee, mɩ́ Wíé, fʋyin ánɩ́ ntɔdwɛ́ fʋ́.” Yesu lɛ́bláa mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Kɩ mɩ́ akúfabi amʋsʋ.”
Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ tɛhá ɔkʋ tɔpʋ́ nyánsa tɔ́ɩ́ kplá ahá, ɔtɛhá ɔkʋ ɛ́ tɛbɩ́ asʋ́n.
Beyinkí yɔ́ otse nyɔɔsɩ a, Yosef lɛ́lɛ ɩwɩ ɔwan súná amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, mʋgyí amʋ́ gyama Yosef nɩ. Ɩ́nɩ sʋ Egyipte owíe ɛ́ lɛ́bɩ Yosef abusuan.
Bɔwanlɩ́n wá Bulu asʋ́n ámʋtɔ bɛɛ, “Nɩ́ ɔkʋ déklé ɔbɛ́ɛ, mʋ tsiátɔ́ ɩwá alɛ́, otsia ansigyítɔ́ a, mʋ́mʋ́ osíi ahá ɩwɩ asʋn laláhɛ blɩ́, osi afunu wa.
Ahógyipʋ amʋ fɛ́ɛ́ bɔpʋ klʋn kʋlɛ mʋ́a agywɩɩn kʋlɛ tsíá. Ɔkʋkʋ mɛ́blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ tɔ́á mʋbʋ igyi mʋ nkʋlɛ klɛ́. Mboún okugyíɔkʋ atɔ́ lɔbwɛ amʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ klɛ́.
Tsúfɛ́ asʋ́n ánɩ́ ɩhɩ́ɛ́ dehián bɔpʋhá mɩ́ nɔpʋba mlɩ ígyi. Mʋ́gyí, Kristo lóbowu anɩ lakpan sʋ, fɛ́ alɩá Bulu asʋn wanlɩ́nhɛ́ amʋ lɛ́blɩ́.
“Babilon brɔnʋsʋ Bulu ɔnɔ́sʋ́ atɔɩ́pʋ́ amʋ obugya ibun. Mʋlɔ́mɔ Bulu ahá ɔyɩ́tɔ́ fɛ́ɛ́ nɩ́.”
Brɛ́á ɔmá bámbásʋ́fɔ ámʋ bonu asʋ́n ánfɩ á, ansɩ́ legyi amʋ́, bɛ́kanfʋ́ anɩ Wíe asʋ́n ámʋ. Ɩnʋ ahá ánɩ́ Bulu lalɛ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, bʋnyáa nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá bɔhɔ asʋ́n ámʋsʋ gyi.
Ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔdɛ ntobí ánfɩ ɩwɩ adánsɩɛ gyí ɔnɔkwalɩsʋ ámʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Ee! Ɩmɔ́ɔwa ɔpá nɛ́ba!” Amen! Owíe Yesu, ba!
Mlɩyɔ mʋ́sʋ́ amlɩpʋ ntobí ánfɩ nasúná mlɩ ánfɩ, mʋ́á mlɩlónu tsú mɩ́ wá pʋ́ mʋ́a mlɩlówun mɩ nɔbwɛ fɛ́ɛ́ wa mlɩ tsiátɔ́, mɛ́nɩ Bulu ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔtɛhá iwilwii amʋ ɔbɛ́kpa mlɩ.
Támɛ mlɩmálu mʋ, mboún mlɩtɔɩ kpla mʋ fɛ́ mlɩ píó.

Mlɩmáha ɔkpa ɔhaa ɔmlɛ mlɩ, pʋ mʋ ansɩtɩ́ɩn mʋ́a afunu asʋ́n ánɩ́ igyi amándɩ́ɛ́á anyánkpʋ́sa bɔwa kʋkʋ, itsú ɔŋɛ́ ntɛ́ɛ túmiá ɩdɛ ɔyɩ́ ánfɩsʋ gyí, imotsú Kristo wá bɛha amlɩmli mʋ nkpábi.
Mʋlótsulá bɔmɔ mʋ anɩ sʋ, mɛ́nɩ ɔbɛ́lɛ anɩ tsú lakpan kugyíkʋtɔ. Ɔtɩn anɩ ɩwɩ, pʋ anɩ bwɛ mʋ onutó ahá, anɩ ansɩ́ ɩpɛ yilébwɛsʋ.

“Ɔnɔkwalɩ ndɛ mlɩ bláa mbɛ́ɛ, ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ otonú mɩ́ asʋ́n, ɔtɔhɔ ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɔwa mɩ́ sɩ́sɩ́ ámʋ gyi, bʋ nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá. Bulu méegyi mʋ asʋ́n, há mʋ pɔ́n, tsúfɛ́ aladálɩ lowutɔ ba nkpatɔ dodo.
Bulu-ɔbɔpʋ amʋ́ʋ́ ɔdɛ mɩ́ asʋ́n bláa amʋ dɛ́ sika pɛpɛ oyíá bʋtɔpʋ́súsu atɔ́. Ɔbɔ́pʋsúsu wúlu amʋ, mʋ́ abuntíi pʋ́ aklʋn ánɩ́ ilobomlí mʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́.
Ahá ánfɩ bɛ́hɩ. Amʋ́ apu gyí amʋ́ Bulu. Amʋ́ numnyam ɛ́ gyí pɛ́lɩ. Ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ atɔ́ ɩwɩ pɛ́ bʋtosúsu.
Ɔmábwɛ ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔlɛdamlí klʋntɔ mɔkʋ́wá ɔpá. Nɩ́ megyí alɩ á, ɩbɛ́ha mʋ obótsu ɩwɩ, Bulu ɔbɛ́bɩtɩ́ mʋ ɩsʋ fɛ́ Ɔbʋnsám.

Apíó adwɛpʋ́, tɛkɩ nahɩ́ɛ́ bwɛ́ agywɩɩn ánɩ́ nɔ́wanlɩ́n mlɩ ɔwʋlʋ́ tsú nkpa ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lahɔ mɩ́a mlɩnyɔ ámʋ ɩwɩ. Támɛ ilehián ánɩ́ nɔ́wanlɩ́n kókóli mlɩ, amlɩprɩ hógyi amʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lapʋ́há mʋ ahá ɔtsáwʋlɛ pɛ́ ámʋ nwun.
Ɔblɔ́ lɛkɩtá ahandɛ anfɩ. Tsúfɛ́ sumbí ayɔpʋ́ ámʋ bʋdɛ ahá ámʋ atɔ́ suná bɛɛ, Yesu lawú kʋ́sʋ́ tsú afúlitɔ. Mʋ́ sʋ wukʋ́sʋ́ bʋ ɩnʋ há ɔhagyíɔha.
Tsúfɛ́ mʋ lakpan lawɔ nwʋlʋ́táa. Mʋ́ sʋ Bulu lakáɩ́n mʋ́sʋ́.
Yesu lɛ́trá yinkí yɔ́ Galilea ɔmátɔ́, Kana wúlutɔ, ɔtɩ́nɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɛdamlí ntsu bwɛ́ ntá ámʋ. Ɔmá ɔhandɛ ɔkʋ tsie Kapernaum wúlutɔ. Ɔbʋ obi yinhɛ́ ɔkʋá ɔda ɔdɛlɔ.
Mlɩmáha mlɩ nsiwa bwɛ́ atɔ́ ɔnɔ́ ɩba asɩ. Mlɩha Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ ɔwa mlɩ ɔwʋnlɩ́n, amlɩsum anɩ Wíe.
Ɩbʋ mʋ́tɔ́ ánɩ́ mlɩmɔ́kʋ́wun Yesu kɩ, támɛ mlɩtɔdwɛ́ mʋ. Mlɩmɛ́dɛ́ mʋ wúun mʋ́, támɛ mlɩdɛ́ mʋsʋ hógyi. Ɩ́nɩ sʋ ansigyí kpɔnkpɔɔnkpɔntɩ ánɩ́ ɔnɔ́ mɛ́ɛtalɩ́ blɩ́ labʋ́lá mlɩtɔ.
Bulu lapʋ́ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ há anɩ. Mʋ́ sʋ anɩlabɩ́ ánɩ́ anɩa mʋnyɔ anɩlabwɛ́ kʋlɛ, ɔbʋ anɩ klʋntɔ.
Onuwé kʋ tsie ɩnʋ, ntá ɔdáɩ ɩbɔ mʋ́. Ɩsá akɔpʋ́ ámʋ bɔpʋ ɔsapɔ dá ntá ámʋtɔ pʋ́síán oyísʋ́, tsú mʋ́ fʋ́á yétin mʋ ɔnɔ́.
Tsúfɛ́ mʋlálɛ́ anɩ tsú ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔdɛ oklúnsʋ gyí amʋ túmi asɩ, pʋ́ anɩ ba mʋ Bi ɔdwɛpʋ́ ámʋ iwíegyí amʋtɔ.

Apíó, nokókóli mlɩ, mlɩkɩ wankláán, mɛ́nɩ mlɛ́talɩ́ wun ahá ánɩ́ bʋbʋ mlɩtɔ, bʋdɛ mlɩ dasáɩ́n. Alɩ ahá ámʋ bʋtɛhá ahá bʋtɛdɩda hógyitɔ. Amʋ́ atosunáhɛ́ tɛdá mʋ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ nosuná mlɩ ámʋ mɔ́. Mlɩkʋla ɩwɩ lɛ amʋ́sʋ́.
Nɩ́ ɔkʋ klɛ́ gyí mʋ aba ahógyipʋ bʋá a, ɔbʋ́a amʋ́. Nɩ́ ɔkʋ klɛ́ gyí atɔ́ suná á, osúna mʋ́.
“Alɩ ɛkɛ ámʋ a, mlɩmɛ́ɛtrá kʋlɩ́ mɩ́ tɔtɔɔtɔ. Ɔnɔkwalɩ ndɛ mlɩ bláa. Tógyítɔ́á mlɔ́kʋlɩ́ mɩ́ Sɩ́ mɩ́ ɩdátɔ́ a, ɔbɛ́ha mlɩ.
Bɔpʋ abwiá ɩbʋ bíá ɔtsan-ɔtsan dúanyɔ wá abuntíi amʋ ntswɩasɩ. Abwi ámʋ adá gyí, yaspa, safiri, agate, emerad.
Mʋ́ sʋ ɔhá ánɩ́ oyin ɩtɔ wankláán, támɛ ɔtamabwɛ́ á, ɔdɛ lakpan bwɛ.
Ɩnʋ ɔmɛ kʋ lɛlɩn tsú owíe obíá ámʋtɔ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mlɩ Bulu asúmpʋ́á mlɩtenyá mʋ ifú, nyebí ahandɛ fɛ́ɛ́, mlɩkanfʋ anɩ Bulu ámʋ!”
Tsúfɛ́ séi kʋ́ráá ɩdɛ anɩ ipian ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ-ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ anfɩtɔ. Anɩhɩ́ɛ́ anɩgyó ɛkɛá ɔbɔ́pʋ anɩ ɔsʋ́sʋ́-ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ wá anɩ fɛ́ atadɩɛ.
Mlɩkapʋ mlɩ onutó tsiátɔ́ kɩ. Nɩ́ ɩbʋ alɛ́ á, mʋ́mʋ́ mlɛ́talɩ́ pʋ́ ɩbɩ sí kántɔ́ mlɩ bwɛhɛ́ sʋ, mlɩmɔ́ɔpʋ kápʋ́ ɔha bambá klɛ́.
Nɩ́ oyin ɔfɩ́tɛ́ ɔtsɩsʋ, owun ánɩ́ ɔmɛ́ɛtalɩ́ kɩ́tá ɩwɩ, ɔtsɩ ámʋ ɛ́ déklé ɔdan tsʋn a, ɔyɛ́kpaɩ́n mʋ. Megyí lakpan igyi.
Yudafɔ ahandɛ bégya mlɩ lɛ́ amʋ́ ofíakpa. Brɛ́ kʋ kʋ́ráá ɩbɛ́ba ánɩ́ ahá bɔ́mɔ mlɩ, súsu bɛɛ Bulu agyʋ́má bʋdɛyɔ.
Ɩnʋ nowun osúna bámbá kʋá ɩbʋ ifú, ɩbʋ wánwan ɔsʋ́sʋ́. Nowun ánɩ́ Bulu-abɔpʋ asienɔ́ bʋdɛ asʋn wunhɛ asienɔ́ ánɩ́ Bulu ɔbɔ́pʋbɩ́tɩ́ ahá ɩsʋ asa ɩklʋntɔ bólwií mʋ.
Yesu lɛ́bláa mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Nɩ́ nablɩ́ asʋkpan á, lɛ mʋ́ blɩ́ ɔhagyíɔha onu. Támɛ nɩ́ ɔnɔkwalɩ nablɩ́ á, ntogyi sʋ fʋ́dɛ mɩ́ da?”

Mɩ́ agyʋ́máyɔbá onutó, ndɛ fʋ́ ɛ́ kókoli mbɛ́ɛ, fʋtɔ́ɩ kpla amʋ́ abʋbwɛ kʋlɛ. Tsúfɛ́ bawá nsi tsá mɩ́a Klement pʋ́ atráhɛ amʋ anɩladá asʋn wankláán ámʋ ɔkan. Bulu lawánlɩ́n amʋ́ adá wá nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá atsiápʋ́ ɔwʋlʋ́tɔ́.
Tsúfɛ́ bamɔ́ fʋ́ ɔnɔ́sʋ́ atɔɩ́pʋ́ pʋ́ fʋ́ ahá, tsɛ́ɩ́ amʋ́ obugya wʋ́lɩ́ ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ́ fahá bapʋ́ obugya há amʋ́ fɛɛ, bʋnúu nɩ. Ɩ́nɩ lɛ́kanáa ha amʋ́ nɩ́.”
Ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ! Igyi fɛ́ anɩlawú, mʋ́ sʋ lakpan ma túmi anɩsʋ. Ntogyi sʋ abɛ́trá tsiá bwɛ́ lakpan?
Owíe okwesɩ gyí ɔbwɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ oletsiá, ɔtráa ɔma ɩnʋ séi ámʋ. Abasíénɔ́ ámʋtɔ ɔkʋlɛ ogyi. Mʋ ɛ́ ɔbɛ́hɩ fɛ́ mʋ aba ámʋ.
Támɛ nkálɩ Bulu asʋn wanlɩ́nhɛ́ amʋ lɛ́blɩ́? Ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Gya ɔkpábi amʋ mʋa mʋ bi, tsúfɛ́ megyí ɔkpábi mʋ bi ámʋ mʋa ɔdɩ́hɩɛ mʋ bi ámʋ obégyi amʋ́ sɩ́ atɔ́.”
Ahá ánɩ́ bʋtekleá bʋnyáa atɔ́ á, ɩbwɛ́bwɛ́ɛ́bwɛ́ bʋtɛkpá wíé ɩsɔ́kɩ pʋ́ ayibitɔ. Amʋ́ mimlála tɛkpá amʋ́ yówie ɩwɩɔsɩn mʋ́a lalahɛtɔ, hɩ́ amʋ́.

Nsiebí dú ámʋ́ʋ́ fowun ɔbwɩ ámʋ nwunsʋ ámʋ ɛ́ ɩlɩɩ́ há awíe idú ánɩ́ mʋa amʋ́nyɔ bégyi iwíe. Amʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ bólu obu-ɔnɔ́ otsiápʋ́ ámʋ, swɩ́ɩ́ mʋ atɔ́ fɛ́ɛ́, lɛ́ mʋ yayá, wɩ́ mʋ aye, wá tráhɛ ogyá, ɩbɔ́hɔ plɩ́plɩ́plɩ́plɩ́.
Ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔtɔdwɛ́ Bulu á, Bulu ɛ́ yin mʋ.

Nkálɩ mɛɛ abɛ́blɩ́ pʋ́mɔ́ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́? Mʋ́ sʋ anɩ Yudafɔ anɩdʋn ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋmegyí Yudafɔ ámʋ lóó? Ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ! Anɩmɔ́dʋn amʋ́ ɔkpagyíɔkpasʋ. Nablɩ́ bɔtsʋn mbɛ́ɛ, ɩkʋlɛ Yudafɔ pʋ́ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋmegyí Yudafɔ ámʋ fɛ́ɛ́ bʋgyi. Tsúfɛ́ lakpan lagyi amʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́sʋ́.
Alɩ brɛ́ ámʋtɔ á, bɛblɩ́ sika pɛpɛ ɔnantswiebí pʋ́bwɛ́ ɔkpɩ, tsíá há mʋ́ igyí. Amʋ́ ansɩ́ legyi amʋ́ ɩbɩ ɔnɔ́ ɩtɔ bwɛhɛ́ ánfɩ ɩwɩ.

Anyánkpʋ́sa amʋ́ʋ́ besian ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ, bʋmowu asʋn wunhɛ amʋtɔ ámʋ fɛ́ɛ́ bekiná bʋmɛdamlí klʋntɔ. Bʋmesi ɔŋɛ laláhɛ mʋ́a atunkuá bapʋ́ sika pɛpɛ, sika futútú, kɔɔ́brɩ, abwi mʋ́a nyí aná bwɛ́ súm. Alɩ ɔŋɛ laláhɛ pʋ́ atunku anfɩ bʋtamawun atɔ́, bʋtamanú asʋ́n, bʋtamanátɩ́.
Anɩhɩ́ɛ́ anɩyin ánɩ́ ilehián ánɩ́ abénya anɩ Wíe ifú. Mʋ́ sʋ anɩdɛ́tɔɩ́ kplá ahá anɩaa, amʋ́ ɛ́ bʋnyáa mʋ ifú. Bulu hɩ́ɛ́ oyin anɩ. Nahogyi ánɩ́ mlɩ ɛ́ mlɩyin anɩ mlɩ klʋntɔ.

Lɛ́lɛ́ mʋ́ á, anɩ fɛ́ɛ́ anɩlétsiá amʋ́ atsiábi, bwɛ́ lalahɛá anɩ ɔwɔ́lɩ léklé. Anɩlóbuo tɔ́á anɩ ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ pʋ́ anɩ agywɩɩn létsiá súná anɩ. Tsiátɔ́ anfɩ sʋ́ tɛkɩ Bulu ɔbɛ́bɩtɩ́ anɩ ɩsʋ fɛ́ aha atráhɛ nɩ.
Petro lɛ́blɩ́ asʋ́n tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ, pʋ́tɔ́ɩ́ kplá amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mlɩlɛ mlɩ ɩwɩ tsu ndɛmba-abí laláhɛ anfɩtɔ.”
Tsúfɛ́ nɩ́ mletsíá mlɩ tsiátɔ́ dada amʋtɔ á, mlówu tsítsá. Támɛ nɩ́ mlɔtsʋn Bulu Ɔŋɛ́ ámʋsʋ kíná mlɩ nyankpʋsa-oyí ámʋ apɛ́ bwɛ á, mlétsiá nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá.
Alɩ kɛ́n Bulu asʋn wanlɩ́nhɛ́ amʋ lɛ́blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Pɛ́lɩ mɛ́ɛkɩtá ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔlɔhɔ mʋ gyi ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ” nɩ́.
Gyankpapʋ a, nna Yesu Kristosʋ ndɛ mɩ́ Bulu ɩpán da mlɩtɔ okugyíɔkʋ nwunsʋ. Tsúfɛ́ mlɩ Kristo hógyi sʋ mlɩ dá dɛ ɔyɩ́tɔ́ fɛ́ɛ́.
Apíó, anɩyin ánɩ́ Bulu tɔdwɛ́ mlɩ, alalɛ́ mlɩ pʋ́bwɛ́ mʋ klɛ.
Mʋ́á ɩdʋn mʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ gyí, mlɩdwɛ aba tsu mlɩ klʋntɔ. Tsúfɛ́ ɔdwɛ ánfɩ odu ɔbɛ́ha mlɛ́talɩ́ sí ahá lakpan kíé amʋ́ nɩ́.

Brɛ́á bɛblɩ́ alɩ tá á, bɛkɩtá agywɩɩn bɛɛ, abɔ́tsʋn ɔpʋsʋ yɔ́ Italia ɔmátɔ́. Bɔpʋ Paulo mʋa obu adɩpʋ́ akʋ ɛ́ wá Romafɔ ɩsá akɔpʋ́ ɔhandɛ ɔkʋá bʋtɛtɩ́ mʋ Yulio ɩbɩtɔ. Ɔhandɛ anfɩ bʋ Roma Owíe Dɛhɛn Augusto ɩsá akɔpʋ́ ɔpasuatɔ.
Bʋdɛ Bulu osúmbi Mose mʋa Okúfabi amʋ ɩlʋ wa bɛɛ, “Anɩ Wíe Otúmípʋ, fʋ́ bwɛhɛ́ bʋ ifú, ɩbʋ wánwan. Fʋ́ bwɛhɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́ igyi ɔnɔkwalɩ, ɩda ɔkpa. Owíeá mʋ iwíegyí tamamɔ́ ɔnɔ́.

Mlɩbwɛ mlɩ ɩwɩ fɛ́ nyebí bɔbwɛ, amlɩha Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩlɛtɩn, tɔtɔ mɛfráa mʋ́tɔ́ ámʋ ɩdɩnka mlɩ ɔwɔ́lɩ brégyíbrɛ́, fɛ́ alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ nyɔ́pʋ-ntsu tɛdɩ́nká nyebí ɔwɔ́lɩ amʋ. Mɛ́nɩ ɩbɛ́ha mlɛ́dan, nyá nkpahɔ́ɔ tsú Bulu wá.

Ɩnʋ nonu ɔmɛ kʋ lótsu ɔsʋ́sʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Wanlɩn tswɩ fɛɛ, ‘Ansɩ́ bégyi ahá ánɩ́ bówu anɩ Wíe agyʋ́mátɔ́ tsú séi pʋ́ya!’ ” Bulu Ɔŋɛ́ ámʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Ee, ɩbʋ mʋ́tɔ́. Ansɩ́ bégyi amʋ́ lɛ́lɛ́. Bɛ́da ɔkpʋ́nʋ́ tsú amʋ́ ipian fɛ́ɛ́tɔ́, tsúfɛ́ amʋ́ bwɛhɛ́ wankláán bóbuo amʋ́.”
Bulusúm oduá mʋ́ ɩwɩ lɛtɩn, asʋansʋ ma mʋ́ ɩwɩ, anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu tekle gyí, mlɛ́kɩ awumbi mʋ́a asʋrapʋsʋ amʋ́ ɩkplántɔ. Mlɛ́kɩ ánɩ́ ɔyɩ́ ánfɩtɔ lakpanbwɛ ɛ́ iméegyi mlɩsʋ.
Ndɛ mlɩ asʋ́n ánfɩ bláa, mɛ́nɩ ɔhaa mɔ́ɔpʋ asʋ́n ánɩ́ ɩbʋ anulɛ́ kʋkʋ bɛmlɛ́ mlɩ.

Ɩnʋ nonu atɔ́á Bulu lɔ́bwɛ fɛ́ɛ́ ɔmɛ. Mʋ́á ɩbʋ ɔsʋ́ mʋ́a asɩ, ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ ayasɩ pʋ́ ɔpʋtɔ fɛ́ɛ́, bʋdɛ ɩlʋ wa bɛɛ, “Kanfʋ́, ɩdayilé, numnyam pʋ́ túmi fɛ́ɛ́ iletsiá ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ otsie owíe obíásʋ́ amʋ pʋ́ Okúfabi amʋ brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́!”
Bulu-ɔbɔpʋ nyɔɔsɩ lɔ́fʋlɩ́ mʋ ɔkpɛ. Ɩnʋ bɔtswɩ tɔkʋ fɛ́ ɩbʋ kpɔnkpɔntɩá ɩdɛhɔ́ɔ wá ɔpʋtɔ, ɔpʋtɔ yée asatɔ ɩkʋlɛ lɛdamlí obugya.
bɛbɩtɩ́a mʋ dalɩ wúlu amʋtɔ bɛyɛ́da mʋ abwi mɔ́. Adansɩfɔ ámʋ bɔwɔɩ́ amʋ́ awunso atadɩɛ tswɩ ɔyasubi ɔkʋá bʋtɛtɩ́ mʋ Saulo wá.
Bɛtrá wanlɩ́n bɛɛ, “Ahá ánɩ́ mlɩmégyí Yudafɔ fɛ́ɛ́, mlɩkanfʋ anɩ Wíe Bulu. Ɔmá fɛ́ɛ́ abí, mlɩkanfʋ mʋ.”
Bulu lɔ́bwɛ tógyítɔ́. Mʋbʋ́ tógyítɔ́. Tógyítɔ́ bʋ ɩnʋ há mʋ. Kanfʋ́ ɩbwɛ́ɛ mʋ klɛ brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́tɔ́. Amen!
Ɔyɩ kɛhɛ a, Yohane lówun ánɩ́ Yesu ná ɔbá mʋ wá. Mʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɛbláa ahá ámʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mlɩkɩ, Bulu Okúfabi amʋ ɔbá á. Mʋsʋ́ Bulu tɔtsʋn sí ɔyɩ́tɔ́ ahá lakpan kíé amʋ́ nɩ́!
Hógyi lɛ́ha obu-ɔnɔ́ otsiápʋ́ Rahab mówu tsɩ́a ahá ánɩ́ bʋmɔhɔ Bulu gyitɔ. Tsúfɛ́ ɔlɔhɔ Israelfɔ ansɩ́ awakɩpʋ afɔɔ́ wankláán.
Owikplu agywɩɩn gyí, ɔbá bowi, ɔmɔ, oyinta atɔ́. Mɩ́ mʋ́ nɛba, mɛ́nɩ ahá bénya nkpa ánɩ́ ɩlɔfʋn.
Támɛ anɩ mʋ́ á, ɔsʋ́sʋ́ gyí anɩ otsiákpá. Ɔtɩ́nɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ anɩdɛ́ anɩ Ɔhɔ́pʋ, ogyi anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo ɔkpa kɩ́ɩ ánɩ́ obótsu ba amʋ.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ mlɩhɔ aba atúu fɛ́ alɩá Kristo lɔ́hɔ mlɩ, mɛ́nɩ ɩbɔ́wa Bulu numnyam.

Kpa amʋ́ ya, amlɩyɔgyʋráa ɩwɩ. Ka amʋ́ atɔ yintáhɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́ ɩkɔ, mɛ́nɩ bɛ́kpa amʋ́ nwun. Ɩ́nɩ ɔbɛ́ha ahá fɛ́ɛ́ bɛ́bɩ ánɩ́ fʋtegyi Mose mbla ámʋsʋ. Ɩ́nɩ sʋ fʋ́ ɩwɩ asʋ́n ámʋ́ʋ́ bonu ámʋ ɩma mʋ́tɔ́.
Ogyi keté atɩ́npʋ amʋ ɛ́ ɔsɩ́. Tsúfɛ́ megyí amʋ́ ketétɩ́ɩn sʋ, mboún amʋ́ Buluhógyi sʋ. Fɛ́ alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ Abraham lɔ́hɔ Bulu gyi asa bɛtɩn mʋ keté ámʋ.
Mʋ́ʋ́ bɛkapʋ́ atɔ́ amʋ́ abanyɔ́ nwunsʋ. Ileyi Matiasʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ bɔpʋ mʋ wá sumbí ayɔpʋ́ dúɔkʋn ámʋtɔ, bɛlabwɛ́ dúanyɔ.
“Bulu layúlá ahá ánɩ́ alasí amʋ́ lakpan kíé amʋ́, alagyʋ́ra amʋ́!
Amʋ́gyí nfɔ-nyí anyɔ pʋ́ ɔkandɩ́ɛ-nyí anyɔ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩlɩɩ́ Bulu, ogyi ɔyɩ́ fɛ́ɛ́sʋ́ ogyípʋ́ amʋ ansɩ́tɔ́ nɩ́.
Mlɩsu, amlɩha mlɩ ɩwɩ ɩwa mlɩ nwɛ, mlɩ lakpan sʋ. Mlɩ mɔ́sɩ ɩdámli isú, mlɩ ansigyí imli pɛ́lɩ.
Mɩ́ adwɛpʋ́, mlɩmákasɩ́ mʋ bwɛhɛ́ laláhɛ anfɩ. Mboún mlɩkasɩ yilé abwɛpʋ́ ámʋ bwɛhɛ́. Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔtɔbwɛ́ yilé á, Bulu mʋ bi ógyi, támɛ ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔtɔbwɛ́ lalahɛ mʋ́ méyín Bulu.

Ɔma-ɔma asa ɔlɛbɛtɩn keté pʋ́hɩ́ɛ mʋ nsʋ. Ilosuná ánɩ́ mʋ hógyi sʋ́ Bulu lótsu mʋ ánɩ́ mʋ asʋ́n da ɔkpa. Ɩ́nɩ sʋ ogyi fɛ́ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋmɛtɩn keté, támɛ bɔhɔ Bulu gyi, Bulu lótsu amʋ́ ánɩ́ amʋ́ asʋ́n da ɔkpa ámʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ ogyi amʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ ɔsɩ́ nɩ́.
Tsúfɛ́ nɩ́ ɔha owú á, ɔtamatráa bwɛ lakpan. Lakpan má mʋsʋ túmi.
Anɩlatsúlá ɩdɛ anɩ ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ anfɩ ipian brégyíbrɛ́, anɩdéwu fɛ́ Yesu, mɛ́nɩ mʋ nkpa ámʋ ɩbɛ́lɩn ɔwan anɩtɔ.
Tsúfɛ́ atráhɛ amʋ fɛ́ɛ́ bʋdɛ amʋ́ onutó klɛ́ kɩ́ɩ, megyí Yesu Kristo klɛ́.
Hógyi lɛ́ha Abraham mʋa mʋ ka Sara benya obí kwɩ́ɩ́. Ɩbʋ mʋ́tɔ́ ánɩ́ badan tsʋn ɩkwɩ́ɩsʋ, Sara ɛ́ ménya ɩkwɩ́ɩ. Abraham lóhogyi ánɩ́ Bulu obégyi tɔ́á alahɩ́ɛ́ yáɩ́sʋ́.
Tɔ́á ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɔwa mɩ́ sɩ́sɩ́ ámʋ déklé gyí, ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɔpʋhá mɩ́ ámʋtɔ ɔkʋkʋ mádalɩ mɩ́ ɩbɩ. Mboún nkʋ́sʋa amʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ tsu afúlitɔ ɛkɛ tráhɛ amʋ.

anɩ mʋ́ anɩyin ánɩ́ Bulu ɔkʋlɛ pɛ́ bʋ ɩnʋ. Mʋgyí anɩ Sɩ́, ɔsʋ́ mʋ́a asɩ Ɔbwɛpʋ́. Mʋ anɩtsie nkpa há. Anɩ Wíe ɔkʋlɛ pɛ́ ɛ́ bʋ ɩnʋ. Mʋgyí Yesu Kristo. Mʋsʋ Bulu lɔ́tsʋn bwɛ tógyítɔ́. Mʋ kɛ́n sʋ anɩtsie nkpa nɩ́.

Timoteo layínkí pʋ́ asʋn wankláán tsúa mlɩ wá ba anɩ séi, tsú mlɩ hógyi pʋ́ mlɩ abadwɛ ɩwɩ. Alabláa anɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ, mlɩ ɛ́ mlɩdɛ́ anɩsʋ kaɩ́n dʋbɩ. Mlɩdékléá mlówun anɩ, fɛ́ alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ anɩ ɛ́ anɩdékléá abówun mlɩ ámʋ.
mɛ́nɩ ɛkɛá Kristo, ogyi akúfa akpapʋ́ Owíe amʋ ɔbá á, ɔbɛ́ha mlɩ ɩsʋgyí-ɩpa ánɩ́ ɩbʋ numnyam, ɩmɛ́ɛkpa ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ.
Anɩ ansɩ́ dɩn ntam pɔpwɛ anfɩsʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ anɩbʋ ɔkpa tɔ́ɩ́ faan.

Afunu atɔ́ asunápʋ́ anfɩ bʋgyi fɛ́ pututɔ-mbwɩá bʋma agywɩɩn. Bʋtɔkwɩ́ɩ́ amʋ́ kɛkɛ, ahá bʋtɛkɩ́tá amʋ́, mɔ́ amʋ́. Bʋtɛblɩ́ asʋn laláhɛ tsú tɔ́á bʋmonu mʋ́ asɩ ɩwɩ. Amʋ́ lalahɛbwɛ bɛ́hɩ amʋ́ fɛ́ pututɔ-mbwɩ.
Megyí ahiánfɔ nwewúun sʋ Yuda dɛ́ asʋ́n ánfɩ blɩ́. Owikplu ógyi sʋ. Mʋ wá sika okentebi bʋ, otetsíá wí kʋ lɛ́ mʋ́tɔ́.
Mʋ́ sʋ anɩyin ɔdwɛá Bulu bʋ ha anɩ, anɩlɔ́hɔ mʋ́sʋ́ gyí. Bulu gyí ɔdwɛ. Mʋ́ sʋ nɩ́ ɔkʋ tɔdwɛ́ Bulu pʋ́ mʋ aba á, ɔbʋ Bulutɔ, Bulu ɛ́ bʋ mʋtɔ.
Stefano lowu ɔma a, bɛdɩnká ahógyipʋ amʋsʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ bɛdasáɩ́n yɔ́ Foinike mʋ́a Kipro ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ pʋ́ Antiokia wúlutɔ. Yudafɔ nkʋlɛ bɛbláa Bulu asʋn wankláán ámʋ.
Labi kpɔnkpɔntɩ bʋ Bulusúmtɔ́ nɩ́ tɔ́á anɩbʋ yaɩ́ legyi anɩ ansɩ́.
Bulu lɛ́ha mʋ ɔkpa ánɩ́ ɔkɔ́ɔ Bulu ahá, ogyi amʋ́sʋ́. Ɔlɛha mʋ ɔkpa ánɩ́ ogyíi iwíe abusuangyíabusuan, ɔblɩ́ɩgyíɔblɩ́ɩ, ɔmágyíɔmá pʋ́ ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ ahá ɔtsan-ɔtsan fɛ́ɛ́sʋ́.
Labi mɔmʋ ɩbʋ nɩ́ fatomi, badá fʋ́ fʋ́ lakpan sʋ? Kʋkʋ ɩma mʋ́tɔ́. Támɛ nɩ́ fɔbwɛ́ yilé asa fotomi bɛda fʋ́ á, Bulu ansɩ́ tegyi fʋ́ ɩwɩ.

Ɩ́nɩ sʋ Kristo gyí ntam pɔpwɛ ánɩ́ ɔbʋ Bulu mʋa anyánkpʋ́sa nsɩnɛ́ ɔma ɔlɩɩ́pʋ́, mɛ́nɩ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu latɩ́ ámʋ bénya atɔ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩtamayíntá, ɔlɛhɩɛ yáɩ́ há amʋ́ ámʋ. Tsúfɛ́ Kristo lowu ámʋ ɩlahá amʋ́ bagyi ɩwɩ tsú lakpan ámʋ́ʋ́ bɔbwɛ brɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋbʋ ntam gyankpapʋ amʋ asɩ ámʋtɔ.
Nkálɩ abɛ́blɩ́ séi? Ilehián ánɩ́ abɔ́yɔ anɩ lakpanbwɛsʋ, mɛ́nɩ Bulu awɩtɔlɛ bómoní tsɩ́a?
Mʋ́ ɔma a, ɩma alɛá mlɛ́blɩ́ asʋ́n ánɩ́ ɩbʋ pɛ́lɩ pʋ́ mʋ́á ɩma anulɛ́, ntɛ́ɛ wá ɔplɔɩkpan. Mboún mlɩda Bulu ɩpán brégyíbrɛ́.

Ɩnʋ nowun ɔpɔnkɔ ɔkʋá mʋ ɩwɩ igyi fɛ́ nsúó. Mʋsʋ ɔdɩnkápʋ́ amʋ ɩdá gyí Lowu. Afúlitɔ ɛ́ buo mʋ. Bɛha amʋ́ túmi ánɩ́ nɩ́ beye ɔyɩ́tɔ́ aku ana á, bʋmɔ́ɔ iku kʋlɛ. Bʋpʋ́ʋ ɔdayí ɩya anyɔ mʋ́a akʋ́n, ɩlɔ mʋ́a ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ mbwɩkɩ́tá-atɔ mɔ amʋ́.

Mʋ́ alɩ sʋ ɩna hógyisʋ ahá bɛ́talɩ́ nyá atɔ́á Bulu lɛ́hɩɛ yáɩ́ há amʋ́. Atokiehɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔbɔ́pʋhá Abraham abí-aná ámʋ ɩbɛ́da amʋ́ ɩbɩ. Megyí ahá ánɩ́ bʋtegyi mblasʋ nkʋlɛ bʋ́, támɛ ahá ánɩ́ bɔhɔ Bulu gyi fɛ́ Abraham ɛ́. Tsúfɛ́ Abraham gyí anɩ fɛ́ɛ́ ɔsɩ́.
Bɔyɔ mɩ́ asʋ́ntɔ́ á, tɛkɩ bekleá bési mɩ́, tsúfɛ́ bomowun tsitsa kʋkʋ mɩ́ ɩwɩ asa bɛɛ bʋmɔ́ɔ mɩ́.
Mʋ́ sʋ megyí ɔha apɛ́ ntɛ́ɛ mʋ nsiwa Bulu tɛkɩ. Mboún mʋ onutó nwewúun igyi.
Mlɩmáwa atsɩ mʋ́a ayin asʋ́n fɛ́ alɩá amʋ́tɔ́ akʋ bɔbwɛ, ɩlɛha amʋ́tɔ́ mpɩ́m adʋanyɔ-sa (23,000) benya lowu ɛkɛwʋ́lɛ.
Támɛ ntowun ánɩ́ mbla kʋ dɛ́ mbla ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩbʋ mɩ́ klʋntɔ ámʋ ɩsá kɔ, gyi mʋ́sʋ́, bwɛ́ mɩ́ lakpan ɔkpábi. Ɩlahá lakpan ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩbʋ mɩtɔ ámʋ ɩdɛ mɩ́ bwɛhɛ́ kugyíkʋsʋ gyí.

Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩmátrá bɩtɩ́a anɩ ayabi ya ɔma. Mlɩha akasɩ mʋ́á ɩbɛ́ha anɩ abɔ́yɔ nkpá, asi Kristo ɩwɩ atosunáhɛ́ gyankpapʋ amʋtɔ plá laplá. Mehián ánɩ́ abɛ́trá suná atɔ́ tsú Bulu hógyi pʋ́ klʋntɔdamlí tsú bwɛhɛ́á ɩtɛtɩ́ lowu ɩwɩ,
Mlɩmáha ɔhaa ɔkɩ mʋ ansɩ́tɔ́ kótíkótí. Mlɩsi mʋ ɔkpa wankláán oyinki bɔtʋ mɩ́, tsúfɛ́ ntsie ngyo mʋa anɩ apíó atráhɛ amʋ.
Apíó aba, nɩ́ ɔkʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, mɔhɔ Bulu gyi, támɛ mʋ bwɛhɛ́ mosuná alɩ á, labi mɔmʋ mʋ hógyi amʋ bʋ? Mʋ́ odu ɩbɛ́talɩ́ há mʋ ɔkláa obénya nkpa?
Yerusalemfɔ akʋ bɛfɩtɛ́ amʋ́ ɩwɩ bɛɛ, “Megyí oyin ánfɩ Yudafɔ ahandɛ bʋdedunká abʋmɔ nɩ́?
Ɩnʋ ɔlɔlʋn ɔŋɛ́ fʋ́ wʋ́lɩ́ amʋ́sʋ́, bláa amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mlɩhɔ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ.

Tsúfɛ́ bʋmeyín ɔkpa ánɩ́ Bulu tɔtsʋn mʋ́sʋ́ há ahá asʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ bɛyɩrɩ́ ɩwɩ bʋdɛ amʋ́ ɔkpa dunká, mɛ́nɩ bégyi asʋ Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́. Mʋ́ alɩ sʋ bʋmɛba ɩwɩasɩ há ɔkpa ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu tɔtsʋn mʋ́sʋ́ há ahá asʋ ámʋ.

Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔlɔhɔ Bulu mʋ Bi ámʋ gyi lahɔ Bulu adánsɩɛ ánfɩsʋ gyi mʋ klʋntɔ. Alɩ kɛ́n ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔmɔhɔ Bulu adánsɩɛ ánfɩsʋ gyi dɛ́ mʋ afunutɔ wa nɩ́. Tsúfɛ́ ɔmɔhɔ adánsɩɛ ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu légyi tsu mʋ Bi ɩwɩ ámʋsʋ gyi.
Ɔnɔkwalɩ ndɛ mlɩ bláa. Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔlɔhɔ mɩ gyi a, ɔbɔ́bwɛ ɩtɔ́á ndɛbwɛ. Ɔbɔ́bwɛ mʋ́ dʋn mɩ́ klɛ́, tsúfɛ́ mɩ́ mʋ́ nɔyɔ́ mɩ́ Sɩ́ ámʋ wá.
Suna nkpábi ɛ́ abʋbu amʋ́ awíe ɔkpagyíɔkpasʋ. Bʋbwɛ́ɛ tógyítɔ́ igyi amʋ́ awíe amʋ ansɩ́. Bʋmátsiá lɛ́ amʋ́ asʋ́n ɔnɔ́.
Mlɩkɩ ánɩ́ mlɩtɔ ɔkʋkʋʋkʋ mɔ́ɔhʋlɩ́ɩ Bulu awɩtɔlɛ amʋ. Mlɩtɔ ɔkʋkʋ ɛ́ mási asʋ́n wá mʋ klʋntɔ, mɛ́nɩ ɔmɔ́ɔpʋ asʋ́n wá mlɩ nsɩnɛ́, iyinta mlɩtɔ akʋ.
Ɩ́nɩ fɛ́ɛ́ ɔma a, ilehián ánɩ́ ahá ánɩ́ bʋma ɔpasua ámʋtɔ kʋ́ráá bɛ́tɩ mʋ ɩdayilé. Nɩ́ megyí alɩ á, ɔbɛ́kpa wíé Ɔbʋnsám yibitɔ sʋ́pa.
Kristo lɔ́wa awɩtɔlɛ ye atokiehɛ́ há anɩ fɛ́ɛ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, apʋ́yɔ mʋ agyʋ́má,
Ɔbɔpʋ nyɔɔsɩ lɛ́tsɛɩ́ mʋ klɛ wá ɔpʋtɔ. Ɔpʋ amʋ lémlí fɛ́ fúli obugya. Tógyítɔ́á ɔbʋ ɔpʋ amʋtɔ lówu.
Mlɩmábwɛ yilé amʋ́ ansɩ́tɔ́ alɩá bɛ́kanfʋ́ mlɩ sʋ. Támɛ fɛ́ Kristo nkpábi a, mlɩbwɛ atɔ́ tsu mlɩ klʋntɔ fɛ́ alɩá Bulu tekle.
Mlɩ klʋn máha mlɩ pɔ́n tɔtɔ ɩwɩ, mɛ́nɩ nɩ́ bʋdɛ asʋn laláhɛ blɩ́ tsú mlɩ tsiátɔ́ wankláán ámʋ́ʋ́ mlɩlɔ́pʋ mlɩbuo Kristo amʋ ɩwɩ á, pɛ́lɩ bɛ́kɩtá amʋ́.
Tɔ́á mɩ́ Sɩ́ ámʋ tekle gyí, ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ olowun mɩ́, mʋ Bi ánfɩ, hɔ mɩ gyi obénya nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá. Nɔ́kʋsʋ́a mʋ tsú afúlitɔ ɛkɛ tráhɛ amʋ.”
Ɩnʋnʋ Bulu-ɔbɔpʋ lɛ́da Herode, anyambi bɔwɩ mʋ, olowu. Tsúfɛ́ ɔmɔpʋ numnyam há Bulu.
Mlɩha akanfʋ Bulu. Mʋgyí anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo mʋ Sɩ pʋ́ mʋ Bulu. Mʋgyí anɩ Sɩ́á otowun anɩ nwɛ pʋ́ anɩ Buluá otolwíí anɩ klʋn ɔkpagyíɔkpasʋ!
Akʋ bʋmobuo alɩ ɔkpa ánfɩ. Mʋ́ sʋ bafwɩ́ yɔ́ bʋdɛ asʋ́n ánɩ́ ɩma asɩ blɩ́.
Bulu asʋn wankláán ámʋ ɩma mɩ́ pɛ́lɩ. Tsúfɛ́ mʋ́gyí Bulu túmi ánɩ́ ɔdɛpʋhɔ ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔlɔhɔ Kristo gyi nkpa nɩ́. Yudafɔ gyánkpá, asa ahá ánɩ́ bʋmegyí Yudafɔ bʋbuo.
Tsúfɛ́ ɔhaa mɛ́ɛtalɩ́ wá ntswɩasɩ bámbá dʋn mʋ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩda yaɩ́, igyi Yesu Kristo amʋ.
Mlɩ ɛ́ mlɩ asʋ́n igyi. Mʋ́ sʋ ntráa ndɛ mlɩ bláa mbɛ́ɛ, oyingyíoyin ɔdwɛ́ɛ mʋ ka fɛ́ mʋ onutó ɩwɩ, ɔtsɩ ɛ́ obu mʋ kulu.

Tɛkɩ mlɩ lakpan pʋ́ mlɩ tsiátɔ́ dada amʋ́ʋ́ bʋmɔkʋ́dɩ́nkɩ́ lɛ́ mlɩsʋ ámʋ sʋ mlɩlówu fɛ́ ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔmɔkʋ́tɩn keté. Támɛ séi á, Bulu lakʋ́sʋ́a anɩa Kristonyɔ ba nkpa pɔpwɛtɔ, alasí anɩ lakpan fɛ́ɛ́ kíé anɩ.
Mákiná Bulu atokiehɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɔpʋhá fʋ́ tsʋn mʋ ɔnɔ́sʋ́ atɔɩ́pʋ́sʋ, brɛ́á ɔpasua ahandɛ bɔpʋ ɩbɩ dɩ́nká fʋ́sʋ́ amʋ.
Ɩnʋ nowun ɔsʋ́sʋ́ mʋ́a ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ pɔpwɛ, tsúfɛ́ ɔsʋ́sʋ́ mʋ́a ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ gyankpapʋ amʋ ɩtráa ma ɩnʋ. Ɔpʋ ɛ́ ɩtráa ma ɩnʋ.
Ansɩ́ igyí mlɩ,
Ahá bódunká lowu nkɛ ámʋtɔ, támɛ bʋméenya. Bɔ́bɔ mbɔ́dɩ́ ánɩ́ bówu, támɛ bʋmóowu.
Anɩlóhogyi ánɩ́ Yesu lówu kʋ́sʋ́ tsú afúlitɔ. Alɩ kɛ́n anɩlóhogyi ánɩ́ Bulu ɔbɛ́kpa ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ bɔhɔ mʋ gyi asa bowu ámʋ ba nɩ.
Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ olohogyi, ɔlɛblɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ Yesu gyí Bulu mʋ Bi ámʋ a, Bulu bʋ mʋtɔ, mʋ ɛ́ ɔbʋ Bulutɔ.
Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩsi mlɩ tsiátɔ́ dada amʋ́ʋ́ mlɩlétsiá ámʋ. Mlɩ ɔwɔ́lɩ laláhɛ lɛ́mlɛ́ mlɩ alɩ brɛ́ ámʋtɔ, ɩlɛha mlɩ tsiátɔ́ leyintá.
Mɩ́gyí akúfa ɩban ámʋ ɔnɔ́ nɩ́. Nɩ́ ɔkʋ ɔtsʋn mɩtɔ wíé dálɩ a, tɔtɔ mɔ́ɔbwɛ mʋ́. Obéyénya atɔ́ gyí mwɛ.

Bɛda amʋ́tɔ́ akʋ abwi mɔ́, pʋ́ sáa bɔ́ɩ́ akʋtɔ, akʋ ɛ́ besin ɔdayí ɔnɔ́. Amʋ́ akʋ ɛ́ bɛdɩ akúfa mʋ́a akpaláa nwʋlʋ́-kpákpátɔ́ nátɩ́ kí, akʋ bɛdɩ akʋ́n. Bɛdɩnká akʋsʋ, wá amʋ́ akʋ ɛ́ ɩwɩɔsɩntɔ.
Nɩ́ mlɩyin ánɩ́ yilé ɔbwɛpʋ́ Yesu gyí á, mʋ́mʋ́ mlɩbɩ ánɩ́ yilé ɔbwɛpʋ́ Bulu mʋ bi okugyíɔkʋ gyí.
Tsúfɛ́ alɩ́ Bulu lɔ́wa anɩ nɩ́. Ɔbɛ́ɛ, ‘Napʋ́ fʋ́ bwɛ́ ɔkandɩ́ɛ há ɔmá bámbásʋ́fɔ. Ɔyɩ́tɔ́ ahá fɛ́ɛ́ bɔ́tsʋn fʋsʋ nyá nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá.’ ”

Anɩlakíná tɔ́á ɩbʋ pɛ́lɩ pʋ́ oklúntɔ atɔ́ fɛ́ɛ́. Anɩmɛ́dɛ́ ahá mlɛ́, anɩmɛ́dɛ́ Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ ɛ́ damlí bun. Mboún anɩdɛ́ ɔnɔkwalɩ amʋ onutó blɩ́ pʋ́lɛ́ ɩwɩ súná ahá fɛ́ɛ́, ɩwankɩ amʋ́ alɩá anɩgyí Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́.

Bulu lótsu Yesu ya ɔsʋ́sʋ́, há mʋ otsiákpá yilé mʋ gyɔpɩsʋ. Anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu lɔ́pʋ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ ánɩ́ ɔlɛhɩɛ yáɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, mɔ́pʋhá mʋ ahógyipʋ há mʋ. Ɔŋɛ́ ámʋ Yesu lapʋ́há anɩ á. Mʋ́ gyumagyihɛ mlɩdéwúun, mlɩdénu á.
Mlɩlalátsú tsiátɔ́ pɔpwɛ. Bulu gyí mʋ́ Ɔbwɛpʋ́, ɔdɛ mʋ́ bwɛ pɔ́pwɛ lɩan mʋ ɩwɩ brɛ́ ánfɩ mlɩdɛ́ mʋ bɩ ánfɩ.
Yesu lónu asʋ́n ámʋ a, ɔlɛblɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Megyí ɩlɔ ánfɩ ɔbɔ́mɔ mʋ, mboún ɩbɛ́lɛ Bulu numnyam ɔwan. Ɩbɔ́wa mɩ́ Bulu mʋ Bi ánfɩ ɛ́ numnyam.”

Tsúfɛ́ asʋn wankláán ámʋtɔ Bulu lɛ́lɛ alɩá ɔtɔbwɛ́ ɔha yilé ɔbwɛpʋ́ súná. Mʋ́ ɔsʋ́-asɩ fɛ́ɛ́ ɩlɩɩ́ hógyisʋ. Ɩ́nɩ Bulu asʋn wanlɩ́nhɛ́ amʋ lɛblɩ́ nɩ́. “Ɔhá ánɩ́ mʋ hógyi sʋ Bulu latsú mʋ ánɩ́ mʋ asʋ́n da ɔkpa obénya nkpa.”
Mʋ onutó olotsu mʋ oyikpalíhɛ dɩ́nká mʋ nkanta alɩɩ yéwie ɔtɩnɛkʋá bʋtɛtɩ́ ɩnʋ “Nwun Okokobi Otsiákpá.” (Bʋtɛtɩ́ ɩnʋ “Golgota” Hebri ɔblɩ́tɔ.)

Bulu atokiehɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɛha anɩ ámʋ ɩna ɔtsan-ɔtsan. Ilehián ánɩ́ anɩ fɛ́ɛ́ abɔ́pʋ mʋ atokiehɛ́ ámʋ yɔ́ agyʋ́má atɔ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɛha anɩ ámʋ ɔnɔ́. Mʋ́ sʋ nɩ́ ɔkʋ atokiehɛ́ gyí Bulu ɔnɔ́ asʋ́nblɩ́ á, ɔhá ámʋ ɔbwɛ́ɛ mʋ́ alɩá mʋ hógyi losuná mʋ.
Amʋ́tɔ́ ogyankpapʋ gyí fɛ́ gyatá. Onyɔɔsɩ gyí fɛ́ ɔnantswie yínhɛ́. Ɔsaasɩ ansɩ́tɔ́ igyi fɛ́ nyankpʋsa, ɔnaasɩ ɛ́ gyí fɛ́ oyitsu ánɩ́ odefulí.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ mlɩkɩ mlɩ tsiátɔ́ wankláán. Mlɩmátsiá nkpa fɛ́ aha mimláhɛ, mboún mlɩtsia fɛ́ atɩansɩpʋ.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ ɩmɛfáhʋn ánɩ́ Yudayin fʋgyi, ntɛ́ɛ fʋmegyí Yudayin. Tsúfɛ́ owíe ɔkʋlɛ pɛ́ asɩ amʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ bʋbʋ. Ɔbɔ́pʋ mʋ yilébwɛ gyi ahá ánɩ́ bosu kpolí mʋ fɛ́ɛ́ bʋalɛ.
Ɔnɔkwalɩ amʋ gyí, Kristo lɔ́mɔ Mose Mbla ámʋ fɛ́ɛ́ ɔnɔ́. Mʋ́ sʋ ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔlɔhɔ mʋ gyi obégyi asʋ Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́.
Tɔtɔ ɩmáhan mlɩ. Mboún kugyíkʋá igyi á, mlɩbɔ mpáɩ kokoli Bulu dɩnka mʋ́sʋ́, amlɩda mʋ ɩpán.
Ntobí ánfɩ ɩlɛba amʋ́sʋ́ ánfɩ fɛ́ɛ́ igyi atosuánhɛ há anɩ, mɛ́nɩ amʋ́ lalahɛ amʋ odu bwɛ mɛ́ɛdɩnká anɩ ɔwɔ́lɩ,
Mʋ́ʋ́ olefinkí ɩlán klúklúúklú ámʋ ɔnɔ́, ogyási lɛdalɩ mʋ́tɔ́ fɛ́ obuntɔ. Ogyási amʋ ɩlɛha nsaɩntɔ fɛ́ɛ́ ilebi tuun.
Mlɩtɔ ɔkʋkʋ másisíi mʋ ba, swɩ́ɩ́ mʋ mʋ ka. Tsúfɛ́ anɩ Wíe ɔbɛ́bɩtɩ́ ahá ánɩ́ bʋtɔbwɛ́ mʋ́ odu ɩsʋ. Anɩdɛ́ mlɩ ɔlá da, fɛ́ alɩá anɩlɔ́kʋ bláa mlɩ yáɩ́.
Mʋ́ sʋ nɩ́ ɔha mʋa Kristo bɔbwɛ́ ɩkʋlɛ a, alabwɛ́ ɔha pɔpwɛ. Mʋ tsiátɔ́ dada amʋ fɛ́ɛ́ ɩlatsʋn. Mʋ tsiátɔ́ labwɛ́ pɔ́pwɛ!
Tsúfɛ́ mɩ́ Sɩ́ tɔdwɛ́ mɩ́, otosúná mɩ́ ɩtɔ́á mʋ onutó ɔdɛbwɛ fɛ́ɛ́. Inn! Ɩbɔ́wa mlɩ wánwan ánɩ́ obósuná mɩ́ mʋ́á ɩdʋn alɩ.
Owikplu mátrá wi atɔ́. Ɔpʋ́ʋ mʋ ɩbɩ yɔ agyʋ́má, mɛ́nɩ obénya tɔkʋ kpá mʋ ɩwɩ, nyá ɩkʋ ɛ́ há ahá ánɩ́ bʋma kʋkʋ.
Mʋ́ ɔma a, bɔ mbɔ́dɩ́ afʋla ɔdɩkpa yaɩ mɩ́, tsúfɛ́ ndɛ ɔkpa kɩ́ɩá Bulu ɔbɔ́sɔ fʋ ɔnɔ́, nɛ́ba mlɩ wá.

Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩmáha atosunáhɛ́ ɔtsan-ɔtsan igyi mlɩ ansɩ́, ɩbɩtɩa mlɩ lɛ ɔkpa wankláán ámʋsʋ. Ɩbʋ alɛ́á mlɛ́ha Bulu ɔbɔ́wa awɩtɔlɛ há mlɩ ɔŋɛ́tɔ́ ɔwʋnlɩ́n, megyí atogyihɛ mbla, ánɩ́ ɩtamawá labi kʋkʋ há mʋ́sʋ́ agyípʋ́sʋ gyí.
Apíó, abwíí ɩpa há mlɩ, mlɩbu mlɩ ɔnɔ́ alɩɩ́pʋ́á bʋhɩ́ɛ́ bʋdɛ agyʋ́má yɔ mlɩtɔ, bʋdɛ mlɩ anɩ Wíe tsiátɔ́ suná.

Mʋ akwɩɩ́pʋ́ amʋ bʋdɛ Yudafɔ ahandɛ amʋ ifú nya. Mʋ́ sʋ bɛblɩ́ alɩ nɩ́. Tsúfɛ́ ahandɛ amʋ bablɩ́ tswɩ bɛɛ, ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔbɛ́blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, Yesu gyí Kristo, (ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu ladá mʋ ofúli amʋ) a, bégya mʋ lɛ́ Yudafɔ ofíakpa ɩnʋ.

Tsúfɛ́ anɩ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ anɩtɔpʋ́ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ súm Bulu ámʋ gyí keté atɩ́npʋ onutó nɩ́. Mʋ́ sʋ abɛ́talɩ́ tsú ɩwɩ ɩtɔ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ Kristo Yesu labwɛ́ há anɩ ámʋ sʋ. Anɩtamapʋ́ ansɩ́ dɩ́nká tɔ́á nyankpʋsa lapʋ́ ɩbɩ bwɛ́sʋ́.
Mbla ánɩ́ Bulu lɔ́wa há anɩ gyí, ahɔ́ɔ mʋ Bi Yesu Kristo gyi, adwɛ aba fɛ́ alɩá Yesu lɛ́bláa anɩ.
Ɩnʋ nɛtrá wun ɔbwɩ ɔkʋ ɛ́ lɔ́wɔ dalɩ ɔsʋlʋ́tɔ. Ɔbʋ nsiebí anyɔ fɛ́ okúfabi, támɛ ɔlɔtɔɩ́ fɛ́ bʋ́tɩ́.
Mɩ́ apíó, mlɩmábwɛ agywɩɩn fɛ́ nyebí. Mlɩbwɛ ɩwɩ fɛ́ kebi-bɔbwɛ lakpanbwɛtɔ, támɛ mlɩgywɩɩn fɛ́ ahandɛ.
Nɩ́ ɔkʋ dɛ́ ipian wúun mlɩtɔ á, okókoli Bulu. Nɩ́ ansɩ́ dɛ ɔkʋ gyí ɛ́ á, ɔwáa ɩlʋ kanfʋ Bulu.
Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩmáha abatɔ iwu mlɩ, akpawunutɔ ɩkpɩnkɩ mlɩ. Mlɩwa ɩwɩ ɔwʋnlɩ́n!

Mʋgyí ɔhá ánɩ́ mlɩtɛtɩ́ mlɩaa, mlɩ Sɩ́ nɩ́ mlɩdɛ́ mpáɩ bɔ nɩ́. Ɔtamakɩ ɔha ansɩ́tɔ́ nɩ́ ɔdɛ ahá asʋ́n gyí. Mboún ɔhagyíɔha bwɛhɛ́ ɔtɔpʋ́gyí mʋ asʋ́n. Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩpʋ Bulu-ifúnya bwɛ mlɩ bwɛhɛ́ kugyíkʋ nkɛ tráhɛ anfɩ ɩlasí mlɩ ɔyɩ́ ánfɩtɔ.
Ilehián ánɩ́ mlótomi, mɛ́nɩ mlɛ́talɩ́ bwɛ́ Bulu apɛ́, fówun mlénya ɩtɔ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lɛ́hɩɛ yáɩ́ há mlɩ ámʋ.
Hógyi gyí ansɩ́ pʋdɩ́nká tɔ́á fʋmɔkʋ́wun, támɛ fʋdɛ mʋ́ ɔkpa kɩ́sʋ.
Mʋ́ sʋ ndɛ mlɩ ɔlá da anɩ Wíe ɩdátɔ́ mbɛ́ɛ, mlɩmátrá tsiá fɛ́ ahá ánɩ́ bʋmeyín Bulu. Ɩtɔ́á mɔ́ɔwa labi há amʋ́ ɩwɩ bʋtɔgywɩ́ɩn.
Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩmáha ɔhaa ɔlɛ mlɩ ɩlá mlɩ atogyihɛ, mlɩ atonuhɛ, nkegyí, ɔtsra pɔpwɛ nkɛ, ntɛ́ɛ Yudafɔ ɔkpʋ́nʋ́ ɔdakɛ́ aná sʋ.
Mʋ́ sʋ́ bʋlɩɩ́ Bulu owíe obíá ámʋ ansɩ́tɔ́, bʋdɛ mʋ súm ɔpa-onyé mʋ ɔtswɛ́kpa ɩnʋ nɩ́. Ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ otsie owíe obíá ámʋsʋ ɛ́ obétsiá amʋ́tɔ́, bún amʋ́sʋ́.
Mʋ́ʋ́ Paulo lɛ́kplɩ́ yɔ́ ɩnʋ, yémlí bun mʋsʋ, látá mʋ pútá, blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Opúni mátsií mlɩ, ɔŋɛ́ bʋ mʋtɔ.”
Ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lalɛ́ ámʋ sʋ natomi ɔkpagyíɔkpasʋ ndɛ ɩwɩɔsɩn wúun, mɛ́nɩ Bulu ɔbɔ́tsʋn Kristo Yesusʋ hɔ amʋ́ nkpa, amʋ́ ɩbɩ bɛ́da numnyam amʋ́ʋ́ ɩtamatá ámʋ.
Mlɩpʋ aba-ɔdwɛ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩbʋ Akristofɔtɔ ámʋ ha aba itsiá brégyíbrɛ́. Ndɛ Bulu kʋlɩ́ mbɛ́ɛ, ɔháa mlɩ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ mlɩgyí Akristofɔ ámʋ fɛ́ɛ́ iwilwii.
Mlɩba ɩwɩasɩ ha aba fɛ́ alɩá mlɩtɛba ɩwɩasɩ há Kristo.
Támɛ apíó adwɛpʋ́, ɩ́nɩá mlɩyin mʋ́ alɩ sʋ á, ndɛ mlɩ ɔlá da yáɩ́. Mlɩdɩnka ansɩ́ ɩwɩsʋ, mɛ́nɩ ahá ánfɩ bʋtamagyi mblasʋ ánfɩ bʋmɔ́ɔpʋ amʋ́ atosunáhɛ́ laláhɛ amʋ bɛmlɛ́ mlɩ, amlɩdɩda.
Aká, mlɩba ɩwɩasɩ ha mlɩ akúlu alɩá ɩlɛkanáa ha ahá ánɩ́ bʋgyi Kristo klɛ́.
Wa ɩyɩn wa ɔhandɛ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔdɛ lalahɛ bwɛ ámʋ ɔpasua ámʋ ansɩ́tɔ́, mɛ́nɩ atráhɛ bénya ifú.
Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩha asi aba ɩlá lɛ. Mboún abwɛ́ɛ agywɩɩn ánɩ́ anɩmɔ́ɔbwɛ tɔtɔá ɩbɛ́ha anɩ bá ɔkʋkʋ mɛ́ɛsrɛɩ́ ntɛ́ɛ dɩda.
Támɛ Bulu ɔbɔ́wa yilé abwɛpʋ́ numnyam, há amʋ́ iwilwii, trá ha amʋ́ ayɛ. Obégyankpá há Yudafɔ, asa ɩbɔ́tʋ ahá ánɩ́ bʋmegyí Yudafɔ.
Bodun ogyá kpɔnkpɔntɩ, bʋmesin ɩsá. Hógyi lɛ́ha amʋ́á bɔpɔn benya ɔwʋnlɩ́n, amʋ́ akʋ benya ɩkɔ́ túmi, gyi amʋ́ anyabásʋ́.
Asa nɛ́kpa mɩ́ asʋ́n opulu á, mbláa mlɩ. Mlɩtɔ ɔhaa mátrá wa mɩ́ tɔ́ɩ. Tsúfɛ́ mɩ́ ɩwɩ apɩná ánfɩ idesuná ánɩ́ Yesu ɔkpábi ngyi.
Ɩnʋ Bulu-ɔbɔpʋ ɔwʋnlɩ́npʋ́ ɔkʋ lótsu ibwi kpɔnkpɔntɩ kʋ, tswɩ wa ɔpʋtɔ. Mʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɛblɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Alɩ́ Bulu ɔbɔ́pʋ ɔblɔ́ bwíé wúlu yilé Babilon, ɔhaa mɛ́ɛtrá wun mʋ́ ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ nɩ́.
Támɛ apíó adwɛpʋ́, mlɩ mʋ́ á, mlɩpwɛ mlɩ tsiátɔ́ dɩnka mlɩ hógyi wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋsʋ. Mlɩbɔ mpáɩ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ túmitɔ.
Mlɩmáha ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ anfɩsʋ atsiábi igyi mlɩsʋ. Mlɩha Bulu ɔtsɛ mlɩ agywɩɩn, ɩha mlɩ tsiátɔ́ ɩtsɛ. Fówun mlɛ́talɩ́ bɩ́ ánɩ́ Bulu apɛ́ bʋ alɛ́, ɩbʋ ɔdwɛ, ɩlɔfʋn.
Tsúfɛ́ mɩ́gyí sumbí ayɔpʋ́ ámʋtɔ ɔkʋsʋ nɩ. Tɛkɩ mmɔfʋn ánɩ́ bɛ́tɩ mɩ́ sumbí ɔyɔpʋ́ kʋ́ráá, tsúfɛ́ nɛdɩnká Bulu ɔpasua ámʋsʋ.
Mʋ́ sʋ ndɛ mlɩ fɛ́ɛ́ bláa mbɛ́ɛ, mlɩmápʋ mlɩ klʋn dɩ́nká ɔyɩ́ pʋ́ mʋ́tɔ́ atɔ́sʋ́. Nɩ́ ɔkʋ dɛ́ ɔyɩ́ ánfɩ dwɛ á, ɔmɛ́ɛtalɩ́ trá dwɛ anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu ɛ.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ fʋ́á fʋtsie fʋdɛ fʋ́ aba ɩlá lɛ, fʋma ɔnɔ́ kʋkʋ lɛ́ Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́. Tsúfɛ́ fʋdɛ akʋ ɩlá lɛ, támɛ fʋdɛ mʋ́ odu kɛ́n bwɛ. Mʋ́ sʋ nɩ́ fʋdɛ amʋ́ ɩlá lɛ á, ɩwɩ pɔ́n fʋ́dɛha.

Ɩnʋ á, ɩlɔwankɩ́ Yakobo mʋa Petro pʋ́ Yohane amʋ́ʋ́ bʋhɩ́ɛ́ bʋgyi ɔpasua ámʋ ɔtan ámʋ ánɩ́ Bulu lápʋ́ alɩ agyʋ́má ánfɩ kíé mɩ́. Mʋ́ sʋ bɔwa mɩ́a Barnaba ɩbɩ, pʋ́súná ánɩ́ anɩlabwɛ́ kʋlɛ. Botsulá ánɩ́ mɩ́a Barnaba ayɔ́ agyʋ́má ahá ánɩ́ bʋmegyí Yudafɔtɔ, amʋ́ ɛ́ abʋyɔ agyʋ́má Yudafɔtɔ.
Ɩsá akɔpʋ́ ámʋ bɛda Yesu mántá oyikpalíhɛ amʋsʋ tá á, botsu mʋ atadɩɛ, beye mʋ́tɔ́ aku ana. Okugyíɔkʋ klɛ́ kʋlɛ. Botsu mʋ ligá ánɩ́ bɔlʋ mʋ́ tsú ɔsʋ́sʋ́ beyi asɩ.
Támɛ ɩ́nɩá fʋ́dɛ ahá yilé suná á, ntogyi sʋ fʋmóosuná fʋ́ ɩwɩ mʋ́? Fʋdɛ ɔkan da bláa ahá fɛɛ bʋmáwi atɔ́, támɛ fʋ́ onutó fʋdewi?
Ntɛ́ɛ mlɩméyín mlɩaa, mlɩ ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ gyí Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ ɔtswɛ́kpa obu? Bulu lɔ́pʋ mʋ há mlɩ, otsie mlɩtɔ. Mʋ́ sʋ megyí mlɩbʋ́ mlɩ ɩwɩ.
Ɔdwɛ ámʋ́ʋ́ Kristo bʋ ha anɩ ámʋ dɛ́ anɩ kpa, tsúfɛ́ anɩlanú ɩwɩasɩ ánɩ́ mʋ nkʋlɛ lówu há ahá fɛ́ɛ́. Mʋ́ sʋ mʋa ahá fɛ́ɛ́ bawú.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ apíó aba ánɩ́ Bulu latɩ́ mlɩ wá ɔsʋ́sʋ́ ayɔpʋ́tɔ́, mlɩpʋ ansɩ́ dɩnka Yesusʋ. Mʋgyí Bulu sumbí ɔyɔpʋ́ pʋ́ mʋ igyí ɔhapʋ́ dɛhɛn amʋ́ʋ́ anɩdɛ́ mʋ ɩwɩ asʋ́n blɩ́ ámʋ nɩ.

Natsʋn ɔkpagyíɔkpasʋ súná mlɩ alɩá mlɔ́pʋ ɩbɩ yɔ́ agyʋ́má, pʋ́gyi ahá ánɩ́ ɩwɩ ma amʋ́ ɔnlɩn bʋalɛ. Mlɩkaɩn anɩ Wíe Yesu onutó asʋn blɩ́hɛ́sʋ. Ɔbɛ́ɛ, ‘Bulu toyúlá ɔhá ánɩ́ otekíé atɔ́ dʋn ɔhá ánɩ́ bʋtekíé mʋ.’ ”
Akúlu mʋ́a aká bʋbúu aba amʋ́ abatsiátɔ. Ɔkʋkʋ mádalɩ mʋ ba ɔma, tsúfɛ́ Bulu ɔbɛ́bɩtɩ́ ahá ánɩ́ bʋda ahá ánɩ́ bʋmegyí amʋ́ akúlu ntɛ́ɛ amʋ́ aká wá, pʋ́ mbʋa atɔpʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ ɩsʋ.
Brɛ́á olobun kɩ ntsán ámʋtɔ á, olowun ánɩ́ ɔhráda ámʋ kpán dá, támɛ omebitíwíé mʋ́tɔ́.
Ɩnʋ nyankpʋ lɔ́wa ɩbɩ fwɩ bɩ. Odekpie, ɔpráda dɛpʋtɩ́. Ɔmɛ ɔtsan-ɔtsan lɛlɩn kʋ́klʋ́kʋ́ʋ́, ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ lɛkpɩnkɩ́ kpɩnkɩ́ kʋá mʋ́ odu ɩmɔkʋ́ba kɩ tsú brɛ́á ahá bɛlɩn ɔyɩ́tɔ́ ɔpá.

Ɩnʋ nemlí bun mʋ ayabitɔ, mbɛ́ɛ ansum mʋ, támɛ ɔlɛbláa mɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mábwɛ! Tsúfɛ́ Bulu osúmbi ngyi fɛ́ fʋ́a fʋ́ apíó ámʋ́ʋ́ mlɩdɛ́ Yesu ɩwɩ adánsɩɛ gyí amʋ. Sum Bulu nkʋlɛ pɛ́! “Tsúfɛ́ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋdɛ Yesu ɩwɩ adánsɩɛ gyí amʋ bʋbʋ Bulu ɔnɔ́sʋ́ asʋ́nblɩ́ ɔŋɛ́.”†
Támɛ anɩlabɩ́ ɩ́nɩ, tsúfɛ́ alalɛ́ mʋ́ súná anɩ tsʋn mʋ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋsʋ. Ɔŋɛ́ ámʋ tokwí tógyítɔ́tɔ́ kɩ, ɔtɛlɛ́ Bulu asʋn ŋaínhɛ́á ɩbʋ ɔtɔ́tɔ́ɔ́tɔ́ kʋ́ráá súná anɩ.
Mlɩhɩɛ pʋ ansigyí hɔ mʋ fɛ́ mlɩ bá Okristoyin, amlɩpʋ obú ha mʋa ahá ánɩ́ bʋgyi fɛ́ mʋ.
Abí, mlɩbu mlɩ akwɩɩ́pʋ́, tsúfɛ́ mʋ́ Bulu tekle nɩ.

Abɛ́talɩ́ pʋ́ ɩbɩ sí kántɔ́ anɩaa anɩ klʋn mɔ́kʋ́há anɩ pɔ́n anɩ nkpatɔ, títriu anɩa mlɩnyɔ nátɩtɔ. Megyí anɩ ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ anfɩsʋ nyánsa anɩlɔ́pʋ anɩdɛ́ anɩ agyʋ́má yɔ, mboún Bulu awɩtɔlɛ sʋ́ anɩlatálɩ́ lɛ́ ɩwɩtɔ anɩdɛ́ tógyítɔ́ bwɛ ɔnɔkwalɩsʋ.
“Ahá ánɩ́ bʋdɛ mɩ́ mblasʋ gyí a, amʋ́gyí mɩ́ adwɛpʋ́ nɩ́. Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔtɔdwɛ́ mɩ́ á, mɩ́ Sɩ́ ɔbɔ́dwɛ mʋ. Mɩ́ ɛ́ nɔ́dwɛ mʋ, lɛ́ mɩ́ ɩwɩ ɔwan súná mʋ.”

Anɩdɛ́ mbla ánfɩ kɩ́ɩ fɛ́ tɔ́á nyánsa bʋ mʋ́tɔ́, ɩbɛ́ha abɔ́wa alɛ́ Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́, abɛ́ba ɩwɩasɩ há mʋ, wá ɩwɩ ɔsɩn anɩaa ɩbɛ́ha abɛ́bɩ gyi ɩwɩsʋ. Támɛ ɩ́nɩ aná fɛ́ɛ́ ɩmɛ́ɛtalɩ́ há anɩméegyi ɩwɩsʋ.
Amʋ́tɔ́ akʋ baba bɛbláa anɩ ɔpasua ámʋ alɩá fɛkɩ amʋ́sʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́. Bɔ mbɔ́dɩ́ afʋsi amʋ́ ɔkpa alɩá ibégyi Bulu ansɩ́ ɛ́.
Lɛ fʋ́ ɩwɩ tsu nwɛ́ɛngyí ánɩ́ ɩma labi, ɩtɔ wankláán kʋkʋ mɛ́ɛdalɩ tsu mʋ́tɔ́tɔ́, tsúfɛ́ fʋyin ánɩ́ ɩtrɛ́ pɛ́ ɩtɛtɩ́.
Anɩ Wíe dɛ́ tati ámʋ bwií lɛ́ anɩ fɛ́ɛ́ ansɩ́tɔ́. Mʋ́ sʋ́ anɩdɛ́ mʋ numnyam amʋ lɛ súná nɩ́. Mʋ Ɔŋɛ́ ámʋ lahá anɩdɛ́ mʋ lɩ́an, tsúfɛ́ mʋ numnyam amʋ ɩtráa dɛwankɩ́ anɩtɔ tsɩ́a.

Nɩ́ bɛtalɩ́ bʋdɛ mbwɩ obugya kʋ́ráá pʋtɩn ahá ɩwɩ á, ntogyi sʋ Kristo obugya mɛ́ɛtalɩ́ tɩn ahá ɩwɩ dʋn? Kristo lɔ́tsʋn Ɔŋɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩbʋ ɩnʋ brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́ ámʋsʋ, pʋ́ mʋ ɩwɩ lɛ́ mbusuo ánɩ́ ɩlɔfʋn há Bulu. Mʋ obugya amʋ ɩbɛ́tɩn anɩ klʋntɔ tsú bwɛhɛ́á ɩbɛ́kpa anɩ wá lowutɔ ɩwɩ, mɛ́nɩ abɛ́talɩ́ súm Bulu Ɔkɩankpapʋ amʋ.
Mʋ́ sʋ nɩ́ Bulu lapʋ́ mʋ atokiehɛ́ ámʋ kíé amʋ́, fɛ́ alɩá ɔlɔpʋkíé anɩ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ anɩlɔ́hɔ anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo gyi amʋ a, mɩ́gyí ma ánɩ́ nétin Bulu ɔkpa?”
Mlɩmábwɛ tɔ́á ɩbɛ́han Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ. Tsúfɛ́ mʋ Bulu lɔ́pʋhɩɛ mlɩ nsʋ, pʋ́súná ánɩ́ mʋbʋ́ mlɩ, mɔ́hɔ mlɩ nkpa ɛkɛ ámʋ nɩ.
Mʋ́ sʋ kaɩn tɔ́á bosuná fʋ́ pʋ́ mʋ́á fonusʋ. Gyi mʋ́sʋ́, afʋdamli klʋntɔ. Támɛ nɩ́ fʋmetsinkí á, nóbofwie fʋ́tɔ́ fɛ́ owikplu, fʋ́mɛ́ɛbɩ brɛ́á nɛ́ba.
Mɩ́ abí adwɛpʋ́, mlɩmáha ɔhaa ɔmlɛ mlɩ. Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔtɔbwɛ́ yilé á, mʋ asʋ́n da ɔkpa Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́ fɛ́ Yesu.

Apíó adwɛpʋ́, mlɩmáhɔ ahá fɛ́ɛ́ ánɩ́ bɛɛ, bʋbʋ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ asʋ́nsʋ́ gyi. Mboún mlɩsɔ ɔŋɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋdɛpʋsúná atɔ́ ámʋ kɩ. Tsúfɛ́ Bulu ɔnɔ́sʋ́ atɔɩ́pʋ́ afunupʋ tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ babʋ́lá ɔyɩ́ ánfɩtɔ.

Mʋ́ sʋ apíó, mlɩnu asʋ́n ánfɩ anɩdɛ́ mlɩ bláa anfɩ asɩ. Yesu anfɩ nkʋlɛsʋ mlɔ́tsʋn nya lakpansikíé. Mose mbla mɛ́talɩ́ há amlɩgyi asʋ Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́. Támɛ ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ alahɔ Yesu anfɩ gyi obégyi asʋ Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́.
Ɩtráhɛ a, mɩ́ apíó, anɩ Wíe sʋ mlɩnya ansigyí. Ɩmɔkʋ́kpɔn mɩ ánɩ́ nɛ́trá wanlɩ́n asʋn kua kʋlɛ anfɩ sɩ́sɩ́ mlɩ. Igyi asʋ́n ánɩ́ ɩbɛ́kpa mlɩ ɛ́.
Nɩ́ akʋ́n dɛ ɔkʋ á, ogyíi atɔ́ tsu wóyítɔ́ asa ɔba, mɛ́nɩ mlɩ ifía amʋ ɩmɛ́ɛtɩ ɩsʋbɩtɩ́ há mlɩ. Mɩ́ onutó nɛ́ba bɛbláa mlɩ tɔ́á mlɩbwɛ́ɛ tsu asʋn tráhɛ amʋ ɩwɩ.
Pilato lɛ́bláa amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mʋ́mʋ́ mlɩkpa mʋ ya, amlɩyegyi mʋ asʋ́n mlɩ mbla ɔnɔ́.” Yudafɔ ahandɛ amʋ bɛlɛ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ bɛɛ, “Anɩmá ɔkpa mɔ́ ɔha.”
Mlɩbɔ mbɔ́dɩ́ amlɩdunka atokiehɛ́ ámʋtɔ mʋ́á idehián dʋn. Nɛ́lasúná mlɩ ɔkpa ánɩ́ ɩdʋn ɩ́nɩ tsɩ́a mʋ́tɔ́.

Yesu gyí Bulu igyí ɔhapʋ́ dɛhɛn onutó ánɩ́ anɩdéhián nɩ. Mʋ ɩwɩ lɛtɩn, tsitsa kʋkʋ ɩma mʋ ɩwɩ. Lalahɛ kʋkʋʋkʋ ɛ́ ɩma mʋtɔ. Bulu lɛ́lɛ mʋ lɛ́ lakpan abwɛpʋ́ ɔkpasʋ, há mʋ otsiákpá fʋáhɛ́ ɔsʋ́sʋ́ʋ́sʋ́.
Ntɛtálɩ́ bwɛ́ tógyítɔ́, tsúfɛ́ Kristo tɔwá mɩ́ ɔwʋnlɩ́n.
Bulu dékléá mlɩháa mlɩ ɩwɩ ɩtɩn. Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩmáwa atsɩ mʋ́a ayin asʋ́n.
Mlɩkɩta mpaɩbɔ́tɔ́. Mlɩdɩnka ansɩ́ ɩwɩsʋ, ɩpánda ɛ́ itsia mlɩ klʋntɔ.
Mose lénya nú asʋ́n ánfɩ alɩ, ɔlɛsrɩ́ dalɩ Egyipte ɔmátɔ́ yɔ́ Midiafɔ ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ. Oletsiá ɩnʋ kwɩ́ɩ́ abi anyɔ.
Bulu lɔ́bwɛ oyin fɛ́ mʋ ɩwɩ, pʋ́wá mʋ ɩwɩ numnyam. Mʋ́ sʋ mehián ánɩ́ ɔbɔ́pʋ atɔ́ bun nwun asa obósum Bulu. Támɛ ɔtsɩ mʋ́ á, Bulu lɔ́bwɛ mʋ pʋ́wá oyin numnyam.
Mlɩha Kristo iwilwii igyí mlɩ klʋnsʋ, tsúfɛ́ mʋ́tɔ́ Bulu latɩ́ mlɩ bɔwa; mlɩa mʋ nyankpʋsa-oyí ámʋ mlɩlabwɛ́ kʋlɛ nɩ. Mlɩda mʋ ɩpán ɛ́ brégyíbrɛ́.
Bulu, atɔ́ fɛ́ɛ́ Ɔlɛpʋ́ pʋ́ mʋ́sʋ́ Ɔkɩ́pʋ amʋ ɔbɛ́kpa mʋ abí tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ ba mʋ numnyamtɔ. Mʋ́ sʋ ɩbʋ alɛ́á ɔlɔtsʋn Yesu amʋ́ʋ́ ogyi amʋ́ Nkpa Ɔhɔ́pʋ amʋ lowusʋ há mʋ ɔlɔfʋn, mɛ́nɩ ɔbɔ́hɔ amʋ́ nkpa.
