Ntɔ tɛ́tɩ́ ɩkɔ́ mʋ́a ɩtrɛ́ wá mlɩ nsɩnɛ́? Megyí ɔwɔ́lɩ laláhɛ ánɩ́ ideklé igyi mlɩsʋ tɔpʋ́ba?
Bahɩ́ɛ́ bɛbláa mɩ bɛɛ, mlɩtɔ akʋ bʋdɛ atsɩ mʋ́a ayin asʋ́n wa. Ɔmátɔ́fɔ kʋ́ráá bʋmɛdɛ́ mʋ́ odu bwɛ. Mlɩtɔ ɔkʋ mʋ́ kʋ́ráá laswɩ́ɩ́ mʋ sɩ mʋ ka,

Bɩ ánɩ́ fʋ́ ɩsɔ́kɩ amʋ mɔtsʋn ɔtsan há aha tráhɛ klɛ́. Ɔnɔkwalɩpʋ Bulu gyí. Ɔmɛ́ɛha ɩsɔ́kɩá ɩdʋn fʋ ɩba fʋsʋ. Támɛ nɩ́ fowíé ɩsɔ́kɩtɔ á, Bulu obósuná fʋ́ ɔkpa ánɩ́ fɔ́tsʋn mʋ́sʋ́ tálɩ́ lɩ́ɩ́ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́, mɛ́nɩ fɛ́dalɩ mʋ́tɔ́.
Nyin ánɩ́ nɛnátɩ́ á, akʋá bʋgyi fɛ́ nkpataku, bʋbʋ ɩyɩn bɛ́ba bowie mlɩtɔ, dá ɔpasua ámʋ sáɩ́n.
Mʋ́ sʋ anɩtɔpʋ́ mlɩ tsú ɩwɩ Bulu ɔpasua kugyíkʋ ansɩ́tɔ́; mlɩ nsiwa pʋ́ hógyiá ɩbʋ mlɩtɔ, bʋdɩn mlɩsʋ, ɩsɔ́kɩ dɛ́ mlɩ tʋ, mlɩlatomi sʋ.
Ɔhaa mɔ́kʋ́hɩ́ɛ́ wun Bulu kɩ. Nɩ́ anɩdɛ́ aba dwɛ á, idesuná ánɩ́ Bulu bʋ anɩ klʋntɔ. Mʋ́ sʋ mʋ ɔdwɛ lɔfʋn anɩtɔ.
Mɩ́ sumbí ɔyɔpʋ́ Paulo dɛ́ ɔwʋlʋ́ ánfɩ wanlɩ́n. Megyí anyánkpʋ́sa ntɛ́ɛ ɔhaa lɔ́wa mɩ́. Yesu Kristo mʋa anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɔkʋsʋ́a mʋ tsú afúlitɔ ámʋ lɔ́wa mɩ́.
Mlɩpʋkɩ ipian ánɩ́ olotomi wun lakpan abwɛpʋ́ ɩbɩtɔ, brɛ́á bolu mʋ, wá mʋ ɩwɩɔsɩntɔ, mɛ́nɩ ɔŋɛ́ mɛ́ɛta mlɩ, mlɩméesi mʋ hógyi.
Mʋ́ sʋ ɩ́nɩá anɩa mʋnyɔ anɩlɔ́bwɛ kʋlɛ mʋ lowutɔ á, alɩ kɛ́n anɩa mʋnyɔ lɔ́bwɛ kʋlɛ mʋ kʋsʋ́ tsú afúlitɔ ɛ́ nɩ́.
Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ lɛ́trá blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mlɩ ahá ánɩ́ mlɩmégyí Yudafɔ, mlɩa Bulu ahá mlɩnya ansigyí!”
Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ lahɩ́ɛ́ lɛ́ blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, brɛ́ tráhɛ amʋtɔ á, akʋ bési Kristosʋ hógyi. Bɛ́yaa asʋ nú afunu ɔŋɛ́ asʋ́n pʋ́ ɔŋɛ laláhɛ atosunáhɛ́.
Tsia kaɩn amʋ́ abʋba ɩwɩasɩ ha ɔmá akpapʋ́, abʋgyi ahandɛ mblasʋ, abʋbu amʋ́. Bʋkɩ́ɩ ánɩ́ bɔ́bwɛ tɔ́á igyi yilé brégyíbrɛ́.
Bakɩ ansɩ́ tan ánɩ́ ɔnɔ́ Bulu lɔ́pʋblɩ́ asʋ́n bɩ́mbɩ́ ámʋ, ɔsʋ́ mʋ́a asɩ lɛlɩn, ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ lɛdalɩ tsu ntsutso. Ntsu ɛ́ ɔlɔpʋbwɛ́ mʋ́.
Tsúfɛ́ Kristo ɛ́ lówu ahá lakpan sʋ ɔtsáwʋlɛ pɛ́. Mʋ asʋ́n da ɔkpa, támɛ olowu há lakpan abwɛpʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́, mɛ́nɩ ɔbɛ́kpa mlɩ ba Bulu wá. Bɔmɔ mʋ nyankpʋsa-oyí, támɛ Bulu lɔ́kʋsʋ́a mʋ Ɔŋɛ́tɔ́.
Nɩ́ bʋmetepí wun ɔkpa wankláán ámʋ kʋ́ráá á, tɛkɩ ɩbʋ alɛ́ há amʋ́ dʋn ánɩ́ bówun mʋ́ yínkí ɔma, sí mbla wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ́ʋ́ bɔpʋhá amʋ́ ámʋsʋ gyí.
Apíó, anɩdɛ́ mlɩ ɔlá da anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo ɩdátɔ́ anɩaa, mlɩmápʋ Akristofɔ ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋna bʋdɛtsʋ́ʋn, bʋtamakle agyʋ́má, bʋmɛdɛ́ atosunáhɛ́ amʋ́ʋ́ anɩlósuná mlɩ ámʋsʋ gyí wa mba.
Adam nkʋlɛ bwɛhɛ́ sʋ lakpan lɛ́ba ɔyɩ́tɔ́. Mʋ lakpan ámʋ sʋ́ lowu lɛ́ba ɔyɩ́tɔ́. Ɩ́nɩ sʋ lowu lénya túmi ɔhagyíɔhasʋ, tsúfɛ́ ahá fɛ́ɛ́ babwɛ́ lakpan.
Hógyi lɛ́ha amʋ́ bɔkɔ ɔmá-ɔmá gyi amʋ́sʋ́, bɔbwɛ tɔ́á ɩda ɔkpa. Benya atɔ́á Bulu lɛ́hɩɛ há amʋ́, bɛha agyatá ndatɔ lɛklɩ́.
Bʋdɩn anɩsʋ, támɛ Bulu mɔ́kʋ́sí anɩ há. Bʋtɛfɩn anɩ dá, támɛ Bulu sʋ anɩmɔ́kʋ́wú.
Mlɩladámlí ɔma há Bulu. Mlɩméyín ánɩ́ nɩ́ mlɩdɛ́ ɔyɩ́tɔ́ atɔ́ dwɛ á, mlɩdɛ́ Bulu lu? Nɩ́ fʋdeklé fɛɛ fɔ́dwɛ ɔyɩ́tɔ́ atɔ́ á, fʋtɔbwɛ́ Bulu olupʋ́.
Paulo mʋa mʋ aba ámʋ bɔtsʋn Frigia pʋ́ Galatia ɔmásʋ́. Tsúfɛ́ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ mɛ́ha amʋ́ ɔkpa ɔbɛ́ɛ, bʋdáa Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ ɔkan Asia ɔmátɔ́.
Támɛ hógyisʋ bʋtɔtsʋn gyi asʋ Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́. Bulu asʋn wanlɩ́nhɛ́ amʋ lɛ́blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Máfɩtɛ́ ɩwɩ fɛɛ, ‘Ma ɔbɔ́dʋ yɔ́ ɔsʋ́sʋ́?’ ” (Fɛfɩ́tɛ́ alɩ á, ilosuná ánɩ́ fɔ́yɔpʋ Kristo tsúa ɔsʋ́sʋ́ ba.)

Mʋ́ sʋ ɔbɔpʋ gyankpapʋ lɛ́dalɩ tsu Bulu ɔtswɛ́kpa ɩnʋ yɛtsɛɩ́ mʋ klɛ wʋ́lɩ́ ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ. Ɩnʋ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔbwɩ ámʋ nsʋhɩ́ɛtɔ ɩdɩn amʋ́sʋ́, bʋdɛ ɔkpɩ ámʋ sum ámʋ ɩwɩ létsitsíi nlɔ akpɔnkpɔntɩ, ɩdɛ amʋ́ dwiín.

Ɩnʋ mbwɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋkɩ nkpa ana ámʋ pʋ́ ahandɛ adʋanyɔ-na ámʋtɔ okugyíɔkʋ lémlí bún Okúfabi amʋ ansɩ́tɔ́. Okugyíɔkʋ dɛ́ ɔsankuo pʋ́ sika pɛpɛ blanwébi ánɩ́ ɔhɩ́ɛ́n bɔ mʋ́. Bulu ahá mpáɩ gyí ɔhɩ́ɛ́n ánfɩ.
Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ olohogyi ɔbɛ́ɛ, Yesu gyí Kristo, (ɔhá ánɩ́ Bulu ladá mʋ ofúli amʋ) a, Bulu mʋ Bi ógyi. Nɩ́ fʋtɔdwɛ́ ɔkwɩɩ́pʋ́ a, fɔ́dwɛ mʋ bi ɛ́.
Anɩmátsu ɩwɩ súná aba, ntɛ́ɛ wá aba ɔblɔ́, ntɛ́ɛ pɛ́ ansɩ́ aba atɔ́sʋ́.
Mákplʋn wa oyin dɛhɛn. Mboún tɔɩ bla mʋ asʋ́n fɛ́ fʋ́ sɩ́. Kɩta nyasubi ámʋ fɛ́ alɩá fɛ́kɩtá fʋ́ apio yinhɛ́.
Ɩ́nɩá mlɩa ɔmátɔ́fɔ tsíe sʋ á, mlɩtsia tsiátɔ́ wankláán, mɛ́nɩ nɩ́ bʋdɛblɩ́ bɛɛ mlɩ tsiátɔ́ ɩma alɛ a, bówun mlɩ yilébwɛ, fówun bɛ́kanfʋ́ Bulu ɛkɛ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔbɛ́ba bɛkɩ amʋ́ gyumagyihɛ amʋ.
Nɛhɩɛ wá nsi, dɩ́nká Kristo ɔpasua ámʋsʋ. Negyi Mose mbla ámʋsʋ wankláán, ɔlala metsiá mɩ́ ɩwɩ.
Ɩnʋ ɔlɛfɩtɛ́ amʋ́ brɛ́á ɩwɩ lɔ́wa mʋ bi ámʋ ɔnlɩn. Bɛbláa mʋ bɛɛ, “Owísó ámʋ lési mʋ ígye ɔpa ɔdɔ-kʋlɛtɔ.”

Ɛkɛ ámʋ igyi Fieda. Mʋ́ ɔyɩ kɛhɛ igyi ɔkpʋ́nʋ́ ɔdakɛ́ kpɔnkpɔntɩ há Yudafɔ. Mʋ́ sʋ bʋmekle ánɩ́ ahá ámʋ bʋsían nyikpalíhɛ amʋsʋ yɔ́fʋn owi tahɛ́.† Mʋ́ sʋ bɔkʋlɩ́ Pilato ɔkpa bɛɛ ɔháa mʋ ɩsá akɔpʋ́ abʋyebiabía amʋ́ ayabi, mɛ́nɩ bɔ́kɔsɩ́ wú, fówun bɛ́lɛ amʋ́ tsu nyikpalíhɛ amʋsʋ asa owí ɔta.

Pilato lónu asʋ́n ánfɩ á, olekle osi Yesu. Támɛ Yudafɔ ámʋ bɔsʋrá okitikíti kʋ́klʋ́kʋ́ʋ́ blɩ́ bɛɛ, “Nɩ́ fesi ɔhá ánfɩ á, mʋ́mʋ́ megyí Roma owíe dɛhɛn* mʋ nyawie fʋgyi. Tsúfɛ́ ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔblɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ owíe mʋgyi á, alakʋ́sʋ́ lɩ́ɩ́ Roma owíe dɛhɛnsʋ!”
Yesu lɛ́bláa mʋ akasɩ́pʋ́ amʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Opúni mátsií mlɩ. Mlɩhɔ Bulu gyi, amlɩhɔ mɩ gyi.
Mlɩmánya ahá ánɩ́ bɔ́kʋsʋ́ lɩ́ɩ́ mlɩsʋ ifú ɔkpa ɔkʋkʋsʋ. Mlɩ ɩklʋnwa ɩbɔ́bwɛ osúna há amʋ́ ánɩ́ Bulu onutó ɔbɛ́hɩ amʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́, támɛ ɔbɔ́hɔ mlɩ mʋ́ nkpa.
Megyí mlɩ lɛ́lɛ mɩ́. Mɩ́lɛ́lɛ mlɩ yáɩ́ mbɛ́ɛ, mlɩyɔ́ɔ amlɩyoswie abíá ibétsiá brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́, mɛ́nɩ mɩ́ Sɩ́ ɔbɛ́ha mlɩ tógyítɔ́á mlɔ́kʋlɩ́ mʋ mɩ́ ɩdátɔ́.

Hógyitɔ Habel lɔ́pʋ mʋ atɔ hahɛ́ ánɩ́ ɩbʋ alɛ́ dʋn mʋ dɛhɛn Kain klɛ́ há Bulu igyí. Mʋ hógyi sʋ Bulu ansɩ́ legyi mʋa mʋ atɔ hahɛ́ ámʋ ɩwɩ, olotsu mʋ ánɩ́ mʋ asʋ́n da ɔkpa. Ɩbʋ mʋ́tɔ́á olowu dodoodo, támɛ mʋ hógyi amʋ sʋ ɔtráa ɔdɛtɔɩ́ bɔfʋn ndɛ.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ ɔhagyíɔha otsú mʋ́ ánɩ́ Kristo asúmbi kɛkɛ mɩ́a Apolo anɩgyí, Bulu lapʋ́ mʋ asʋn ŋaínhɛ́ amʋ agyʋ́má wá anɩ ɩbɩtɔ.
Mʋ́ʋ́ ntsrakpabi bɛkpakpáa bun ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ, fɛ́ afú kpɔnkpɔɔnkpɔntɩ látsʋn kpakpáa pɔntɔ-abíá ɩmɔkʋ́dan bun.
Mʋ́ sʋ apíó adwɛpʋ́, mlɩmáwa ɩwɩ ɩkpɩsúmtɔ́ ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ.
Mlɩmáha lalahɛ igyi mlɩsʋ, mboún mlɩbwɛ yilé pʋ́gyi lalahɛsʋ.
Tsia kaɩn amʋ́ asʋ́n ánfɩ. Tɔɩ kpla amʋ́ Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́ fɛɛ, bʋmátsiá trɛ́ asʋ́nsʋ́. Labi kʋkʋ ɩma mʋ́tɔ́, tsúfɛ́ mʋ́ odu abwɛpʋ́ bʋtɛhɩ́.
Mlɩkpʋkpɛ manta Bulu, Bulu ɛ́ ɔbɛ́kpʋkpɛ́ manta mlɩ. Lakpan abwɛpʋ́, mlɩfwɩ ɩbɩ lɛ lakpanbwɛtɔ. Ahá ánɩ́ mlɩ agywɩɩn igyi anyɔ, mlɩha mlɩ klʋntɔ ɩtɩn.
Támɛ nɩ́ mlofútí fɩtátɔ kɩ a, mlɩlabwɛ́ lakpan. Bulu mbla ámʋ lahá mlɩ ɩpɔ́n.
Tsúfɛ́ Bulu mɛ́tɩ anɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ, abá bɔtɔ mbʋa; mboún ɔbɛ́ɛ, ifin kʋkʋ mátsiá anɩ ɩwɩ.
Bulu lɛ́lɛ mʋ ɔblɔ́ súná tsú ɔsʋ́sʋ́. Olenya ɔblɔ́ ahá ánɩ́ bʋtamanyá mʋ ifú, bʋdɛ lalahɛ bwɛ, bapʋ́ amʋ́ owuntɔlɩn bʋdɛ Bulu asʋ́n ánɩ́ igyi ɔnɔkwalɩ ɔkpa tíin.
Mɩ́ adwɛpʋ́, mlɩha adwɛ aba, tsúfɛ́ ɔdwɛ itsú Bulu wá. Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔtɔdwɛ́ ahá a, Bulu mʋ bi ógyi, oyin Bulu.
Mʋ́ sʋ ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, ɔna wankɩ amʋtɔ, támɛ ɔdɛ mʋ ba Okristoyin lu á, idesuná ánɩ́ ɔtráa ɔbʋ oklúntɔ.
Nɩ́ ahá bʋdɛ mlɩ sia Kristo búo sʋ á, idesuná ánɩ́ nwun lawá olú. Bulu Numnyam Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ bʋ mlɩtɔ.
Paulo lɔ́wa amʋ́ ɔnɔ́, ɔlɛbláa amʋ́ tógyítɔ́á Bulu latsʋn mʋsʋ bwɛ́ ahá ánɩ́ bʋmegyí Yudafɔtɔ.
Mlɩtɔ ma ɔbɛ́talɩ́ súná ánɩ́ lakpan ɔbwɛpʋ́ ngyi? Nɩ́ ndɛ ɔnɔkwalɩ blɩ́ á, mʋ́ ntogyi mlɩmɔ́ɔhɔ mɩ gyi?
Ɔlɛtrá blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mmɛ́ɛtrá kaɩ́n amʋ́ lakpan pʋ́ amʋ́ lalahɛsʋ ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ.”
Tsúfɛ́ mʋ́ sʋ mlɩlanyá ɩwɩ tógyítɔ́tɔ́. Mʋ́á ɩdʋn gyí mlɩ tɔɩ́ pʋ́ mlɩ asʋ́nbɩ fɛ́ɛ́tɔ́.
Mɩ́ apíó adwɛpʋ́, ndɛpʋ anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo pʋ́ ɔdwɛá Bulu Ɔŋɛ́ lahá mlɩ há mlɩ aba kókóli mlɩ mbɛ́ɛ, mlɩlɩ́ɩ mɩ́ ɔma, amlɩbɔ mpáɩ ha mɩ kínkíínkín.
Ɩnʋ ɔdɔm amʋ bɛbláa mʋ bɛɛ, “Ɔŋɛ laláhɛ bʋ fʋtɔ! Ma dékléá ɔbɔ́mɔ fʋ́?”

Anyánkpʋ́sa bʋdɛ lakpan bwɛ tsú brɛ́ ɔpá, támɛ Bulu lénya klʋn há amʋ́, ɔmɛbɩtɩ́ amʋ́ ɩsʋ. Séi á, Bulu labɔpʋ Yesu bɔ́ afɔdɩɛ, pʋ́ mʋ obugya lɛ́ anɩ ɩwɩ mbusuo, mɛ́nɩ abɔ́tsʋn mʋ hógyisʋ nyá lakpansikíé. Bulu lɔ́bwɛ mʋ́ alɩ pʋ́súná ánɩ́ mʋ asʋ́n da ɔkpa, mɛ́nɩ ibósuná nkɛ ánfɩtɔ ánɩ́ yilé ɔbwɛpʋ́ ogyi. Ototsú ahá ánɩ́ bɔhɔ Yesu gyi ánɩ́ amʋ́ asʋ́n da ɔkpa mʋ ansɩ́tɔ́.
Atsalɩ bʋ ɩnʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ asúmpʋ́ pʋ́ agyópʋ amʋ bɔdʋdá ogyá, bʋlɩɩ́ mʋ́ asɩ. Petro ɛ́ lɛ́yɛlɩɩ́ amʋ́ wá, ɔdɛ ogyá ámʋ núu.
Mlɩdɩda ɩsá-akɔtɔ́ fɛ́ɛ́á Bulu lahá mlɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ, mlɩpʋ́kɔ Ɔbʋnsám, mɛ́nɩ mlɛ́talɩ́ lɩ́ɩ́ mʋ ɔmlɛ ámʋ ɔnɔ́.
Petro lɛ́fɩtɛ́ mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mɩ́ Wíé, ntogyi sʋ́ mmɛ́ɛtalɩ́ buo fʋ séi. Nówu fʋ́ sʋ!”
Mɛ́nɩ Bulu ɔbɛ́ha mlɩ iwilwii ánɩ́ ɩdʋn blɩ́, ɩbɛ́kpa mlɩ klʋn pʋ́ mlɩ agywɩɩn, mlɩa Kristo Yesu ɩkʋlɛbwɛtɔ.
Anɩtɔpʋ́ anɩ ɔdandʋ kánfʋ́ anɩ Wíe pʋ́ anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu. Mʋ́ kɛ́n anɩtɔpʋ́lwɩ́ɩ́ ahá nɩ. Támɛ Bulu onutó lɔ́bwɛ nyankpʋsa fɛ́ mʋ ɩwɩ.
Megyí ɔyɩ́tɔ́ mbʋa atɔpʋ́, ɔnsɩpɛ awapʋ́, awikplu ntɛ́ɛ ɩkpɩ atswɛ́pʋ ɩwɩ asʋ́n nɛblɩ́. Mʋ́mʋ́ tɛkɩ mlɛ́dalɩ ɔyɩ́ ánfɩtɔ asa mlɩmɔ́ɔwa amʋ́ mba nɩ́.
“Tɛkɩ mɩ́ óó nohogyiá nɔ́bwɛ tógyítɔ́á nɛ́talɩ́ pʋ́tin Yesu Nasaretyin amʋ gyumagyihɛ ɔkpa.
Tɔtɔ ɩma amʋ́ ansigyí dʋn mbʋatɔ. Bʋtamasí lalahɛ bwɛ. Bʋtɛmlɛ́ ahá ánɩ́ amʋ́ hógyi mɛlɩ́ɩ́ tsukʋlɛ, há bʋ́tɔbwɛ́ lakpan. Bahɩ́ɛ́ bɩ́ ɔnsɩpɛ wa. Amʋ́ bwɛhɛ́ laláhɛ anfɩ sʋ, bʋgyɔ́wɩ nɩ́!
Támɛ akúfa ɔkpapʋ́ ánɩ́ ɔdɛ ɩpa gyí, megyí mʋ onutó bʋ́ akúfa amʋ tɛsrɩ́ nɩ́ owun ɔkpataku ɔbá bɛkɩtá amʋ́. Ɔkpataku ámʋ tɛkɩ́tá akúfa amʋtɔ ɔkʋ, atráhɛ bʋtɛdásáɩ́n.
Apíó adwɛpʋ́, mlɩnu. Mlɩkɔsɩ nu asʋ́n asɩ. Mlɩ ɔnɔ́ máwa ɔsa. Mlɩmákɔsɩ́ nyá ɔblɔ́ ɛ́.
Alɩ kɛ́n anɩ Wíe lɛ́hɩɛ ánɩ́ mʋ asʋn wankláán ámʋ ɔkan adapʋ́ ɛ́ bʋgyíi atɔ́ tsu ahá ánɩ́ bʋdɛ labi nya tsú asʋ́n ámʋtɔ wá nɩ́.
Naba ɔyɩ́ ánfɩtɔ fɛ́ wankɩ, fɛ́kɩ ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ anfɩsʋ ɩwankɩ, mɛ́nɩ ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔlɔhɔ mɩ gyi méesin oklúntɔ.
Ɔma a, Yesu lóyówun mʋ Bulu ɔtswɛ́kpa ɩnʋ. Mʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɛbláa mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Yɛ́ɛ fawun ánɩ́ ɩwɩ lawá fʋ́ ɔnlɩn. Mátrá bwɛ lakpan, mɛ́nɩ mʋ́á ɩdʋn ɩ́nɩ mɛ́ɛba fʋsʋ.”
Mlɩpʋ ɔdwɛ bwɛ mlɩ tógyítɔ́.
“Nɩ́ mlɩtɔdwɛ́ mɩ́ á, mlégyi mɩ́ mblasʋ.

Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩkɩ wankláán, mɛ́nɩ mlɩméekiná Bulu ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔdɛ mlɩ asʋ́n bláa amʋ. Tsúfɛ́ Israelfɔ ámʋ́ʋ́ bekiná asʋ́n ánɩ́ ɔlɔwa Mose blɩ́ Sinaibʋ asɩ nu ámʋ bʋmɛtalɩ́ srɩ́ sí ɩsʋbɩtɩ́ ámʋ. Nɩ́ anɩ ɛ́ akíná ɔhá ánfɩ ɔdɛtɔɩ́ tsú ɔsʋ́sʋ́ ánfɩ ɔmɛ nu á, anɩ ɩsʋbɩtɩ́ bɔ́dʋn amʋ́ klɛ́.
Brɛ́á mlɩmɔ́kʋ́nyá bɩ́ Bulu á, mlɩlɔ́bwɛ nkpábi há ɩkpɩá bʋmegyí tɔtɔ.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ́ brɛ́á Bulu lɛ́lɛ mʋ osúmpʋ́ Yesu a, olegyankpá pʋ́ mʋ sɩ́sɩ́ mlɩ Israelfɔ, ɔbɛ́ɛ obóyulá mlɩ, amlɩsi lakpan bwɛ nɩ́.”
Anɩgyí ahá ánɩ́ anɩlówun mʋ bwɛhɛ́ ánɩ́ ɔlɔbwɛ Yudea pʋ́ Yerusalem ɔmátɔ́ fɛ́ɛ́ nɩ́. Bɛda mʋ mántá oyikpalíhɛsʋ mɔ́ mʋ.
Apíó, nɔpʋ́ anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo kókóli mlɩ ánɩ́ mlɩ fɛ́ɛ́ mlɩbwɛ́ɛ kʋlɛ, mɛ́nɩ mlɩmɛ́ɛdasaɩ́n. Mlɩha mlɩ agywɩɩn ɩbwɛ kʋlɛ mlɩ asʋn blɩ́hɛ́ kugyíkʋtɔ.
Tɛkɩ mlɩ ɛ́ mlɩlɛ́damlí ɔma há Bulu, mlɩgyí mʋ alupʋ́ mlɩ asʋ́n susúhɛ pʋ́ mlɩ bwɛhɛ́ laláhɛ sʋ.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ lɛ fʋ́ ɩwɩ tsu nyasubi mʋ́a mbitebí mbagyítɔ. Fówun fʋ́a ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋtɔpʋ́ ɩklʋn wankɩ́hɛ́ kpólí Bulu ámʋ ansɩ́ bɛ́dɩnká yilébwɛ, hógyi, ɔdwɛ pʋ́ iwilwiisʋ.
Mʋ́ sʋ nɩ́ Bulu lakʋ́sʋ́a mlɩa Kristonyɔ ba nkpa pɔpwɛtɔ á, mlɩdunka atɔ́á ɩbʋ ɔsʋ́sʋ́, ɔtɩ́nɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ Kristo tsie Bulu gyɔpɩsʋ ámʋ.

Bulu-ɔbɔpʋ gyankpapʋ lɔ́fʋlɩ́ mʋ ɔkpɛ. Mʋ́ʋ́ botsu atsufolibi mʋ́a ogyá ánɩ́ obugya lɛfráa mʋ́, tswɩ mʋ́ wʋ́lɩ́ ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ. Nɩ́ beye ɔsʋlʋ́tɔ asa á, mʋ́tɔ́ iku kʋlɛ mʋ́a mʋ́sʋ́ nyí pʋ́ mʋ́sʋ́ ɩfá fɛ́ɛ́ lɔhɔ plɩ́plɩ́plɩ́plɩ́.
blɩ́ bɛɛ, “Anɩ Wíe Bulu Otúmípʋ, adá fʋ́ ɩpán. Fʋ́létsiá, fʋ́bʋ ɩnʋ brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́. Tsúfɛ́ fapʋ́ fʋ́ túmi kpɔnkpɔntɩ ámʋ fi fʋ́ iwíegyí asɩ!
Yesu lɛ́lɛ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Nɩ́ fʋyin Bulu atokiehɛ́ pʋ́ ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔdɛ fʋ́ ntsu kʋlɩ́ á, tɛkɩ fɔ́kʋlɩ́ mʋ, ɔbɛ́ha fʋ́ ntsu ánɩ́ ɩtɛhá nkpa.”
Ɛkɛá ɔbɛ́lɛ Kristo amʋ́ʋ́ ogyi mlɩ nkpa onutó ámʋ ɔwan súná ɔyɩ́ á, ɛkɛ ámʋ kɛ́n ɔbɛ́lɛ mlɩa mʋnyɔ ɔwan mʋ numnyamtɔ nɩ́.
Támɛ bawánlɩ́n ɩ́nɩ, mɛ́nɩ mlóhogyi ánɩ́ Yesu gyí Bulu mʋ Bi Kristo amʋ. Asʋ́n ánfɩsʋ hógyi ɔbɛ́ha mlénya nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá mʋ ɩdátɔ́ nɩ́.
Anɩ mʋ́ á, Bulu ahá anɩgyí. Mʋ́ sʋ ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ oyin Bulu tɔhɔ anɩ asʋ́nsʋ́ gyi. Támɛ ɔhá ánɩ́ omeyín Bulu tamahɔ anɩ asʋ́n. Ɩ́nɩ anɩtɔpʋ́bɩ́ ɔnɔkwalɩ Ɔŋɛ́ ámʋ pʋ́ afunu klɛ́ nɩ.

Ahá ánfɩ bʋtɔpʋ́ ifin da ɩkʋlɛbwɛ atogyihɛ amʋ. Nɩ́ mlɩa amʋ́nyɔ mlɩdɛ́ atógyí a, pɛ́lɩ tamakɩ́tá amʋ́. Akpapʋ́ bʋgyi, támɛ amʋ́ nkʋlɛ klɛ́ bʋtɛkɩ. Bʋgyi fɛ́ agyindeá ɩtamatswie, afú tɔtsʋan mʋ́ nátɩ́. Bʋgyi fɛ́ nyíá ɩtamaswíé ntɛ́ɛ bapúlí mʋ́, tú mʋ́ asɩ, ɩlawú plɩ́plɩ́plɩ́plɩ́.
Sumbí ayɔpʋ́ ámʋ ofúlábwɛ sʋ wúlu amʋtɔ ahá betsiá tsú amʋ́ alɔpʋ ba brɔnʋsʋ, bɛyaɩ́ nklan tswɩ pʋ́ amʋ́ tswɩ mʋ́sʋ́. Fówun nɩ́ Petro ɔbá bɔtsʋn ɩnʋ á, mʋ yiyí bɔ́wʋlɩ́ amʋ́sʋ́.
Ɩ́nɩ fɛ́ɛ́ ɔma a, mlɩkɩta Kristo hógyi amʋtɔ brégyíbrɛ́. Ɩbwɛ́ɛ mlɩ atíntɔá mlɔ́pʋtin mlɩ ɩwɩ, mɛ́nɩ Ɔbʋnsám mbɩn pɩ́ɔ́npɩ́ɔ́n ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩdɛtsʋ́ʋn amʋtɔ kʋkʋ ɩmɔ́ɔwɔ mlɩ.
Mlɩbwɛ tógyítɔ́ tsu mlɩ klʋntɔ, fɛ́ anɩ Wíe mlɩdɛ́ mʋ́ bwɛ há, megyí anyánkpʋ́sa.
Mlɩkɩ ánɩ́ mlɩtɔ ɔkʋkʋ ɛ́ mɔ́ɔbwɛ mʋ ɩwɩ mbʋa ɔtɔpʋ́, ntɛ́ɛ ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔtamabú Bulu fɛ́ Esau. Mʋlɔ́pʋ mʋ handɛ tsɛ ɔtsáwʋlɛ atogyihɛ.
Bɔkplʋ́n lɛ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ bɛɛ, “Ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ! Megyí mʋ. Si Baraba ha anɩ.” (Ogyo otswapʋ́ Baraba ɛ́ gyí).
Bɛ́lɛ ahá há, bʋmóosusúu asʋ́n ɩwɩ, bɛ́kɩ amʋ́ ɩwɩá bʋdʋn ɔhagyíɔha, bɔ́dwɛ ɔyɩ́tɔ́ ansigyí sí Bulu.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ Bulu lótsu mʋ fʋ́á ya ɔsʋ́sʋ́ʋ́sʋ́, há mʋ dá ánɩ́ ɩdʋn adá fɛ́ɛ́,
Megyí nyánsa anɩlɔ́pʋsré ɔtɛ bɔwa súná mlɩ tsú anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo túmi pʋ́ mʋ yinkí ba amʋ ɩwɩ. Mboún anɩlɛ́hɩɛ pʋ́ anɩ ansíbi wun mʋ numnyam.

Asʋ́n ánfɩ aná ɩwɩ ɔlɔtɔɩ́ tsú mʋ nwʋlʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́tɔ́ nɩ. Támɛ mʋ asʋ́n ámʋ ɩkʋ asɩnu bʋ ɔnlɩn. Mʋ́ sʋ ahá ánɩ́ bʋtamakásɩ́ tɔtɔ pʋ́ ahá ánɩ́ amʋ́ hogyi mɛlɩ́ɩ́ tsukʋlɛ bʋtɛdámlí Paulo asʋ́n ámʋ, fɛ́ alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋtɛdámlí Bulu asʋn wanlɩ́nhɛ́ bun amʋ. Mʋ́ ɔbɛ́ha Bulu ɔbɛ́hɩ amʋ́ nɩ́.
Brɛ́á Barnaba mʋa Paulo bonu tɔ́á bɛbá bɔbwɛ á, bɛkɩtá amʋ́ atadɩɛ bálɩ́. Ilosuná ánɩ́ bʋmotsulá dɩ́nká ɩtɔ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ bɛbá bɔbwɛ ámʋsʋ. Bɛsrɩ́ wíé ɔdɔm amʋtɔ blɩ́ bɛɛ,
Tsúfɛ́ ndɛ mlɩ bláa mbɛ́ɛ, Kristo labwɛ́ Yudafɔ osúmpʋ́, mɛ́nɩ ibósuná ánɩ́ Bulu obégyi mʋ tɔ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɛhɩɛ amʋ́ anáin amʋsʋ.
Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ mʋdɛ Bulu súm, támɛ ɔtamakɩ́tá ɩwɩ mʋ tɔ́ɩtɔ á, ɔdɛ ɩwɩ mlɛ́. Mʋ Bulusúm igyi kpaalɩ.
Mlɩkaɩn asʋ́n ámʋ́ʋ́ nɛbláa mlɩ mbɛ́ɛ, ‘Osúmpʋ́ ɔkʋkʋ mɔ́dʋn mʋ wie’ amʋsʋ. Nɩ́ ahá bʋdɩn mɩ́sʋ́ a, mlɩ ɛ́ bɛ́dɩnká mlɩsʋ. Nɩ́ begyi mɩ́ asʋ́nsʋ́ á, mlɩ ɛ́ bégyi mlɩ asʋ́nsʋ́.
Yesu lɛ́bláa Yudafɔ ámʋ́ʋ́ bɔhɔ mʋ gyi amʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Nɩ́ mlobuo mɩ́ atosunáhɛ́ a, mlɩgyí mɩ́ akasɩ́pʋ́ lɛ́lɛ́.
Akʋ́n kʋ lɛ́bá Egyipte pʋ́ Kanaan ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ fɛ́ɛ́. Ɩlɔpʋ ɩkplán ba ɔmá ámʋtɔ. Anɩ anáin amʋ bʋmenyá atɔ́ gyi.
Ansɩ́ lɛhɩɛ́ gyi mɩ brɛ́á nowun ánɩ́ fʋ́ abí ámʋ akʋ bʋna ɔnɔkwalɩ ɔkpa ámʋsʋ, fɛ́ alɩá anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu lɛ́bláa anɩ.
Nɩ́ ɔkʋ mɛ́kɩ mʋ abusuanfɔsʋ, títriu mʋ wóyítɔ́ ahásʋ á, mʋ́mʋ́ aladámlí ɔma há hógyi amʋ. Ɩ́nɩ sʋ mʋ lakpan dʋn ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔmɔhɔ Bulu gyi.

Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩha apʋ ɩklʋn ánɩ́ ɩbʋ ɔnɔkwalɩ, pʋ́ hógyiá mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ bʋ ɔnlɩn kpʋkpɛ manta Bulu. Tsúfɛ́ alapʋ́ Kristo obugya gyʋ́ra anɩ. Anɩ klʋn mɛ́ɛtrá ha anɩ pɔ́n, alapʋ́ ntsu wánkɩ́hɛ́ ɛ́ fwɩ́ anɩ ɩwɩ.
Mʋ́á bʋdenu tsú mɩ́ ɩwɩ fɛ́ɛ́ gyí, ahá bʋdɛblɩ́ bɛɛ, “Oyin ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔdɩn anɩsʋ ámʋ ná ɔdɛ hógyi amʋ́ʋ́ anɩdɛ́ mʋ́ asʋ́n blɩ́, ɔdɛ anɩ itin ka ámʋ kɛ́n ɔkan da.”
Nobwíí ɩpa há mlɩ, mlɩgyi atɔ́ ngya, mɛ́nɩ mlɩmóowu. Mlɩtɔ ɔkʋkʋ nwunsʋ-imi kʋlɛ kʋ́ráá mɔ́ɔfwɩ.”
Fotomi wun ipian mɩ́ sʋ, fʋ́meyinkí ɔma.
Suna ayin dɛhɛn amʋ abʋgyi ɩwɩsʋ, abʋbwɛ ahá ánɩ́ obú bʋ amʋ́sʋ́, bʋtegyi ɩwɩsʋ. Bʋhɩ́ɛ kɩta amʋ́ hógyitɔ kínkíínkín. Bʋdwɛ́ɛ ahá wankláán, abʋhɩɛ tomi.
Bɩ́mbɩ́ ámʋ a, ahá bʋmɛbɩ alɩá Bulu gyí. Bulu lóbun ansíbi mʋ́sʋ́, támɛ séi mʋ́ á, alabláa anyánkpʋ́sa fɛ́ɛ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, bʋdámli klʋntɔ.
Yesu mʋ yin, mʋ yin mʋ pio tsɩ́hɛ́ Maria, ogyi Klopa mʋ ka pʋ́ Magdalayintse Maria bʋlɩɩ́ oyikpalíhɛ amʋ asɩ.
Ɔlɔwa ligá ánɩ́ bɔwa mʋ́ obugyatɔ. Mʋ ɩdá gyí, “Bulu Asʋ́n.”
Támɛ mlɩkɩ wankláán ánɩ́ ɔkpa ánfɩ mlɩbʋ gyi ɔkpɩtɔ-atɔ́ ánfɩ ɩmɛ́ɛha ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔmɔkʋ́dan hógyitɔ ɔmɛ́ɛdɩda.

Bulu lɛ́trá tɔɩ́ tsú Yesu kʋsʋ́ tsú afúlitɔ pʋ́ mʋ ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ amʋ́ʋ́ ɩmɔ́ɔplɔ́ wá ɔbɔ́tɔ́ ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ ámʋ ɩwɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ, ‘Nɔ́pʋ mɩ́ oyúla wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ́ʋ́ nɛhɩɛ mbɛ́ɛ, ɩbwɛ́ alɩágyíalɩ́á nɔ́pʋhá Dawid amʋ há mlɩ.’
Nɩ́ ɛkɛ ámʋ ɩfʋn a, mlɛ́bɩ ánɩ́ mbʋ mɩ́ Sɩ́ ámʋtɔ. Mlɩ ɛ́ mlɩbʋ mɩtɔ fɛ́ alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ mɩ́ ɛ́ mbʋ mlɩtɔ ámʋ.
Nɩ́ anɩdɛ́ Bulu mblasʋ gyí a, mʋ́ ɔbɛ́ha abɛ́bɩ ánɩ́ anɩlabɩ́ mʋ nɩ.
Mʋ́ sʋ́ ndɛ mlɩ bláa mbɛ́ɛ, mlówu wá mlɩ lakpantɔ nɩ́. Mlówu wá mlɩ lakpantɔ, nɩ́ mlɩmóhógyi ánɩ́ ‘Mɩ́gyí ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ mbɛ́ɛ ngyi ámʋ.’ ”
Nowun ánɩ́ ɔtsɩ ámʋ lanu Bulu ahá obugya bʋ́. Ahá ánfɩ bɔmɔ Yesu ɩwɩ adánsɩɛgyí sʋ nɩ́. Brɛ́á nowun mʋ a, ɔnɔ́ lobwie mɩ́.
Fɛ́ alɩá mlɩyin yaɩ́ á, ɔma a, olobodunká obi dɛhɛn oyúla tsú mʋ sɩ wá, támɛ mʋ sɩ lékiná mʋ ha. Ɩbʋ mʋ́tɔ́á ɔlɛhɩɛ su kokóli mʋ sɩ, támɛ omenya mʋ́tɔ́ ɔkpa.
Ɔdɔm amʋ bɛblɩ́ asʋ́n tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ nklobítɔ tsú Yesu ɩwɩ. Akʋ bɛɛ, “Ɔha wankláán ogyi.” Akʋ ɛ́ bɛɛ, “Ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ, ɔdɛ ahá mlɛ́.”
Anɩ Wíe Bulu lɛ́lɩɩ́ amʋ́ ɔma. Mʋ́ sʋ amʋ́tɔ́ ahá tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ bohogyi, dámlí klʋntɔ ba anɩ Wíe Yesu wá.
Bulu lɔ́hɔ anɩsʋ gyi, ɔlɔpʋ mʋ asʋn wankláán ámʋ wá anɩ ɩbɩtɔ. Mʋ́ anɩdɛ́blɩ́ nɩ́! Megyí anyánkpʋ́sa ansɩ́tɔ́ anɩdɛ́kɩ́ɩ blɩ́ mʋ́, Bulu yin anɩ klʋntɔ.
Nkálɩ kʋ́ráá abɔ́kʋkʋ da Bulu ɩpán? Mʋláhá anɩlatsʋn anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristosʋ gyi asʋ.
Ɔsʋrapʋá ɔhɩ́ɛ́ ɔma ɔhaa tɔpʋ́ ansɩ́ dɩ́nká Bulusʋ, tsíá bɔ mpáɩ ɔpa onyé, kʋ́lɩ́ Bulu tɔ́á ɩdɛ mʋ hián.
Bɔtʋ ndɛ mlɩmɔ́kʋ́fɩ́tɛ́ tɔtɔɔtɔ mɩ́ ɩdátɔ́. Mlɩfɩtɛ, ɔbɛ́ha mlɩ, mɛ́nɩ ɩbɛ́hɩɛ wá mlɩ ansigyí.
Ɔkpábi fʋgyi asa Bulu lɛ́tɩ fʋ́? Ɩmáhan fʋ. Támɛ nɩ́ ɔkpa ɩbá ánɩ́ fégyi ɩwɩ á, kʋsʋ mʋ́sʋ́.
Bʋbʋ mlɩtɔ dodo. Amʋ́ dɛ́ mlɩ nsɩnɛ́ yintá nɩ́. Amʋ́ onutó agywɩɩn dɛ́ amʋ́ kpa, tsúfɛ́ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ má amʋ́tɔ́.

Mlɩ Galatiafɔ, mlɩ ɩwɩ lawá mɩ́ ifú ánɩ́ mlɩlawúna yinkí Bulu ɔma. Bulu lɔ́tsʋn Kristo awɩtɔlɛsʋ tɩ́ mlɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ, mlɩbɔ́bwɛ mʋ ahá. Mlɩkɩ alɩá mlɩlawúna mlɩdɛ́ asʋn bambá hɔ́ɔ mlɩaa, mʋ́gyí asʋn wankláán ámʋ.
Mlɩbɔ mbɔ́dɩ́ amlɩha iwilwii itsia mlɩa ɔhagyíɔha nsɩnɛ́. Mlɩtsia nkpa ánɩ́ mʋ́ ɩwɩ lɛtɩn, tsúfɛ́ ɔhá ánɩ́ mʋ ɩwɩ mɛ́tɩn móowun anɩ Wíe.
Yesu lɛ́bláa amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mlɩtswɩ asawu amʋ wa gyɔpɩsʋ fʋ́n, mlɛ́lɛ aye.” Mʋ́ sʋ bɔtswɩ wa ɩnʋ. Aye lɔbʋlá asawu amʋ, bʋmɛtalɩ́ bɩ́tɩ́ mʋ́ lɛ́.
Ketétɩ́ɩn ntɛ́ɛ ketémátɩn megyí tɔtɔ. Bulu mbla ámʋsʋ gyí mboún gyí asʋ́n.

Nɩ́ ɔkʋ klɛ́ gyí ahá atɛtɔ-ɔnlɩn wa á, ɔwá ahá atɛtɔ-ɔnlɩn. Nɩ́ ɔkʋ ɛ́ klɛ́ gyí atɔ́ kie á, ɔlɛ́ ɩwɩtɔ okie mʋ́. Nɩ́ ɔkʋ klɛ́ gyí ahá ɔnɔ́ lɩɩ́ á, ɔwáa nsi ɔbwɛ mʋ́. Nɩ́ ɔkʋ klɛ́ ɛ́ gyí ahá nwɛ wúun a, ɔbwɛ́ɛ mʋ́ ɔdwɛtɔ.
Mʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɛfɩtɛ́ amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mlɩlénya Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ brɛ́á mlɩlóhogyi?” Bɛlɛ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ bɛɛ, “Anɩmɔ́kʋ́nú kɩ ánɩ́ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ kʋ bʋ ɩnʋ.”
Nɩ́ ɔkʋ mégyi asʋ́n ánfɩ anɩlawánlɩ́n sɩ́sɩ́ mlɩ ánfɩsʋ á, mlɩkɩ mʋ wankláán. Mlɩa mʋnyɔ mlɩmágyi mba, mɛ́nɩ pɛ́lɩ bɛ́kɩtá mʋ.
Apíó, tɔ́á ndɛblɩ́ gyí, anɩ ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ anfɩ́ igyi ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ mʋ́a obugya anfɩ iméenya ogyíkpá Bulu iwíegyí ámʋtɔ. Tɔ́á iteyíntá ɩmɛ́ɛtalɩ́ nyá ogyíkpá tɔ́á ɩtamayíntátɔ́.

Mlɩmáwun ipian atogyihɛ ánɩ́ iteyíntá sʋ. Mboún mlɩwun ipian mʋ́á ibétsiá yɔ́, ɩbɛ́ha nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá, ánɩ́ mɩ́, Nyankpʋsa-Mʋ-Bi ánfɩ nɛ́ha mlɩ sʋ. Tsúfɛ́ mɩ́ mɩ́ Sɩ́ Bulu lahɩɛ nsʋ ánɩ́ mbʋ ɔkpa há mʋ́.”
Nɩ́ mlɔkʋ́lɩ́ kʋ́ráá á, ɔtamahá mlɩ, tsúfɛ́ agywɩɩn laláhɛ mlɩtɔpʋ́kʋ́lɩ́ mʋ. Alɩá mlɔ́pʋwá ɩwɩ ansigyí sʋ mlɩdɛ́ mʋ kʋlɩ́.
Mlɩda anɩ Sɩ́ Bulu ɩpán tógyítɔ́tɔ́ brégyíbrɛ́, anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo ɩdátɔ́.
Mlɩpʋkɩ anɩ náin Abraham. Ɩbʋ Bulu asʋn wanlɩ́nhɛ́ amʋtɔ ánɩ́, “Abraham lɔ́hɔ Bulu gyi. Mʋ́ sʋ Bulu lótsu mʋ ánɩ́ mʋ asʋ́n da ɔkpa.”
Wúlu amʋ imehián owí ntɛ́ɛ ɔtsra wankɩ́ mʋ́tɔ́, tsúfɛ́ Bulu numnyam tɔwánkɩ́ há mʋ́, Okúfabi amʋ ɛ́ gyí mʋ́ ɔkandɩ́ɛ.
Támɛ Bulu Ɔŋɛ́ bʋ mlɩtɔ lɛ́lɛ́. Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩmɛ́ɛtrá tsiá mlɩ tsiátɔ́ amʋ́ʋ́ lakpan legyi mʋ́sʋ́ ámʋ. Mlɔ́bwɛ tɔ́á Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ tekle. Nɩ́ ɔkʋ má Kristo Ɔŋɛ́ ámʋ a, omegyí mʋ klɛ.
Támɛ nɩ́ Yudafɔ ámʋ́ʋ́ besi mʋ hógyi amʋ beyinkí bɔhɔ mʋ gyi a, Bulu ɔbɛ́lapʋ́ amʋ́ tsá oyí ámʋsʋ. Tsúfɛ́ ɔbʋ túmi ánɩ́ obéyinkía amʋ́ tsá.
Bʋtamawá afunu, ɔlala kʋkʋ ɛ́ ɩma amʋ́ ɩwɩ.
Támɛ natsúlá ánɩ́ ntosúm anɩ anáin Bulu tsʋn anɩ Wíe Ɔkpa ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋdɛ mʋ́ tɩ ɔpasua laláhɛ amʋsʋ. Nɔhɔ Mose Mbla ámʋ pʋ́ mʋ́á Bulu ɔnɔ́sʋ́ atɔɩ́pʋ́ amʋ bɔwanlɩ́n tswɩ ɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́sʋ́ gyi.
Mlɩmákɩtá ɔhaa ɩkɔ dʋn mlɩ abadwɛ. Nɩ́ ɔkʋ dɛ́ mʋ aba dwɛ á, ɔdɛ mbla ámʋ fɛ́ɛ́sʋ́ gyí.
Owí ámʋ ɩlɔtɔ okugyíɔkʋ. Bulu bʋ́ʋ túmi asʋn wunhɛ anfɩ fɛ́ɛ́sʋ́, támɛ bekiná bʋmɛdamlí klʋntɔ; pʋ́wá mʋ numnyam, mboún lwɩɩ́ bɔlwɩɩ́ mʋ.
Bɔpwɛ buntíi trihɛ fʋ́áhɛ́ kʋ bómlí mʋ́, ɩbʋ aklʋn akpɔnkpɔntɩ dúanyɔ. Bulu-abɔpʋ dúanyɔ bʋdɛ aklʋn ámʋ ɔnɔ́ gyo. Bɔwanlɩ́n Israel abusuan dúanyɔ ámʋ adá dɩ́nká aklʋn amʋsʋ ɩkʋlɛ-kʋlɛ.

Támɛ anɩ sʋ́ Kristo lémlí ɔha lwɩɩ́hɛ́ brɛ́á bɛda mʋ mántá oyikpalíhɛ amʋsʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ ɔlɛlɛ anɩ tsú ɩlwɩɩ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ mbla ámʋ lɛ́tɩ há anɩ ámʋ asɩ. Tsúfɛ́ Bulu asʋn wanlɩ́nhɛ́ ámʋ lɛ́blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Ɩlwɩɩ́ dɩn ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ bɛda mántá oyísʋ́.”
Tsúfɛ́ mlɩlanú mɩ́ tsiátɔ́ asʋ́n, alɩá ngyi brɛ́á mbuo Yudafɔ-osum ámʋ, pʋ́ alɩá nɛhɩɛ dɩ́nká Bulu ɔpasua ámʋsʋ, nɔbɔ mbɔ́dɩ́á nɛ́hɩ amʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́.
Ɔlɛkɩtá bʋ́tɩ́, ogyi ɩwɔ dada amʋ́ʋ́ bʋtɛtɩ́ mʋ Ɔbʋnsám ntɛ́ɛ Satan amʋ, ɔlɔwa mʋ ɩkan nfí ɔpɩ́m-ɔkʋlɛ.

Alɩ brɛ́ ámʋtɔ á, ɔfápʋ́ kpɔnkpɔntɩ ɔkʋá bʋtɛtɩ́ mʋ Simon bʋ wúlu amʋtɔ. Brɛ́á Filipo mɔ́kʋ́ba ɩnʋ á, ɔtɔbwɛ́ túmila súná mʋ pɩ amʋ, ɩtɔwá amʋ́ ifú. Ɔtɔpʋ́ ɩbɩ sí kántɔ́ blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, otúmípʋ kpɔnkpɔntɩ mʋgyi.
Mɩ́ agywɩɩn gyí, ndekléá nɛ́bɩ Kristo pʋ́ túmi ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lɔ́pʋkʋ́sʋ́a mʋ tsú afúlitɔ ámʋ tsɩ́a. Ndekléá nówun ipian fɛ́ alɩá Kristo lówun ipian wú,
Mákɔsɩ́ tsíá yáɩ́ ɔha ɔpasua ɔhandɛ. Máwa ɩbɩ ɔha bambá lalahɛbwɛtɔ. Ha fʋ́ ɩwɩ ɩtɩn brégyíbrɛ́.
Suna atsɩ dɛhɛn ɛ́ abʋtsia tsiátɔ́á ɩlɛkanáa Bulu osúmpʋ́. Bʋmábwɛ ahá ɩwɩ asʋ́n ablɩ́pʋ́, ntɛ́ɛ ntakpan anúpʋ. Mboún bʋsúna tɔ́á ɩbʋ alɛ́.
Ɩbʋ alɛ́á obétsiá ɔká, támɛ nɩ́ ometepí tsía a, ɩbʋ alɛ́ dʋn.
Mlɩbwɛ dɩnka Bulu asʋ́n ámʋsʋ, mlɩmábwɛ mʋ́ anupʋ́ kɛkɛ. Nɩ́ mlɔbwɛ́ mʋ́ anupʋ́ kɛkɛ a, ɩwɩ mlɩdɛ́mlɛ́.
Mʋ́ ɔma a, Yesu létsiá kí Galilea ɔmátɔ́. Omekleá ɔbɔ́yɔ Yudea ɔmátɔ́, tsúfɛ́ Yudafɔ ahandɛ amʋ bʋdɛ mʋ tɛ́ɛ abʋmɔ mʋ.
Bulu sʋ mlɩa Kristo Yesunyɔ mlɩlabwɛ́ kʋlɛ, alapʋ́ Kristo bwɛ́ anɩ nyánsa. Mʋlátsú anɩ ánɩ́ anɩ asʋ́n da ɔkpa mʋ ansɩ́tɔ́, alabwɛ́ anɩ mʋ ahá. Alahɔ anɩ lɛ́ lakpan nkpábitɔ, há anɩlagyi ɩwɩ.
Ɔlɛtsɛɩ́ ntsu wá onuwétɔ́, olefi asɩ ɔdɛ mʋ akasɩ́pʋ́ amʋ ayabiasɩ fwɩ. Ɔfwɩ́ ɔmáyín a, alapʋ́ mʋ osíétɔ́ ɔsan ámʋ tsítsi mʋ ayabiasɩ.
Ahá ánɩ́ bʋna anɩ Wíe ɔkpa ánfɩsʋ á, nɛdɩnká amʋ́sʋ́. Nɔmɔ akʋ kʋ́ráá. Nɛkɩtá amʋ́tɔ́ atsɩ mʋ́a ayin akʋ, kɩ́klɩ amʋ́ yɔ́twsɩ obu.
Ɩna Yesu ɩwɩ asʋ́n ánfɩ sʋ ɩkʋlɛbwɛ metsiá amʋ́tɔ́.

Ndɛ mlɩ kokóli mbɛ́ɛ, mlɩkɩ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lapʋ́wá mlɩ ɩbɩtɔ amʋsʋ wankláán fɛ́ akúfa ɔkpapʋ́. Ɩmábwɛ mlɩ fɛ́ bʋdɛ mlɩ hɩɛ, mboún mlɩbwɛ mʋ́ tsu mlɩ klʋntɔ alɩá Bulu déklé. Megyí sika ɔnsɩ́pɛ sʋ, mboún ɔdwɛá mlɩbʋ ha osum ámʋ sʋ.
Lakpan igyi ɔkpɛ ánɩ́ ɩtɔmɔ́, Mose mbla ámʋ ɛ́ ɩtɛhá lakpan túmi.
Mlɩkaɩn ánɩ́ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ mlɩlɔ́bɔ ɩpa, bɔyɔ agyʋ́má mlɩ ndɔtɔ, támɛ mlɩlékiná amʋ́ ɩkɔ ka ámʋ isú latʋ́ Bulu, túmi fɛ́ɛ́ Owíe amʋ.
Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩlɛ agywɩɩn laláhɛ kugyíkʋ lɛ mlɩtɔ. Mlɩmátrá mlɛ́ aba, ntɛ́ɛ bwɛ́ apinabwɛbí. Mlɩmátrá pɛ ansɩ́ abasʋ, ntɛ́ɛ tsii aba.
Mbla lɛ́klɩ́ ɔtsɩ ánɩ́ oméekiná mʋ kulu yɔ́fʋn mʋ owukɛ́. Támɛ nɩ́ oyin ámʋ owú á, ɔbʋ ɔkpa tsía oyin ánɩ́ odeklé. Támɛ ilehián ánɩ́ ɔhá ámʋ ɔbɔ́bwɛ Okristoyin.
Bafwɩ́ dalɩ ɔnɔkwalɩ ɔkpa ámʋsʋ yɔ́ bʋdɛblɩ́ bɛɛ, kʋsʋ́ tsú afúlitɔ laba bɔtsʋn, bʋdɛ akʋ hógyi yintá.
Tsúfɛ́ nɩ́ anɩa Kristo Yesu anɩgyí kʋlɛ a, ketétɩ́ɩn ntɛ́ɛ ketémátɩn mehián. Mʋ́á idehián gyí anɩbʋ hógyiá ɩtɛhá anɩtɔdwɛ́ Bulu pʋ́ anɩ aba.
Ɩ́nɩá ɔlɔbwɛ tógyítɔ́á Bulu lɔ́wa mʋ bwɛ sʋ á, olemlí ɔkpa ánɩ́ ahá ánɩ́ bʋtobú mʋ fɛ́ɛ́ bɔ́tsʋn mʋ́sʋ́ nyá nkpahɔ́ɔ ánɩ́ ɩtamatá.
Ɩtswɩtswɩ ha Bulu ahá ánɩ́ bʋbʋ Yerusalem asʋ́n ámʋ ɛ́ á, mlɩbwɛ mʋ́ fɛ́ alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ nɛbláa ɔpasua ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩbʋbʋ Galatia ɔmátɔ́ mbɛ́ɛ bʋbwɛ́ɛ mʋ́ ámʋ.
Ɔtsɩ, ba ɩwɩasɩ ha fʋ́ kúlu fɛ́ alɩá fʋtɛba ɩwɩasɩ há Kristo.
Ɩ́nɩ ɔma a, Yesu léyinkí bláa Farisifɔ ámʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mɩ́gyí ɔyɩ́tɔ́ wankɩ nɩ. Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ obuo mɩ obénya wankɩ ánɩ́ ɩbɛ́ha mʋ nkpa, oméesin oklúntɔ ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ.”
Támɛ apíó adwɛpʋ́, mlɩkaɩn asʋ́n ánɩ́ anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo sumbí ayɔpʋ́ ámʋ bɛbláa mlɩsʋ.
Ɔtamadúnká tɔtɔ tsú ɔhaa wá, mɛ́nɩ ɩbwɛ fɛ́ tɔkʋ tehían mʋ. Tsúfɛ́ mʋtɛ́há ahá fɛ́ɛ́ nkpa, ɔŋɛ́ pʋ́ tógyítɔ́á itehían amʋ́.
Nɩ́ ahá begyi adánsɩɛ súná anɩ, anɩtohogyi a, mʋ́mʋ́ ilehián ánɩ́ abɔ́hɔ Bulu klɛ́ dʋn. Tsúfɛ́ mʋ onutó légyi mʋ Bi ámʋ ɩwɩ adánsɩɛ.
Mboún mlɩpʋ anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo tin mlɩ ɩwɩ. Mlɩmátrá tsiá tsiátɔ́ dada amʋ́ʋ́ mlɩ ɔwɔ́lɩ laláhɛ tekle amʋ.
Hógyi lɛ́ha Israelfɔ bɛnatɩ́ bómlí abuntíi ánɩ́ bɔpʋgyi ɩban wá Yeriko wúlu nkensíénɔ́, ilobwie bun gbloo.
Bulu lɔ́tsʋn Paulosʋ bwɛ́ ofúla akpɔnkpɔntɩ kʋ.
Yesu lɛ́lɛ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Ɔnɔkwalɩ ndɛ mlɩ bláa. Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔtɔbwɛ́ lakpan á, ogyi lakpan ɔkpábi.
Apíó adwɛpʋ́, ɩ́nɩá Bulu lɛ́hɩɛ dwɛ́ anɩ alɩ sʋ á, ilehián ánɩ́ anɩ ɛ́ abɔ́dwɛ aba.
Fʋ́lósuná mɩ́ ɔkpa ánɩ́ ntsʋ́ʋn mʋ́sʋ́, mɩ́ anya nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá. Nɩ́ fʋ́bʋ mɩ́ wá á, ansɩ́ bégyi mɩ ekekegyíɛkɛ.’ ”
Nɩ́ mlefia a, bɔ mbɔ́dɩ́ afʋtsia kla Bulu asʋ́n suna amʋ́. Da asʋ́n ámʋ ɔkan, afʋsuna amʋ́ atɔ́ alɩɩ yɔ́fʋn brɛ́á nɛ́ba.
Bʋdɛ anɩ háan ɔkpagyíɔkpasʋ, támɛ bʋmɔkʋ́tálɩ́ sá anɩ tin. Ɩwɩ dɛ anɩ klɩ́, támɛ ɩmɔkʋ́kpɔn anɩ.
Támɛ amʋ́tɔ́ akʋ bɔbwɛ ahógyipʋ amʋ ahinlá bɛɛ, “Ntá banu bʋ.”
Abwiá igyi fɛ́ ahʋhwɛ́ bɔpʋpwɛ́ abuntíi amʋ. Bɔpʋ sika pɛpɛá tɔtɔ mɛfráa mʋ́, igyi fɛ́ gláasɩ pwɛ́ wúlu amʋ.
Nowun Bulu-abɔpʋ asienɔ́ amʋ́ʋ́ bɔpʋ asʋn wunhɛ kpɔnkpɔntɩ asienɔ́ bá amʋ. Bɛdalɩ tsu Ɔwankɩ́kpá ɩnʋ. Bɔwa ɔhráda atadɩɛá ɩlɔwankɩ́, ɩdɛ ogyá kpa, bɔpʋ sika pɛpɛ ɔfɛ́ tsán.
Mlɩyula ahá ánɩ́ bʋdɩn mlɩsʋ. Mlɩyula amʋ́, mlɩmálwɩɩ́ amʋ́.
Mʋ ayabi dɛ ogyá kpa fɛ́ kɔɔ́brɩ ánɩ́ bafwɩ́ mʋ́ lɛ́ ogyátɔ́ ɩnʋnʋ. Mʋ ɔmɛ idetsulá fɛ́ ntsuá ɩdɛkpa yi.
Nɛlɛ fʋ́ súná amʋ́. Nɛ́trá lɛ fʋ́ súná amʋ́. Fówun ɔdwɛ ámʋ́ʋ́ fʋtɔdwɛ́ mɩ́ ámʋ itsia amʋ́tɔ́, mɛ́nɩ mɩ́ ɛ́ nétsiá amʋ́tɔ́.”
Bulu mékiná mʋ onutó mʋ Bi ámʋ si há lowu anɩ fɛ́ɛ́ nwunsʋ. Olesi mʋ há faan. Nkálɩ sʋ́ ɔmɔ́ɔpʋ atɔ́ tráhɛ fɛ́ɛ́ tsɩ́a mʋ Bi ámʋtɔ há anɩ?
Bɛbláa mlɩ bɛɛ, “Nkɛ tráhɛ amʋtɔ á, ahinlá abwɛpʋ́ bɛ́ba. Bóbuo amʋ́ ɔwɔ́lɩ laláhɛ.”

Mʋ́ alɩ sʋ á, mlɩmákɩ mlɩaa mlɩ dʋn oyí ámʋ onutó abámbi amʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lɛ́kpalɩ́ lɛ́ ámʋ. Mlɩmátsu ɩwɩ amʋ́ ansɩ́tɔ́, tsúfɛ́ oyí ámʋ nlín tamanu ntsu lɛ́ mlɩtɔ. Mlɩ mboún tonu ntsu lɛ́ mʋ́tɔ́ pʋ́dan.

Anɩmédékléá ɩbɔ́bwɛ fɛ́ anɩdɛ́ mlɩ hɩɛ alɩá mlɔ́pʋ mlɩ hógyi yɔ́ agyʋ́má. Mboún alɩá ansɩ́ bégyi mlɩ sʋ́ anɩa mlɩnyɔ anɩdɛ́ agyʋ́má yɔ. Anɩyin ánɩ́ mlɩ hógyi sʋ mlɩlɩ́ɩ́ kínkíínkín dodo.
Oyin ɔkʋá bʋtɛtɩ́ mʋ Lasaro mʋa mʋ apio tsɩhɛ́ Maria pʋ́ Marta betsiá Betania wúlutɔ. Oyin ámʋ lɔ́lɔ.
Mʋ́ sʋ ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ omegyi atosunáhɛ́ anfɩsʋ á, megyí nyankpʋsa omédébu. Mboún Bulu ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɔpʋ mʋ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ há mlɩ ámʋ.
Ɩ́nɩ apʋ́bɩ ánɩ́ ɔŋɛ́ ámʋ itsú Bulu wá nɩ́. Nɩ́ ɔkʋ dɛ́ atɔ́ suná, ɔlɛblɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, Yesu Kristo lɛ́lɩn fɛ́ nyankpʋsa a, mʋ́mʋ́ mʋ atosunáhɛ́ amʋ itsú Bulu wá.
Alɩ́ nkude akúnpʋ anfɩ ɛ́ bʋtokun nkude nɩ. Ɩtɛhá amʋ́ bʋtɔbwɛ́ lakpan pʋ́kpɔ́ɩ́ amʋ́ ɩwɩ, bʋtamanyá Bulu túmi ifú. Bʋtɛblɩ́ abususʋ pʋ́kpɔ́ɩ́ ɔŋɛ́á ɩbʋ numnyam ɛ́.
Osíi lalahɛ bwɛ, ɔbwɛ́ɛ yilé. Odúnka iwilwii, ogyáa mʋ́ ɔkpa.

Támɛ ilehián ánɩ́ mlɔ́hɔ asʋ́nsʋ́ ánfɩ gyi, lɩ́ɩ́ kínkíínkín. Mlɩmáha abʋtsɛ mlɩ agywɩɩn lɛ ɩtɔ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ mlɩdɛ́ mʋ́ ɔkpa kɩ́ɩ, asʋn wankláán ámʋ lapʋ́ba mlɩ ámʋsʋ. Asʋn wankláán ánfɩ osúmpʋ́ mɩ́ Paulo ngyi nɩ́. Asʋ́n ánfɩ ɔkan bʋdɛda ɔyɩ́tɔ́ fɛ́ɛ́ ɛ́ nɩ́.
Yesu lénya blɩ́ alɩ pɛ́, ahá ámʋ bɔkʋlá abwi bɛɛ abʋtswɩ da mʋ mɔ. Támɛ Yesu lɔ́bwɛ hɩ́ɛ́ɛ́, dálɩ Bulu ɔtswɛ́kpa wunsɩnɛ́sʋ́ ɩnʋ.
Mlɩtsia tsiátɔ́ pɔpwɛá igyi Bulu atsiábi, mʋ́ ɩwɩ lɛtɩn, ɩna dɩ́nká ɔnɔkwalɩ ɔkpa ámʋsʋ.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ́ ilehián ánɩ́ Bulu ahá bótomi lɩ́ɩ́ kínkín, gyi Bulu mblasʋ, wá ɔnɔkwalɩ há Yesu nɩ.
Támɛ Bulu lɔ́kʋsʋ́a Yesu tsú afúlitɔ.
“Mɩ́gyí akúfa ɔkpapʋ́ wankláán ámʋ nɩ. Akúfa ɔkpapʋ́ wankláán totsúlá hʋ́lɩ mʋ nkpa há mʋ akúfa.
Nyin ánɩ́ mlɩlanú awɩtɔlɛá Bulu lɔ́wa há mɩ́, pʋ́ agyʋ́má ánfɩ wá mɩ́ ɩbɩtɔ ɔbɛ́ɛ, mbwɛ́ɛ, ɩwa labi ha mlɩ.
Tɔɩ kpla ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔtɛtɩ́ ɩtrɛ́ wá ahá nsɩnɛ́ tse nyɔ pɛ́. Mʋ́ ɔma a, si mʋ asʋ́n.
Mʋ asʋn blɩ́hɛ́ anfɩ sʋ Yudafɔ ahandɛ amʋ bʋmɛtrá bwɛ kʋlɛ.
Támɛ ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔlɔhɔ mʋ asʋn blɩ́hɛ́sʋ gyi dɛ́ mʋ́sʋ́ si ánɩ́ Bulu asʋ́n igyi ɔnɔkwalɩ.
Mʋ́ sʋ apíó adwɛpʋ́, ɩ́nɩá mlɩgyó ɩ́nɩ sʋ á, mlɩyɩrɩ ɩwɩ amlɩtsia tsiátɔ́á mʋ́ ɩwɩ lɛtɩn, ɔlala méetsiá mlɩ ɩwɩ Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́, mɛ́nɩ iwilwii bétsiá mlɩa mʋnyɔ nsɩnɛ́.
Ɩtráhɛ-tráhɛ a, apíó, mlɩbɔ mpáɩ ha anɩ. Anɩ Wíe asʋ́n ámʋ ɩkɔ́sɩ klɛɩ. Ahá abʋpʋ obú hɔ mʋ́ fɛ́ alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ mlɩ ɛ́ mlɩlɔ́hɔ mʋ́ ámʋ.
Anɩyin ánɩ́ alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lɔ́kʋsʋ́a anɩ Wíe Yesu tsú afúlitɔ ámʋ a, alɩ kɛ́n ɔbɔ́kʋsʋ́a anɩ, ɔbɛ́kpa anɩa mlɩnyɔ fɛ́ɛ́ ba mʋ ɩwɩ wá nɩ́.
Nɩ́ ɔkʋ dɛ́lɔ mlɩtɔ á, ɔtɩ́ɩ ɔpasua ahandɛ abʋba bokokóli Bulu, abʋkpa mʋ ofobí anɩ Wíe ɩdátɔ.
“Brɛ́á Mose lɔ́hɔ nfí adʋana (40) á, ɔlɔbwɛ agywɩɩn ɔbɛ́ɛ, mɔ́yɔ yɛ́kɩ alɩá Egyiptefɔ bɔpʋ bʋdɛ mʋ apíó Israelfɔ kpa.
Ndɛ fʋ́ ɩbɩ ha ánɩ́ Yudafɔ lɛ́kɩtá oyin ánfɩ, bʋdekléá bɔ́mɔ mʋ, támɛ mɩ́a ɩsá akɔpʋ́ tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ anɩlɔ́yɔ́hɔ mʋ lɛ́ amʋ́ ɩbɩ. Tsúfɛ́ nonu ánɩ́ Romayin ogyi.
Kpokiti lɛda wúlu amʋtɔ fɛ́ɛ́. Ahá ámʋ bɛkɩtá Paulo abúopʋ Gaio mʋa Aristarko ánɩ́ botsú Makedonia srɩ́ pʋ́ amʋ́ ya wúlu ofíakpa.
Mlɩlékiná Ɔha Wankɩ́hɛ́ pʋ́ Yilé Ɔbwɛpʋ́ ánfɩá bɔwanlɩ́n mʋ ɩwɩ asʋ́n wá Bulu asʋ́n ɔwʋlʋ́tɔ́ anfɩ, bláa Pilato mlɩaa, osíi ahá ɔmɔpʋ́ ámʋ mboún ha mlɩ.
Olosuná ánɩ́ bʋmegyí ɔtsan há anɩ, tsúfɛ́ ɔlɛha amʋ́ klʋntɔ lɛtɩn brɛ́á amʋ́ ɛ́ bohogyi.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ ilehián ánɩ́ mlɔ́yɔ mlɩ nwuntɔ wankláán, asa mlégyi bodobodo anfɩ, nu ntá-ɛwɛ ánfɩtɔ.
Mʋ́ sʋ apíó adwɛpʋ́, mlɩlɩɩ kínkíínkín, mlɩmákpɩnkɩ́. Mlɩsi mlɩ ɩwɩ fɛ́ɛ́ ha Bulu agyʋ́má brégyíbrɛ́, tsúfɛ́ mlɩyin ánɩ́ mlɩ gyumagyihɛ mɔ́ɔbwɛ kpaalɩ.
Mʋ́ sʋ ndɛ mlɩ kokóli, mlɩkasɩ mɩ́ tsiátɔ́.
Bulu lɔ́pʋ mʋ onutó nyánsa bwɛ́ mʋ́. Nyankpʋsa mɛ́ɛtalɩ́ pʋ́ mʋ nyánsa bɩ́ mʋ ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ. Mʋ́ sʋ alapʋ́ anɩ mimlá ɔkan amʋ́ʋ́ anɩdɛ́da ámʋ hɔ ahá ánɩ́ bahɔ mʋ gyi nkpa.
Atsɩ, mlɩbu mlɩ akúlu alɩ kɛ́n, mɛ́nɩ nɩ́ amʋ́tɔ́ akʋ bʋmɔhɔ Bulu asʋ́nsʋ́ gyi kʋ́ráá, bowun mlɩ tsiátɔ́ a, ɩbɛ́tsɛ amʋ́, megyí mlɩ obétepí trá bláa amʋ́ asʋansʋ.
Kristo atsɩámɩ anɩgyí, Bulu dɛ́tɔɩ́ tsʋn anɩsʋ há mlɩ. Mʋ́ sʋ anɩlɩ́ɩ́ Kristo ɔlɩɩ́kpá anɩdɛ́ mlɩ kokóli anɩaa, “Mlɩha Bulu ɔbwɛ mlɩ mʋ anyawíe!”
Támɛ Bulu lɛ́lɛ mʋ lowu sɩ́nsɩ́ɩ́nsɩ́ntɔ́, kʋ́sʋ́a mʋ tsú afúlitɔ. Tsúfɛ́ lowu mɛ́ɛtalɩ́ gyi mʋsʋ, osin afúlitɔ.
Megyí amʋ́ dɛ́ Kristo ɩdayilé ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩdɩn mlɩsʋ ámʋ kpɔɩ́ nɩ́?
Ɔmábwɛ nta ɔbʋpʋ́ ntɛ́ɛ ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔbʋ ɩyɩn. Ɔbwɛ́ɛ ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔlɛba ɩwɩasɩ, mʋ asʋ́n lolwií. Ɔmábwɛ ɔtrɛ́pʋ́, ɔmábwɛ kɔ́ba ɔdwɛpʋ́.
Támɛ ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ obónu ntsuá nɛ́ha mʋ a, ɔmɛwʋ́lɩ mɛ́ɛtrá kɩtá mʋ ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ. Ntsu ámʋ́ʋ́ nɛ́ha mʋ amʋ ɩbɛ́damlí ntsu ɔwɩ́kpa mʋtɔ ánɩ́ ɩbɛ́lɩn ha nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá.”
Támɛ nɩ́ ɔkʋ tegyi Bulu mblasʋ á, idesuná ánɩ́ mʋ Buludwɛ lɔfʋn. Tɔ́á ɩbɛ́ha abɛ́bɩ ánɩ́ kʋlɛbwɛ bʋ anɩa Bulu nsɩnɛ́ gyí, anɩtsie nkpa fɛ́ Yesu Kristo.
Ɩnʋ nowun ɔŋɛ laláhɛ asa akʋá bʋgyi fɛ́ agyóngyo, bɛdalɩ tsu bʋ́tɩ́ ámʋ ɔnɔ́tɔ́, ɔbwɩ ámʋ ɔnɔ́tɔ́ pʋ́ ɔnɔ́sʋ́ ɔtɔɩ́pʋ́ ofunupʋ amʋ ɔnɔ́tɔ́.
Bulu mbla ámʋ fɛ́ɛ́ nwun, bɔwanlɩ́n wá Bulu asʋn wanlɩ́nhɛ́ amʋtɔ gyí, “Dwɛ fʋ́ bá fɛ́ fʋ́ ɩwɩ.” Nɩ́ mlɩdɛ́ mʋ́sʋ́ gyi lɛ́lɛ́ á, mʋ́mʋ́ mlɩdɛ́ ɩtɔ wankláán bwɛ.
Tsúfɛ́ anɩmɛ́ná anɩmɛ́dɛ́ anɩ onutó ɩwɩ asʋ́n ɔkan da. Yesu Kristo ɩwɩ asʋ́n ɔkan anɩdɛ́da anɩaa, mʋgyí anɩ Wíe. Tɔ́á anɩtɛblɩ́ tsú anɩ ɩwɩ gyí, Yesu sʋ anɩlabwɛ́ mlɩ asúmpʋ́.
Mlɩmáha ahá ánɩ́ bʋtɛblɩ́ asʋ́n ánfɩ odu abʋmlɛ mlɩ! Tsúfɛ́ ahandɛ bɛɛ, “Mba laláhɛ gyí teyíntá ɔha.”

Iwilwii Ɔhapʋ́ Bulu, ɔlɔkʋsʋ́a anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo tsú afúlitɔ ámʋ ɔháa amlɩtalɩ bwɛ yilé kugyíkʋá odeklé. Ndɛ mʋ kokóli mbɛ́ɛ, ɔtsʋ́ʋn Yesu Kristosʋ ɔbwɛ tɔ́á odeklé anɩtɔ. Yesu gyí akúfa Ɔkpapʋ́ kpɔnkpɔntɩá Bulu lɔ́pʋ mʋ obugya ká ntam amʋ́ʋ́ ɩbʋ ɩnʋ brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́, mʋa mʋ akúfa, bʋgyi mʋ ahá amʋ nsɩnɛ́ nɩ́. Numnyam ɩbwɛ́ɛ mʋ klɛ yɔ́fʋn brɛ́á ɩtamatá! Amen.

Tɔ́á idehián séi gyí, mlɩha mlɩ tsiátɔ́ ɩkana Kristo asʋn wankláán ámʋ. Mʋ́mʋ́ nɩ́ nɛbá mlɩ wá ó, mmɛba ó, nónu ánɩ́ mlɩlɩ́ɩ́ kínkíínkín ɩkʋlɛbwɛtɔ; mlɩdɛ́ hógyi amʋ́ʋ́ ɩbʋ asʋn wankláán ámʋtɔ ámʋ ɛ́ nwun prɩ́ɩ.
Bulu lɔ́kʋsʋ́a anɩ Wíe Yesu tsú afúlitɔ. Ɔbɔ́pʋ mʋ túmi ámʋ kʋ́sʋ́a anɩ ɛ́.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ ndɛ fʋ́ kaɩ́n ánɩ́ fʋháa Bulu atokiehɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɛha fʋ́ brɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ nɔpʋ ɩbɩ dɩ́nká fʋ́sʋ́ ámʋ ɔnɔ́ ɩwa ogyá tsɩ́a mʋ́tɔ́.

Mʋ́ sʋ́ bɛyɛ́da Bulu asʋ́n wankláán ámʋ ɔkan há awupʋ́ nɩ́. Amʋ́ lowu ámʋ igyi ɩsʋá Bulu labɩ́tɩ́ amʋ́ ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ, fɛ́ alɩá ɔtɛbɩ́tɩ́ ɔhagyíɔha ɩsʋ. Bɛyɛ́da Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ ɔkan há amʋ́, mɛ́nɩ amʋ́ ɔkláa obénya nkpa fɛ́ alɩá Bulu bʋ nkpa.
Bulu lɔ́hɔ mlɩ ibíá kpékplékpéé. Ɩ́nɩ sʋ mlɩmábwɛ mlɩ ɩwɩ nkpábi há anyánkpʋ́sa.
Mlɩmálɛ Bulu ɩlá fɛ́ alɩá amʋ́tɔ́ akʋ bɔbwɛ, Bulu lɔ́pʋ ɔbɔpʋ sɩ́sɩ́, ɔlɔbɔmɔ amʋ́.
Anɩ mʋ́ anɩmégyí fɛ́ ahá ɔdʋdʋɔá bʋdɛ Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ fɛ pʋ́kle kɔ́ba. Ɩ́nɩá Bulu lɔ́wa anɩ sʋ á, anɩtɛblɩ́ mʋ́ ɔnɔkwalɩsʋ fɛ́ Kristo asúmbi ánɩ́ bʋlɩɩ́ Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́.
Ilehián ánɩ́ anɩ ahá ánɩ́ anɩ hógyi ɔnɔ́ bʋ ɔnlɩn abénya klʋn há ahá ánɩ́ amʋ́ hógyi ɔnɔ́ ɩma ɔnlɩn. Megyí tɔ́á iletsiá anɩ wʋlɛ abɔ́bwɛ.
Nahogyiá anɩ Wíe ɔbɛ́kpa mɩ́, ɩmɔ́ɔwa ɔpá mɩ́ onutó nɛ́ba mlɩ wá.
Ɩ́nɩ ɔma a, nowun Bulu-abɔpʋ ana, bʋlɩɩ́ ɔyɩ́ afʋnka ana ámʋ fɛ́ɛ́sʋ́. Bʋdɛ afú afʋnka ana ámʋtɔ kínkíínkín, mɛ́nɩ ɩmɛ́ɛtrá tsʋn ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ, ɔpʋsʋ ntɛ́ɛ oyí kʋkʋ.

Asa mlɩlébemlí Akristofɔ á, mlɩléyintá brɛ́ tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ tsíá bwɛ́ tɔ́á ahá ánɩ́ bʋmeyín Bulu bʋtekle bwɛ. Mʋ́ aná gyí; atsɩ mʋ́a ayin asʋ́nwa, ntábʋ, pléikpada mʋ́a ntakpan onúkpa yɔ pʋ́ ɩkpɩtswɛ́ɛ ánɩ́ ígyi mlɩ akisítɔ.
Nɩ́ ɔkʋ ɔbwɛ́ agywɩɩn ánɩ́ obépilán amʋ́ á, ogyá bɛ́dalɩ amʋ́ ɔnɔ́, hɔ mʋ mɔ́. Alɩ́ ɔhá ánɩ́ odekléá obépilán amʋ́ obówu nɩ́.
Paulo lɛ́bláa amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mɩ́ apíó, mmeyín mbɛ́ɛ, mʋgyí Bulu igyí ɔhapʋ́ dɛhɛn. Tsúfɛ́ bɔwanlɩ́n wá Bulu asʋ́n ámʋtɔ bɛɛ, ‘Máblɩ́ ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔdɛ fʋ́ ɔmásʋ́ gyí ɩwɩ asʋn laláhɛ.’ ”
Akɩ́aɩ obésin ɩban ámʋ ɔma. Amʋ́ gyí; atɔ́ alapʋ́, mbʋa atɔpʋ́, ahá amɔpʋ́, ɩkpɩ atswɛ́pʋ pʋ́ ahá ánɩ́ bʋtekle afunu, bʋtɔwá mʋ́ ɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́.

Támɛ mʋ́ ó á, mbʋ fʋ́ ɩwɩ asʋ́n kpalobí kʋ. Mlɩtɔ akʋ bʋbuo Balaam amʋ́ʋ́ olosuná Balak† alɩá ɔbɔ́bwɛ Israelfɔ bɔ́bwɛ lakpan, ɔlɛha amʋ́ betsiá wá atsɩ mʋ́a ayin asʋ́n, tsíá gyi ɔkpɩtɔ-atɔ́ ámʋ.
Apíó, ilehián ánɩ́ abɛ́da Bulu ɩpán mlɩ nwunsʋ brégyíbrɛ́. Tsúfɛ́ mlɩdɛ́dáan hógyitɔ tsɩ́a. Ɔdwɛá mlɩbʋ ha aba ɛ́ demoní tsɩ́a.
Mlɩyin ánɩ́ brɛ́á mlɩgyí ɔmátɔ́fɔ á, bosuná mlɩ asunakpan, ɩlɛha mlɩlɔ́yɔ mlɩdɛ́ ɩkpɩá bʋtamatɔ́ɩ́ sum.
Akúlu, mlɩdwɛ mlɩ aká fɛ́ alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ Kristo lɔ́dwɛ ɔpasua ámʋ, tsúlá bɔmɔ mʋ mʋ́ sʋ ámʋ.
Nɩ́ ɔkʋ ɔpʋ́ lalahɛ gyi mlɩ á, mlɩmápʋ lalahɛ ká mʋ ɩkɔ. Mlɩbɔ mbɔ́dɩ́ amlɩbwɛ tɔ́á ɩbʋ alɛ́á ahá fɛ́ɛ́ bótsulá dɩ́nká mʋ́sʋ́.
Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩba ɩwɩasɩ, amlɩpʋ mlɩ ɩwɩ wa Bulu túmi kpɔnkpɔɔnkpɔntɩ ámʋ asɩ, fówun obótsu mlɩ fʋ́á mʋ brɛ́ wankláántɔ́.
Támɛ mʋ́ ó á, Bulu mɔ́kʋ́sí atɔ wankláán tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ bwɛ, pʋ́súná ánɩ́ mʋbʋ ɩnʋ. Mʋtɛ́há nyankpʋ totswie, mlɩ ndɔtɔ atɔ́ tɔwá alɛ́. Mʋtɛ́há mlɩ atogyihɛ, ɔtɛhá ansɩ́ tegyi mlɩ.”
Alɩ kɛ́n mʋ ka* ɛ́ ɔbwɛ́ɛ ɔtsɩá obú bʋ mʋsʋ, ɔtamablɩ́ ahá ɩwɩ asʋn laláhɛ, otegyi ɩwɩsʋ, ɔbʋ ɔnɔkwalɩ tógyítɔ́tɔ́ nɩ.
Nakɩ mʋ ansɩ́tɔ́ ánɩ́ ɔbɛ́damlí klʋntɔ bobuo Bulu, támɛ omedékléá obési mbʋatɔ.

Brɛ́ kʋtɔ á, ɔblɔ́ lɛhɩɛ kɩ́tá Owíe Herode Tiro mʋ́a Sidonfɔ sʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ awúlu anyɔ ánfɩ bɛlɛ abí bɛɛ bʋyókokóli mʋ, iwilwii itsia amʋ́ nsɩnɛ́. Tsúfɛ́ Owíe Herode ɔmátɔ́ bʋtenyá atogyihɛ tsú. Ahá ámʋ begyankpá yɛ́lɛ asʋ́ntɔ́ súná Owíe Herode wóyísʋ́ ɔkɩ́pʋ ɔkʋá bʋtɛtɩ́ mʋ Blasto, olotsulá gya amʋ́ nkpá bɔyɔ Owíe Herode wá yókokóli mʋ.
Yesu lɛ́bláa amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Ɔŋɛ laláhɛ ma mɩ́tɔ́. Ntobú mɩ́ Sɩ́, támɛ mlɩ mʋ́ mlɩtamabú mɩ́.
Afú kpɔnkpɔntɩ kʋ lɛ́ba ɩdɛtsʋ́ʋn, ɔpʋ amʋ lɔ́wa dabɩ.
Nɩ́ nɛkɩ numnyam ánɩ́ ɩda gyo anɩ, Bulu ɔbɛ́lɛ súná anɩ á, ipian ánfɩ anɩdéwúun brɛ́ ánfɩtɔ ɩmɔfʋn mʋ́ ɔtɩnɛtɩnɛ.
Mɩ́ abí adwɛpʋ́, ndɛ ɔwʋlʋ́ ánfɩ wanlɩ́n sɩ́sɩ́ mlɩ, tsúfɛ́ Yesu Kristo sʋ Bulu lasí mlɩ lakpan kíé mlɩ.

Bulu lɔ́hɔ anɩ nkpa. Ɔlɛtɩ anɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ, abémlí mʋ aha wankɩ́hɛ́. Megyí tɔtɔ anɩlɔ́bwɛ sʋ. Mboún igyi tɔ́á mʋ onutó ɔlɔbwɛ agywɩɩn ánɩ́ ɔbɔ́bwɛ asa ɔyɩ́ lɛbɛlɩn. Ɔbɛ́ɛ, ɔbɔ́wa awɩtɔlɛ há anɩ, dwɛ́ anɩ tsʋn anɩa Kristo Yesunyɔ ɩkʋlɛbwɛsʋ.

Bulu igyí ahapʋ́ dɛhɛn pʋ́ Bulu ɔtswɛ́kpa agyópʋ amʋ benya wun mʋ pɛ́, bɔsʋrá okitikíti blɩ́ bɛɛ, “Da mʋ manta oyikpalíhɛsʋ! Da mʋ manta oyikpalíhɛsʋ!” Pilato lɛ́bláa amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mlɩ onutó mlɩkpa mʋ ya, amlɩyɛda mʋ manta oyikpalíhɛsʋ. Mɩ́ mʋ́ mmɔkʋ́wun lalahɛ kʋkʋ mʋ ɩwɩá nɔ́pʋhá mʋ ɩpɔ́n.”
Bulu ɔnɔ́sʋ́ atɔɩ́pʋ́ amʋ bɛblɩ́ nkpa ánfɩ Bulu ɔbɔ́hɔ mlɩ ánfɩ asʋ́n tswɩ. Bɛtɛtɛ́ɛ mʋ awɩtɔlɛ asʋ́n ánfɩtɔ wankláán, mɛ́nɩ bónu mʋ́ asɩ.
Ahá amlɛ́pʋ́ tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ baba ɔyɩ́ ánfɩtɔ. Bʋdɛblɩ́ bɛɛ Yesu Kristo mɛ́lɩn fɛ́ nyankpʋsa. Ahá ánfɩ gyí ahá amlɛ́pʋ́ pʋ́ Kristo alupʋ́ ámʋ nɩ.
Anɩlawun ánɩ́ atɔ́ oyintápʋ́ oyin ánfɩ gyí. Ɔtɛhá kpokiti tɛdá Yudafɔtɔ ɔyɩ́tɔ́ ɔtɩ́nɛgyíɔtɩ́nɛ́á ɔtɔyɔ́. Ɔtráa ogyi Nasaret ɔpasua ámʋ Bulu igyí ɔhapʋ́.

Ɔnɔkwalɩ, anɩ Bulusúm ɩwɩ asʋ́n ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩlalɩn ɔwan ámʋ lómoní. Mʋ́gyí, Kristo† lɛ́lɛ mʋ ɩwɩ súná fɛ́ nyankpʋsa. Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ lɛ́lɛ mʋ suná ánɩ́ yilé ɔbwɛpʋ́ ogyi. Bulu-abɔpʋ bowun mʋ, ahá bɛda mʋ asʋ́n ɔkan súná ɔmá fɛ́ɛ́. Ɔyɩ́tɔ́ ahá bɔhɔ mʋ gyi, Bulu lótsu mʋ ya ɔsʋ́sʋ́ numnyamtɔ.
Atsufolibi akpɔnkpɔntɩá mʋ́ odwintɔ bɔ́bwɛ fɛ́ kílo aduenu (50) lɛkpa tsú nwʋlʋ́táasʋ bɛda ahásʋ. Atsufolibi amʋ ɔnɔ́ ɔnlɩn sʋ bɔlwɩɩ́ Bulu.
Támɛ Bulu lɛ́hɩɛ ánɩ́ ɔbɔ́bwɛ ɔsʋ́ mʋ́a asɩ pɔpwɛ há anɩ. Ɔtɩ́nɛ́á ahá ánɩ́ amʋ́ asʋ́n da ɔkpa bétsiá. Mʋ́ anɩgyó nɩ́.
Nwʋlʋ́táa lokuntá fɛ́ ɔwʋlʋ́, tsú mʋ́ nátɩ́. Abʋ mʋ́a ɔpʋ nsɩnɛ́ ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ fɛ́ɛ́ lɛdalɩ mʋ́ otsiákpá.
Yesu Kristo lɔ́bwɛ Bulu apɛ́, pʋ́ mʋ ɩwɩ bɔ́ afɔdɩɛ anɩ nwunsʋ ɔtsáwʋlɛ pɛ́, há brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́. Mʋ́ sʋ anɩ ɩwɩ latɩn.
Nɩ́ anɩdɛ́ mpáɩ bɔ há mlɩ brégyíbrɛ́ á, anɩtɛdá Bulu ɩpán mlɩ fɛ́ɛ́ nwunsʋ.
Ɔpɔnkɔ pɛpɛ ɔkʋ lɛ́dalɩ ba. Bɛha mʋsʋ ɔdɩnkápʋ́ ɔdayí ɩya anyɔ tɩ́ntɩ́n kʋ. Bɛha mʋ túmi ánɩ́ ɔlɛ́ɛ iwilwii lɛ ɔyɩ́tɔ́. Mʋ́ sʋ ɩsá lɛda ɔtɩ́nɛgyíɔtɩ́nɛ́, ahá bɔmɔ aba.
Ilehián ánɩ́ nkpábiá bʋbʋ ɔpasua ámʋtɔ bɛ́hɩɛ bú amʋ́ awíe, mɛ́nɩ ɔhaa mɔ́ɔkpɔɩ́ Bulu mʋa anɩ atosunáhɛ́ amʋ.
Mlɩmáwa afunu súná aba, tsúfɛ́ mlɩlasí mlɩ tsiátɔ́ dada amʋ pʋ́ mʋ́ bwɛhɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́.

Támɛ asʋ́n ánɩ́ mbʋ ha fʋ́ gyí, fahá ɔtsɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋtɛtɩ́ mʋ Yesebel, ɔdɛ mʋ ɩwɩ tɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ, Bulu ɔnɔ́sʋ́ ɔtɔɩ́pʋ́ amʋ dɛ́pʋ mʋ atosunáhɛ́ mlɛ́ mɩ́ asúmpʋ́, bʋdɛ atsɩ mʋ́a ayin asʋ́n wa, bʋdɛ ɔkpɩtɔ-atɔ́ ɛ́ gyí.

Bulu asʋn wanlɩ́nhɛ́ amʋ lɛ́blɩ́ yáɩ́ ánɩ́ Bulu ɔbɔ́tsʋn ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋmegyí Yudafɔ ámʋ hógyisʋ, tsú amʋ́ ánɩ́ amʋ́ asʋ́n da ɔkpa. Ɩ́nɩ sʋ́ Bulu lɛ́bláa Abraham asʋn wankláán ámʋ dodoodo ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Fʋ́sʋ́ nɔ́tsʋn yulá ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ ahá fɛ́ɛ́.”
Mlɩmátan ɩtɔ́ɩ ánɩ́ Bulu lɔ́tɔɩ́ kplá mlɩ ánfɩ mlɩgyí mʋ abísʋ́. Ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mɩ́ bí, nɩ́ nɛbɩ́tɩ́ fʋ́ ɩsʋ á, máhɔ mʋ́ lalahɛ sʋ. Nɩ́ nɔwá ɩyɩn wa fʋ á, máha mʋ́ ɩkpɔn fʋ.

Mlɩbu mlɩ nkpá agyápʋ, amlɩba ɩwɩasɩ ha amʋ́. Tsúfɛ́ bʋtamadá ɔkpʋ́nʋ́ mlɩ ɔklásʋkɩ́ɩ sʋ. Bʋyin ánɩ́ bɛ́yɛlɛ alɩá bɔpʋkɩ anɩ ɔklásʋ ɔnɔ́ Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́. Mlɩha amʋ́ abʋbwɛ amʋ́ agyʋ́má ansigyísʋ́, megyí nwɛsʋ. Nɩ́ megyí alɩ á, ɩmɔ́ɔwa labi kʋkʋ há mlɩ.
Oleyintá ɔmá asienɔ́ kɛ́kɛ́ Kanaan ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ, oleye amʋ́ ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ amʋ pʋ́bwɛ́ siadɩɛ há anɩ anáin.
Nɩ́ ɔkʋ lósuná atɔ laláhɛ kʋ, mʋ́a anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo asʋn blɩ́hɛ́ pʋ́ Bulusúm atosunáhɛ́ amʋ ɩmɛná á,
Nɩ́ ɔkʋ ɔbá mlɩ wá, ɔmɛdɛ́ Kristo atosunáhɛ́ anfɩ suná á, mlɩmáhɔ mʋ wá mlɩ wóyítɔ́, mlɩmátsulá mʋ itsiá.
Alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ Kristo lɛ́hɩɛ wun ipian kpɔnkpɔɔnkpɔntɩ, anɩ ɛ́ anɩdɛ́ mʋ́ kʋ wúun amʋ a, alɩ́ kɛ́n Bulu ná Kristosʋ ɔhɩ́ɛ́ ɔdɛ anɩ klʋn lwií nɩ́.
Alɩ ahá ámʋ bʋgyɔ́wɩ! Tsúfɛ́ bapʋ́ Kain amʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɔmɔ mʋ gyama ámʋ ɔkpa. Bakʋla sika yɔ́bwɛ tɔ́á Bileam lɔ́bwɛ, bakʋ́sʋ́ lɩ́ɩ́ Bulusʋ fɛ́ Kora.‡ Mʋ́ sʋ Bulu ɔbɛ́hɩ amʋ́.
Támɛ ahá ánfɩ mʋ́ bʋtɛblɩ́ asʋn laláhɛ tsú tɔ́á bʋmonu mʋ́ asɩ ɩwɩ. Amʋ́ bwɛhɛ́ lɛlɩan mbwɩá bʋma agywɩɩn. Mʋ́gyí tɔ́á ɩtɛhɩ́ amʋ́ ɛ́ nɩ́.

Hógyitɔ Noa lónu asʋ́n ánɩ́ Bulu lɛ́bláa mʋ tsú tɔ́á ɩmɔkʋ́nyá ba ɩwɩ. Olobu Bulu, sré dáka kpɔnkpɔɔnkpɔntɩ, pʋ́hɔ mʋa mʋ wóyítɔ́ ahá nkpa, brɛ́á ntsu lɔbʋlá. Mʋ hógyi amʋ sʋ́ ɔyɩ́tɔ́ ahá begyi pɔ́n, ɔlɔbwɛ ɔhá ánɩ́ mʋ asʋ́n da ɔkpa Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́.
Alɩ́ bɛla ntobí ámʋ yáɩ́ ɩnʋ nɩ́. Bulu igyí ahapʋ́ ámʋ bʋtowíé obu gyankpapʋ, igyi Ɔwankɩ́kpá amʋtɔ ekekegyíɛkɛ yɔ́yɔ amʋ́ agyʋ́má.

Stefano lɔ́mɔ mʋ asʋ́n ɔnɔ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Asʋtɔ-ɔnlɩn awíé, klʋntɔ bʋ mlɩ odwin. Mlɩlakíná Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ nu. Mlɩ ɛ́ mlɩtɔkʋ́sʋ́ lɩ́ɩ́ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ asʋ́nsʋ́ brégyíbrɛ́, fɛ́ alɩá mlɩ anáin amʋ betsiá bwɛ́.

Támɛ ɩwánkɩ anɩ ánɩ́ megyí yilé abwɛpʋ́ sʋ Bulu lɔ́wa mbla ámʋ. Mboún ahá ánɩ́ bʋtamagyi mʋ́sʋ́, ahá ánɩ́ amʋ́ asʋtɔ bʋ amʋ́ ɔnlɩn, ahá ánɩ́ bʋtamanyá mʋ ifú, lakpan abwɛpʋ́, ahá ánɩ́ amʋ́ ɩwɩ mɛ́tɩn, ahá ánɩ́ bʋtɔkpɔ́ɩ́ Bulu, ahá ánɩ́ bʋtɔmɔ́ amʋ́ akwɩɩ́pʋ́ pʋ́ aha bambá,
Nɔwanlɩ́n wá ɔwʋlʋ́ kʋá nɔpʋsɩ́sɩ́ mlɩtɔ mbɛ́ɛ, mlɩmápʋ mbʋa atɔpʋ́ gyi mba.
Támɛ Bulu lɔ́wa awɩtɔlɛ há mɩ́. Ɔlɛlɛ mɩ́ yáɩ́ tsú brɛ́á mbʋ mɩ́ yín ɩwɩtɔ, ɔlɛtɩ mɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, nyɔ́ mʋ agyʋ́má.
Mmɛtálɩ́ bɩ́ mɩ́ tsiátɔ́, tsúfɛ́ megyí tɔ́á ndeklé ntɔbwɛ́, tɔ́á mmedéklé mboún ntɔbwɛ́.
Mboún mlɩyɔ mʋ́sʋ́, mɛ́nɩ anɩ Wíe pʋ́ anɩ Ɔlɛpʋ́ Yesu Kristo awɩtɔlɛ pʋ́ mʋ bɩ bómoní mlɩtɔ. Numnyam ɩbwɛ́ɛ mʋ klɛ tsú séi pʋ́ya brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́tɔ́! Amen.
Kristo sʋ́ anɩlabwɛ́ aha mimláhɛ, mlɩ mʋ́ mlɩlatɩn ansɩ́. Anɩgyí apɔ́npʋ, mlɩ mʋ́ mlɩbʋ ɔwʋnlɩ́n. Ahá bʋdɛ mlɩ bu, anɩ mʋ́ ɔhaa tamabú anɩ. Megyí alɩ mlɩdɛ́ anɩ kɩ́ɩ nɩ? Ntɛ́ɛ megyí alɩ?
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ mlɩkɩta mlɩ hógyitɔ kínkíínkín, amlɩtin mʋ ɔkpa. Mlɩbɩ ánɩ́ mlɩ aba Akristofɔ ánɩ́ bʋbʋ ɔyɩ́tɔ́ fɛ́ɛ́ bʋdɛ ipian ánfɩ odu wúun.
Nkpábi, mlɩbu mlɩ ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ awíe tógyítɔ́á mlɔ́bwɛtɔ. Mlɩha amʋ́ ansɩ́ igyi mlɩ ɩwɩ brégyíbrɛ́, megyí amʋ́ ansɩ́tɔ́ wʋlɛ. Mlɩbwɛ mʋ́ tsú klʋntɔ, tsúfɛ́ mlɩtobú anɩ Wíe.
“Nsiebí dú ámʋ́ʋ́ fowun amʋ igyi awíe idú ánɩ́ bʋmɔkʋ́nyá tsíá obíásʋ́. Támɛ bɛ́yaɩ́ amʋ́ mbíásʋ́ amʋ́ iwíe ogyíkpá. Amʋ́a ɔbwɩ ámʋ bégyi iwíe brɛ́ itinbí.
Anɩ mʋ́ á, Bulu lɔ́pʋ mʋ Ɔŋɛ́ wá anɩtɔ, megyí ɔyɩ́ ánfɩtɔ ɔŋɛ́ bʋ anɩtɔ. Mboún Ɔŋɛ́á itsú Bulu wá, mɛ́nɩ abɛ́talɩ́ nú ɩtɔ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lapʋ́kíé anɩ faan amʋ asɩ.
Ɩwɩ anyapʋ́, mlɩsu amlɩsʋra okitikíti, tsúfɛ́ ipian kpɔnkpɔntɩ ɩbá mlɩsʋ.

Máha ipian ánɩ́ ɩbɛ́ba fʋsʋ ɩwa fʋ́ ifú. Ndɛ fʋ́ bláa, Ɔbʋnsám ɔbɛ́ha bɛ́kɩtá mlɩtɔ akʋ tswɩ obu. Ɔbɔ́sɔ mlɩ kɩ. Bɛ́dɩnká fʋ́sʋ́ nkɛ dú. Nɩ́ lowutɔ ígyi ó á, fʋ́ mʋ́ wa ɔnɔkwalɩ. Nɛ́ha fʋ́ ɩsʋgyi-ɩpa, igyi nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá.
Timoteo, fʋ mʋ́ á, Bulu ɔha fʋgyi. Mʋ́ sʋ ha ɩ́nɩ aná ɩwa ɩfɔ́ fʋ́ wá. Hɩɛ fʋ́ ɩwɩ, afʋbwɛ tɔ́á ɩda ɔkpa. Bɔ mbɔ́dɩ́ afʋha yilébwɛ, Bulusúm, hógyi, ɔdwɛ, klʋnya pʋ́ ɩwɩasɩbá itsía fʋ́tɔ́.
Mlɩlatsíá ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ anfɩsʋ, gyi nkpa mʋ́a ɔdwɛ pʋ́wá nfɔ fɛ́ nnantswie há mlɩ ɔmɔkɛ́.
Owíe-mbíá adʋanyɔ-na itsie bomlí owíe obíá ámʋ. Ahandɛ adʋanyɔ-na bɔwa atadɩɛ futútú bʋtsie mbíá ámʋsʋ, bʋbun sika pɛpɛ ɩpa.
Alagyi ɔdwɛ laláhɛ, tsú ɩwɩ dʋbɩ. Mʋ́ sʋ pʋ ɩwɩɔsɩn mʋ́a asʋn wunhɛ ka mʋ ɩkɔ séi. Ɔtɛbláa mʋ ɩwɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ, ‘Owíe tsɩhɛ́ ngyi, ntsie mɩ́ obíásʋ́. Megyí ɔsʋrapʋ ngyi, mmɔ́ɔwa nwɛ ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ!’

Alɩ kɛ́n mlɩ ayin ɛ́, nɩ́ mlɩa mlɩ aká mlɩbʋ ɩnʋ á, mlɩbɩ ánɩ́ bʋma awútɔ́ ɔwʋnlɩ́n fɛ́ mlɩ. Mlɩwun amʋ́ nwɛ, amlɩpʋ obú ha amʋ́. Tsúfɛ́ mlɩa amʋ́nyɔ obénya Bulu atokiehɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ igyi nkpa ámʋ. Mlɩkɩta mlɩ aká tsʋn ɔkpa ánfɩsʋ, mɛ́nɩ nɩ́ mlɩdɛ́ mpáɩ bɔ á, tɔtɔ méetin mlɩ ɔkpa.
Mmɔkʋ́há atsɩ ɔkpa mbɛ́ɛ, bʋsúna ayin atɔ́, ntɛ́ɛ bʋgyíi ayinsʋ. Mboún bʋtsía díín.
Ɔnɔkwalɩpʋ Bulu gyí. Mʋlɛ́tɩ mlɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ, mlɩa mʋ Bi, ogyi anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristonyɔ mlɩbɔ́bwɛ kʋlɛ.
Mɩ́ apíó, Bulu lɛ́lɛ mlɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ, mlɩbégyi ɩwɩ. Támɛ mlɩmátsʋn mlɩ ɩwɩgyí amʋsʋ láyótsu mlɩ tsiátɔ́ dada amʋ. Mboún mlɩpʋ ɔdwɛ sum mlɩ aba,
Bulu ɔbɔ́pʋ mbla ánfɩ́ ɩtɛhá anɩtegyi ɩwɩ ánfɩ gyi ahá asʋ́n. Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩkɩ wankláán, mlɩ asʋn blɩ́hɛ́ pʋ́ mlɩ bwɛhɛ́tɔ́.
Bulusúm agyʋ́má igyi ɔtsan-ɔtsan, támɛ anɩ Wíe amʋ kɛ́n anɩ fɛ́ɛ́ anɩdésum.

Amʋ́ lɛ́lɩn tsu Israelfɔ anáin akpɔnkpɔntɩ ámʋtɔ. Mʋ́á ɩdʋn kʋ́ráá á, amʋ́tɔ́ Kristo amʋ lɛ́bɛlɩn ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ anfɩsʋ. Kanfʋ́ letsiá Kristo, (ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu ladá mʋ ofúli amʋ), ogyi Bulu, atɔ́ fɛ́ɛ́sʋ́ ogyípʋ́ amʋ brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́tɔ́! Amen!

Mʋ́ sʋ nɩ́ anɩdɛ́ ipian wúun a, mlɩ iwilwii pʋ́ mlɩ nkpahɔ́ɔ sʋ anɩdɛ́ mʋ́ wúun. Tsúfɛ́ Bulu dɛ́ anɩ klʋn lwií, mɛ́nɩ anɩ ɛ́ abólwií mlɩ klʋn, fówun mlɛ́talɩ́ nyá klʋn, tomi wun anɩ ipian ámʋ odu kɛ́n.
Bulu tɛ́há anɩa mlɩnyɔ anɩtɛtálɩ́ lɩ́ɩ́ kínkíínkín anɩa Kristonyɔ ɩkʋlɛbwɛtɔ. Mʋgyí ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔlɛda anɩ ofúli.
Ɔmɛ amʋ lɛ́la bláa mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mátɩ tɔ́á Bulu latɩn mʋ́ ɩwɩ atokisíhɛ́.”
Ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ awíe amʋ́ʋ́ mʋa amʋ́nyɔ bɔtɔ mbʋa, begyi ɔdwɛ laláhɛ amʋ bówun mʋ ogyási, su kpisíi.
Yesu lɛ́lɛ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Nɩ́ ɔkʋ dɛ́ mɩ́ dwɛ á, ɔbɔ́bwɛ dɩ́nká mɩ́ atosunáhɛ́sʋ. Mɩ́ Sɩ́ ɔbɔ́dwɛ mʋ. Mɩ́a mɩ́ Sɩ́ ámʋ nyɔ abɛ́ba betsiá mʋ wá.
Megyí alɩá anɩtɔdwɛ́ Bulu gyí Buludwɛ ɔnɔkwalɩsʋ. Mboún alɩá ɔlɔdwɛ anɩ, pʋ́ mʋ Bi sɩ́sɩ́ anɩ, ánɩ́ ɔbɔ́pʋ mʋ obugya lɛ anɩ ɩwɩ mbusuo gyí ɔdwɛ.
Támɛ nɩ́ anɩná wankɩ amʋtɔ, fɛ́ alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ mʋ onutó ɔna ámʋ a, ɩkʋlɛbwɛ bʋ anɩa anɩ aba nsɩnɛ́. Mʋ́ sʋ mʋ Bi Yesu Kristo obugya amʋ tɛtɩn anɩ ɩwɩ tsú anɩ lakpantɔ.
Mʋ́ sʋ opíó, fʋtráa fʋmegyí ɔkpábi, mboún Bulu mʋ bi. Ɩ́nɩá mʋ bi fʋgyi sʋ á, mʋ atɔ́ fɛ́ɛ́ igyi fʋ́ klɛ́.
Támɛ ɔlɛbláa mʋ Bi ámʋ mʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Óo Bulu, fʋ́ iwíegyí mɛ́ɛta ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ! Yilébwɛ gyí fʋ́ iwíegyí akɔnfra.
Bɛbláa mʋ bɛɛ, “Megyí ofúla ánɩ́ fabwɛ́ kʋkʋʋkʋ sʋ́ anɩaa abɛ́da fʋ́ abwi. Alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ fablɩ́ abususʋ pʋ́kʋ́sʋ́ lɩ́ɩ́ Bulusʋ ámʋ sʋ. Nyankpʋsa fʋgyi, támɛ fɛɛ Bulu fʋ́gyi.”

Amʋ́ ɩsʋbɩtɩ́ ogyá ámʋ ogyási bɔ́kʋsʋ́ yɔ́ ɔsʋ́sʋ́ brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́tɔ́. Alɩ ahá ámʋ gyí ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ bosúm ɔbwɩ ámʋ pʋ́ mʋ ɔkpɩ, ɔbwɩ ámʋ nsʋhɩ́ɛtɔ dɩn amʋ́sʋ́ ámʋ nɩ. Ɩwɩ móolwií amʋ́ ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ.”
Bulu láwun anɩ nwɛ pʋ́ agyʋ́má ánfɩ wá anɩ ɩbɩtɔ. Mʋ́ sʋ abatɔ tamawú anɩ.
Mʋ́ sʋ abɛ́talɩ́ wá klʋn blɩ́ anɩaa, “Mɩ́ Wíe Bulu gyí mɩ́ ɔbʋápʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ tɔtɔ mɔ́ɔwa mɩ́ ifú. Ntɔ nyankpʋsa ɔbɛ́talɩ́ bwɛ́ mɩ́?”
Ɔkpa má ɩnʋá ɔhá ánɩ́ otegyi tógyítɔ́ ɔbɛ́lɛ ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔtamagyi tɔkʋ ɩlá. Alɩ kɛ́n ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔtamagyi tɔkʋ ɛ́ ɔmálɛ ɔhá ánɩ́ otegyi tógyítɔ́ ɩlá nɩ́. Tsúfɛ́ Bulu lahɔ amʋ́.
Bulu tɛ́há ahá bʋtenyá klʋn. Mʋtɔ́wá ahá atɛtɔ-ɔnlɩn. Ndɛ mʋ kʋlɩ́ mbɛ́ɛ, ɔhá amlɩbwɛ kʋlɛ, fɛ́ alɩá Kristo Yesu lósuná anɩ.

Imehián ánɩ́ mʋ mʋ́ obégyankpá bɔ́ mʋ lakpan ɩwɩ afɔdɩɛ, fɛ́ igyi ahapʋ́ dɛhɛn atráhɛ amʋ. Amʋ́ mʋ́ betsiá bɔ́ há amʋ́ onutó lakpan ekekegyíɛkɛ, asa bɔbɔ há ahá atráhɛ. Ɔtsáwʋlɛ pɛ́ mʋ mʋ́ ɔlɔbɔ afɔdɩɛ há ahá fɛ́ɛ́ lakpan, brɛ́á ɔlɔpʋ mʋ ɩwɩ bɔ́ afɔdɩɛ ahá fɛ́ɛ́ nwunsʋ.
Nɩ́ ɔkʋ bʋ atɔ́, alawun ánɩ́ kʋ dɛ mʋ ba hián, támɛ omowun mʋ nwɛ há mʋ a, mʋ́mʋ́ ɔmɛ́ɛtalɩ́ blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, mʋtɔdwɛ́ Bulu.
Ee! Anɩhɩ́ɛ́ anɩdɛ́ klʋn wa, tsúfɛ́ tɔ́á anɩhɩ́ɛ́ anɩdédunká gyí abɔ́wa ɩfɔ́ ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ-ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ anfɩ wá, ayetsiá anɩ Wíe wá.
Apíó adwɛpʋ́, nhɩ́ɛ́ ndɛ mlɩ ɔlá da. Afɔɔ́ mlɩgyí, mlɩméetsiá ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ anfɩsʋ wá ɔpá. Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩlɛ ɩwɩ tsu nyankpʋsa ɔwɔ́lɩ laláhɛ amʋ́ʋ́ ɩtɔkɔ́ mlɩ ɔkláa ɩsá ámʋtɔ.
Mlɩbu ɔhagyíɔha, amlɩdwɛ mlɩ aba ahógyipʋ. Mlɩnya Bulu ifú, amlɩbu mlɩ ɔmá ɔkpapʋ́.
Mose mʋ́ kɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ, ɩbɔ́wankɩ́ mʋ apíó Israelfɔ ánɩ́ Bulu dɛ́pʋ mʋ hɔ amʋ́ nkpa, támɛ ɩmɔwankɩ́ amʋ́.
Mlɩkɩ aha laláhɛ anfɩ́ bʋgyi fɛ́ akɩ́aɩ anfɩ wankláán. Lalahɛ abwɛpʋ́ bʋgyi, bʋdɛ ahá háan bɛɛ bʋtɩ́ɩn keté kpaalɩ.
Bʋtɔpʋ́ ɔnɔ́ blɩ́ bɛɛ bʋyin Bulu, támɛ amʋ́ bwɛhɛ́ losuná ánɩ́ bʋmeyín mʋ. Bʋbʋ Bulu nyányáa, bʋtamabú mʋ, bʋtamatálɩ́ bwɛ́ ɩtɔ wankláán kʋkʋʋkʋ ɛ́.
Nɛ́talɩ́ gyi amʋ́ ɩwɩ adánsɩɛ mbɛ́ɛ, amʋ́ ansɩ́ lahɩ́ɛ́ pɛ́ Bulusúm ɩwɩ, támɛ bʋmeyín ɔkpa ánɩ́ bɔ́tsʋn mʋ́sʋ́ súm mʋ wankláán.
Otolwíí anɩ klʋn anɩ asʋn wunhɛ kugyíkʋtɔ, mɛ́nɩ anɩ ɛ́ abɛ́talɩ́ pʋ́ klʋn lwiíhɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ anɩlanyá tsú mʋ wá ámʋ lwíí anɩ aba klʋn amʋ́ asʋn wunhɛtɔ.
Bɔ mbɔ́dɩ́ afʋhɔ ɩdá Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́, fɛ́ agyʋ́má ɔyɔpʋ́á mʋ agyʋ́má ma mʋ pɛ́lɩ, otosúná ɔnɔkwalɩ asʋ́n ámʋ wankláán.
Obótsu ɩwɩ fʋ́á, kʋ́sʋ́ lɩ́ɩ́ Bulu, ɩkpɩ pʋ́ tógyítɔ́á anyánkpʋ́sa bʋtosúmsʋ́, blɩ́ ánɩ́ ɔdʋn amʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́. Obéyetsiá Bulu ɔtswɛ́kpa ɩnʋ kʋ́ráá, blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ mʋgyí Bulu.
Abí asɩ́, mlɩmátsiá wá mlɩ abí ɔblɔ́. Mboún mlɩyaɩ amʋ́, amlɩsuna amʋ́ atɔ́ alɩá anɩ Wíe tekle.
Támɛ ɩ́nɩ fɛ́ɛ́tɔ́ a, ɔdwɛ ámʋ́ʋ́ Kristo bʋ ha anɩ ámʋ sʋ anɩlagyi ɩsʋ dáfá.
Ɩnʋ anɩ fɛ́ɛ́ anɩlɛ́dɩda. Nonu ɔmɛ kʋ Hebri ɔblɩ́tɔ ɔbɛ́ɛ, ‘Saulo, Saulo, ntogyi sʋ́ fʋ́dɩn mɩ́sʋ́ alɩ? Ɩwɩ tɔ́ɩ fʋdɛwa.’

Nyin fʋ́ ipian wunhɛ pʋ́ ohian ánɩ́ fʋdegyí, támɛ fʋbʋ atɔ́! Nyin alɩá ɔpasua ámʋ́ʋ́ bʋdɛ ɩwɩ kɩ́ɩ bɛɛ, Yudafɔ bʋ́gyi ámʋ bʋdɛ afunu wa dɩ́nká fʋ́sʋ́. Megyí Yudafɔ bʋ́gyi, Ɔbʋnsám abúopʋ ɔpasua bʋgyi.
Ɔtamatsúlá asʋkpan, ɔnɔkwalɩ otobuo.
Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩlɛ tsiátɔ́ laláhɛ kugyíkʋ lɛ mlɩ nkpatɔ, amlɩsi lakpan bwɛ. Mboún mlɩba ɩwɩasɩ, amlɩhɔ Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ́ʋ́ aladú wá mlɩtɔ ámʋ. Mʋ́ ɔbɛ́ha mlɩ ɔkláa obénya nkpa nɩ́.
Mɩ́lódu, Apolo lɔ́wʋlɩ́ mʋ́ ntsu, támɛ Bulu lɛ́ha mʋ́ ɩlɛdan.
Bulu-ɔbɔpʋ onyɔɔsɩ ɛ́ lóbuo mʋ, bɛblɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Babilon labwíé. Wúlu yilé Babilon labwíé. Tsúfɛ́ Babilon lahá ɔmá-ɔmá banu mʋ mbʋatɔ-ntá ánɩ́ ɩtɛhá Bulu ɔblɔ́ tɔkʋ́sʋ́!”
Nɩ́ mlegyi mɩ́ mblasʋ á, mɩ́ anyawíe mlɩgyí.
Mʋ́ sʋ mɩ́ abí adwɛpʋ́, mlɩkɩ mlɩ ɩwɩ wankláán ɩkpɩsúmsʋ́.
Amʋ́ odu bʋtebítíwíé ahá wóyítɔ́, dámlí atsɩá amʋ́ ansɩ́tɔ́ ma ɔnlɩn agywɩɩn. Atsɩ ámʋ odu á, lakpan lamlí amʋ́ atɔ sʋráhɛ́, ɔwɔ́lɩ laláhɛ labʋ́lá amʋ́tɔ́.
Mboún mlɩha abláa aba ɔnɔkwalɩ asʋ́n ámʋ ɔdwɛtɔ, mɛ́nɩ abɛ́dan tógyítɔ́tɔ́, bwɛ́ fɛ́ Kristo, ogyi ɔpasua ámʋ nwun.
Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ lahá mlɩlabwɛ́ kʋlɛ. Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩbɔ mbɔ́dɩ́ amlɩtsia iwilwiitɔ, mɛ́nɩ ɩkʋlɛbwɛ ámʋ ibétsiá mlɩtɔ yɔ́.
Saulo lɛ́fɩtɛ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Fʋ́ ma nɩ, mɩ́ Wíé?” Mʋ́ʋ́ ɔmɛ amʋ lɛ́bláa mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mɩ́ Yesu nɩ. Mɩ́sʋ́ fʋdɩn nɩ́.

Mboún mlɩbɩ tsu mlɩ klʋntɔ ánɩ́ Kristo gyí mlɩ Wíe, mʋ ɩwɩ lɛtɩn. Mlɩda ɩwɩsʋ, mɛ́nɩ brégyíbrɛ́ nɩ́ ɔkʋ lɛ́fɩtɛ́ hógyi ámʋ́ʋ́ ɩbʋ mlɩtɔ ámʋ ɩwɩ asʋ́n á, mlɛ́bɩ lɛ́ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ wankláán. Támɛ mlɩnya klʋn, amlɩba ɩwɩasɩ lɛ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́.
Anɩ Wíe Bulu lɛ́bláa mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, ‘Wɔɩ fʋ́ ntʋkʋta tswɩ, tsúfɛ́ ɔtɩ́nɛ́ ánfɩ fʋlɩɩ́ ánfɩ igyi ɔtɩnɛ wankɩ́hɛ́.
Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩha asʋ́n ámʋ́ʋ́ mlɩlónu tsú brɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ mlɩlɔ́tsɔ hógyi amʋ isin mlɩtɔ. Tsúfɛ́ nɩ́ isin mlɩtɔ á, mʋ́mʋ́ ɩkʋlɛbwɛ bétsiá mlɩa Yesu pʋ́ Ɔsɩ́ Bulu nsɩnɛ́.
Ɔnɔkwalɩ ndɛ mlɩ bláa. Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ otegyi mɩ́ atosunáhɛ́sʋ omóowu ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ.”
Ɩnʋ nowun owíe obíá futútú kpɔnkpɔntɩ kʋá ɔkʋ tsie mʋ́sʋ́. Nwʋlʋ́táa mʋ́a ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ bɛsrɩ́ sí mʋ, támɛ bʋmenya ɔŋaínkpá.

Ɩbʋ mʋ́tɔ́á ɔkʋ ɔbɛ́talɩ́ blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Atogyihɛ bʋ ɩnʋ há ipu, ipu ɛ́ bʋ ɩnʋ há atogyihɛ.” Ee! Támɛ mʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ ɩbɛ́hɩ ɛkɛkʋ́. Bulu mɔ́bwɛ nyankpʋsa há atsɩ mʋ́a ayin asʋ́n wa. Mboún anɩ Wíe bʋ́ anɩ ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ, anɩ ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ ɛ́ bʋ́ anɩ Wíe.
Mlɩ ɛ́ mlɩkɩ mlɩ ɩwɩ ánɩ́ mlɩlawú há lakpan, amlɩlɛ mlɩ ɩwɩ lɛ mʋ́ túmi asɩ. Mlɩtsia nkpa ha Bulu, tsúfɛ́ mlɩa Kristo Yesunyɔ mlɩlabwɛ́ kʋlɛ.

Támɛ ndɛ Bulu ɩpán da ánɩ́ Kristo ɩsʋgyí sʋ alabwɛ́ anɩ ndoun, alakpá anɩ buo ɩwɩ, anɩdɛ́ mʋ ɩsʋgyí amʋ nkɛ gyí. Nɩ́ ayɔ́ ɔtɩ́nɛgyíɔtɩ́nɛ́ a, ɔtɔtsʋn anɩsʋ bláa ahá ámʋ Kristo asʋn wankláán ámʋ, fɛ́ alɩá ofobí fánfán tɔwá ɔfan yɔ́ tsútsúútsú.
Asʋ́n ánɩ́ anɩlónu tsú mʋ Bi ámʋ wá, anɩdɛ́ mlɩ bláa gyí, Bulu lɔ́wankɩ́. Oklún kʋkʋʋkʋ má mʋtɔ.
Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ Ɔsɩ́ ámʋ lɛ́ha mɩ́ ɔbɛ́ba mɩ́ wá. Mméegya ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔlɛba mɩ́ wá.
Mlɩkɩta mlɩ aba Akristofɔ dwɛtɔ kínkíínkín.
Mʋ́ sʋ ɔtɛtálɩ́ hɔ ahá ánɩ́ bʋtɔtsʋn mʋsʋ ba Bulu wá fɛ́ɛ́ nkpa plɩ́plɩ́plɩ́. Tsúfɛ́ otsie Bulu wá, ɔdɛ mʋ kokóli amʋ́ nwunsʋ brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́tɔ́.

Bɔsʋrá okitikíti bɛɛ, “Kpa mʋ ya, kpa mʋ ya, afʋyɛda mʋ manta oyikpalíhɛsʋ.” Pilato lɛ́fɩtɛ́ amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Ndáa mlɩ owíe manta oyikpalíhɛsʋ?” Bulu igyí ahapʋ́ dɛhɛn amʋ bɛbláa mʋ bɛɛ, “Anɩmá owíe ɔkʋkʋ dʋn Roma owíe dɛhɛn!”
Alɩ ígyi ndɛ nkɛ ánfɩtɔ ɛ́ nɩ́. Bulu lawá awɩtɔlɛ lɛ́ Israelfɔ kpalobí akʋ yáɩ́.
Mʋa ɔyɩ́tɔ́ awíe fɛ́ɛ́ batɔ́ mbʋa. Ɔyɩ́tɔ́ ahá fɛ́ɛ́ banu mʋ mbʋatɔ-ntá bʋ́.”
Mlɩha mlɩ ansɩ́ ɩpɛ mlɩ aba Akristofɔ dwɛsʋ, amlɩbu aba wankláán.
Tsúfɛ́ ahá ánɩ́ bahá Bulu Ɔŋɛ́ dɛ amʋ́ kpa gyí Bulu abí.
Ɩnʋ osúna bámbá lɛtrá dalɩ ɔsʋ́sʋ́. Nowun bʋ́tɩ́ kpɔnkpɔɔnkpɔntɩ ɔkʋá ɔlɛpɛ, ɔbʋ nwun asienɔ́ pʋ́ nsiebí dú. Owíepa asienɔ́ bun nwun asienɔ́ ámʋsʋ.
Nɩ́ Bulu abí anɩgyí á, mʋ́mʋ́ anɩgyí mʋ atɔ́ agyípʋ́. Anɩa Kristonyɔ obégyi mʋ atɔ́. Tsúfɛ́ nɩ́ awun Kristo ipian ámʋ kʋ á, mʋ́mʋ́ abénya mʋ numnyam amʋ ɛ́ kʋ.
Ilehián ánɩ́ ɔpasua ámʋ bɛ́ka ɔpasua ahandɛá bʋdɛ amʋ́ kpa akɔ wankláán, wá amʋ́ numnyam. Títriu amʋ́á bʋtɔbɔ́ mbɔ́dɩ́ Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ ɔkanda pʋ́ mʋ́ suná ɩwɩ.

Támɛ megyí Akristofɔ fɛ́ɛ́ yín alɩ asʋ́n ánfɩ. Ɩkpɩsúm lamántá amʋ́ dodo. Ɩ́nɩ sʋ nɩ́ begyi ɔkpɩtɔ-atɔ́ á, bʋdɛ mʋ́ tsu ánɩ́ basúm ɔkpɩ ámʋ nɩ. Mʋ́ sʋ ifin lada amʋ́, tsúfɛ́ bʋmɔkʋ́dan hógyitɔ.
Bámbigyíbámbiá ɩbʋ mɩ́ ɩwɩ, ɩtamaswíé á, ɔtɛkpálɩ́ mʋ́ tsítsá. Támɛ kugyíkʋá itoswíé á, ɔtɛlá mʋ́ wankláán, mɛ́nɩ ibóswie tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ dʋn.
Mlɩmábwɛ ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lapʋ́wá mlɩ ɩbɩtɔ ámʋ kpóunkpóun. Mboún mlɩtsia tsiátɔ́ wankláán ánɩ́ ɩbɔ́bwɛ nfántʋ́hʋ́n há amʋ́,
Apíó, anɩdéklé anɩaa mlɩbɩ́ɩ ɔnɔkwalɩ ánɩ́ ɩbʋ Akristofɔá bawú ɩwɩ, mɛ́nɩ mlɩméetsiá gyi awɩrɛhɔ fɛ́ ahá ánɩ́ amʋ́ ansɩ́ mɛdɩ́n tɔtɔsʋ.
Hógyi lɛ́ha Israelfɔ bɔtsʋn Ɔpʋ Pɛpɛ amʋtɔ fɛ́ ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ wʋlɩhɛsʋ bʋ́na. Támɛ brɛ́á Egyiptefɔ ɛ́ bɛɛ abʋtsʋn a, ɔpʋ amʋ lɛ́kɩtá amʋ́.
Alɩ brɛ́ ámʋtɔ bɔkwɩɩ́ Mose nɩ. Ogyi obí ánɩ́ ɔhɩ́ɛ́ ɔbʋ akɩ́lɛ, Bulu ansɩ́ legyi mʋ ɩwɩ. Mʋ yin lɛ́yaɩ́ mʋ tsra asa mʋ sɩ wóyítɔ́.
Mʋ onutó ɛ́ ɔtamatálɩ́ gyi ɩwɩsʋ brɛ́ tsɔtsɔɔtsɔtɔ. Mʋ́ sʋ otenyá klʋn há ahá ánɩ́ bʋmeyín ɔlala pʋ́ amʋ́á bafwɩ́ ɔkpa.
Onyé dɛtsʋ́ʋn, ɔyɩ́ lakɛ ta. Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩha asi oklúntɔ bwɛhɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́ bwɛ, atsu anɩ ɔyɩ kɛhɛtɔ akɔtɔ́ tsan.
Awíé, mlɩ ɛ́ mlɩkɩta mlɩ nkpábi wankláán, fɛ́ alɩá nablɩ́ bɔtsʋn. Mlɩmábwɛ amʋ́ kpóunkpóun. Mlɩkaɩn ánɩ́ mlɩa amʋ́nyɔ fɛ́ɛ́ owíe ámʋ bʋ ɔsʋ́sʋ́. Mʋ mʋ́ ɔtamakɩ ɔhaa ansɩ́tɔ́.
Nɩ́ akʋ bʋdɛ ansigyí nya á, mlɩa amʋ́nyɔ mlɩnya ansigyí. Nɩ́ akʋ bʋdesú ɛ́ á, mlɩa amʋ́nyɔ mlɩsu.
Támɛ klʋntɔ bʋ fʋ odwin, asʋtɔ bʋ fʋ ɔnlɩn. Mʋ́ sʋ ɩsʋtɔbɩtɩ́ ánɩ́ ɩda gyo fʋ́ ɛkɛá Bulu Ɔnɔkwalɩpʋ obégyi asʋ́n ɩtráa démoní tsɩ́a.

Mʋ́ ɔma a, Yudafɔ akʋ botsu Antiokia ánɩ́ ɩbʋ Pisidia ɔmátɔ́ pʋ́ Ikonion wúlutɔ ba bɛblɩ́ asʋ́n pʋ́tsɛ ɔdɔm amʋ agywɩɩn, bɔkʋsʋ́ lɩ́ɩ́ Paulosʋ. Bɛda Paulo abwi, bɩ́tɩ́a mʋ dálɩ wúlu amʋtɔ. Bʋkɩ bɛɛ alawú, sʋ besi mʋ tswɩ.
Brɛ́á Yesu lɛ́blɩ́ asʋ́n ánfɩ tá á, asʋ́n ɩhɩ́ɛ́ dɛ mʋ háan mʋ klʋntɔ. Mʋ́ sʋ olowunáa kpa mʋ́ tati ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Ɔnɔkwalɩ ndɛ mlɩ bláa, mlɩtɔ ɔkʋlɛ ɔbɛ́lɛ mɩ́ há.”
Támɛ Bulu asʋn wanlɩ́nhɛ́ amʋ ɩlɛblɩ́ ánɩ́ lakpan lagyi ɔyɩ́tɔ́ ahá fɛ́ɛ́sʋ́ plɩ́plɩ́plɩ́plɩ́. Mʋ́ sʋ atɔ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lɛ́hɩɛ yáɩ́ ámʋ igyi Kristo ahógyipʋ klɛ́.
Nɩ́ adansɩfɔ ánfɩ bɛblɩ́ amʋ́ asʋ́n tá á, ɔbwɩkɩ́tá-atɔ amʋ́ʋ́ ɔtɛdálɩ tsu ɩlán klúklúúklúá ɩma ɔkatɔ ámʋ ɔbɔ́kɔ amʋ́ ɩsá, gyí amʋ́sʋ́, mɔ́ amʋ́.
Tsúfɛ́ nɩ́ akɩ́tá anɩ hógyitɔ kínkíínkín, fɛ́ brɛ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ anɩlɔ́tsɔ hógyi amʋ yɔ́fʋn mʋ́ ɔnɔ́mɔ a, anɩa Kristonyɔ abɛ́kan, bwɛ́ toku kʋlɛ.
Ɩbʋ mʋ́tɔ́á lakpan sʋ mlɩ nyankpʋsa-oyí ánfɩ obówu. Támɛ nɩ́ Kristo bʋ mlɩtɔ á, mlɩ ɔkláa bʋ nkpa. Tsúfɛ́ Bulu latsú mlɩ ánɩ́ mlɩ asʋ́n da ɔkpa mʋ ansɩ́tɔ́.
Bulu ɔnɔ́sʋ́ ɔtɔɩ́pʋ́ ɔmɔmʋsʋ́ mlɩ anáin bʋmɛdɩnká? Bɔmɔ Bulu ɔnɔ́sʋ́ atɔɩ́pʋ́ amʋ́ʋ́ bɛblɩ́ yáɩ́ bɛɛ, Yilé Ɔbwɛpʋ́ ámʋ ɔbɛ́ba amʋ ɛ́. Mlɩlɛ́lɛ Yilé Ɔbwɛpʋ́ ámʋ há, bɔmɔ mʋ.

ɔkabágyáa, ntábʋ, pléikpada pʋ́ mʋ́á ɩlɛlɩan ɩ́nɩ aná. Mʋ́ aná ɩwɩ asʋ́n ndɛ mlɩ bláa, fɛ́ alɩá nɛbláa mlɩ yaɩ́. Mbɛ́ɛ, ahá ánɩ́ bʋtɔbwɛ́ ɩ́nɩ odu bʋméenya Bulu iwíegyí ámʋtɔ agyapadɩɛ kʋkʋ.
Brɛ́ ánfɩ wankɩ† amʋ trá ɔbʋ mlɩ wá á, mlɩhɔ mʋ gyi, mɛ́nɩ mlɔ́bwɛ wankɩ amʋ abí.” Yudafɔ Yesu Máhogyi Brɛ́á Yesu lɛ́bláa amʋ́ asʋn anfɩ tá á, ɔlɛnatɩ́ yéŋaín.
Ɔlɔwa ɔnɔkwalɩ há Bulu, Bulu lɛ́lɛ mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, ɔbɔ́yɔ mʋ agyʋ́má fɛ́ alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ Mose lɔ́wa ɔnɔkwalɩ há Bulu, Bulu lɔ́pʋ mʋ wóyí fɛ́ɛ́ wá mʋ ɩbɩtɔ ámʋ.
Ɔlɔtsʋn anɩ Ɔhɔ́pʋ Yesu Kristosʋ, tsɛ́ɩ́ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ wʋ́lɩ́ anɩsʋ.

Mʋ́ sʋ alɩ kɛ́n Lewiyin ɔkʋá bʋtɛtɩ́ mʋ Yosef lɛ́fɛ ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ, ɔlɔpʋ kɔ́ba amʋ ba sumbí ayɔpʋ́ ámʋ nɩ. Yosef anfɩ otsú Kipro ɔmátɔ́, sumbí ayɔpʋ́ bɛha mʋ ɩdá Barnaba, (mʋ́ asɩ gyí, “Ahá atɛtɔ-ɔnlɩn ɔwapʋ́.”)
Mʋ́ sʋ yilébwɛ mákpɔn anɩ, tsúfɛ́ nɩ́ abatɔ mowu anɩ á, abɔ́kpɔtɩ́ nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá mʋ́ brɛ́tɔ́.
Tsúfɛ́ Mose mbla ámʋ ilosuná ánɩ́ nawú. Ɩlɛha negyi ɩwɩ, mɛ́nɩ nétsiá nkpa pɔpwɛ há Bulu. Mɩ́a Kristonyɔ bɛda mántá oyikpalíhɛsʋ ɔŋɛ́tɔ́.
Ɩ́nɩ ɔma a, bɛha mɩ́ oyíá bʋtɔpʋ́súsu atɔ́. Mʋ́ʋ́ Bulu-ɔbɔpʋ amʋ lɛ́bláa mɩ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Kʋsʋ afʋyosusúu Bulu ɔtswɛ́kpa obu ámʋ pʋ́ afɔdɩɛ-asubwi amʋ, afʋkla ɩnʋ asúmpʋ́ amʋ.

Alɩ ahá ánfɩ gyí ahá ánɩ́ amʋ́ ɩwɩ lɛtɩn, bʋmeyín ɔtsɩ, bʋtobuo Okúfabi amʋ ɔtɩ́nɛgyíɔtɩ́nɛ́á ɔyɔ́ nɩ́. Amʋ́ nwunsʋ ɩkɔ ɔ́lɛka anyánkpʋ́sa fɛ́ɛ́tɔ́, fɛ́ atɔ́-abí gyankpapʋ há Bulu mʋa Okúfabi amʋ nɩ.
Atsantsankʋ ámʋ bɛlɩan mpɔnkɔá bahɩ́hɩɛ amʋ́ há ɩsá, tɔkʋ ɩdɩn amʋ́ nwunsʋ fɛ́ sika pɛpɛ ɩpa. Bɔwa anyánkpʋ́sa ansɩ́tɔ́.
Mlɩtsia nkpa fɛ́ ahá ánɩ́ bʋtsie ɩwɩsʋ, támɛ mlɩmápʋ mlɩ ɩwɩsʋtsiá ámʋ tin ansíbi bwɛ́ lalahɛ. Mboún mlɩtsia nkpa fɛ́ Bulu asúmpʋ́.
(Nkpa ánfɩ sʋ́ anɩdɛ́ ɩwɩ laláa yɔ agyʋ́má ɔwʋnlɩ́nsʋ́), anɩ ansɩ́ dɩn Bulu Ɔkɩankpapʋ, ogyi ahá fɛ́ɛ́ Ɔlɛpʋ́, títriu ahógyipʋ anfɩsʋ nɩ́.

Mʋ́mʋ́ nɩ́ ɔkʋ ɔkɩ Bulu mʋ Bi ámʋ ansɩ́tɔ́ kótíkótí, omobu ánɩ́ mʋ obugya amʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lɔ́pʋsí mʋ ntamsʋ, ɩlɔgyʋráa mʋ ɩwɩ ámʋ bʋ ibíá, olesia Bulu awɩtɔlɛ Ɔŋɛ́ ámʋ mʋ́ á, mʋ ɩsʋbɩtɩ́ ánɩ́ ɔbɛ́hɩɛ nyá mɛ́ɛba kɩ́ɩ.
Yesu lɛ́trá bláa amʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Ɩwɩ ilwíi mlɩ. Alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ mɩ́ Sɩ́ lawá mɩ́ ámʋ a, alɩ́ ndɛ mlɩ wa nɩ́.”
Ahá ánfɩ bʋtɔtɔ́ɩ́ ahásʋ, lɛ́ ahá ɩlá, bwɛ́ lalahɛ kugyíkʋá bʋdeklé. Bʋtotsú ɩwɩ, bun ahá kpantsapa, mɛ́nɩ bénya tɔ́á bʋdeklé.
Ɩnʋ nowun ánɩ́ ɔyɩ́tɔ́ awíe pʋ́ ahandɛ pʋ́ ɩsá ɔnɔ́ alɩɩ́pʋ́ pʋ́ asikafɔ pʋ́ atúmipʋ, nkpábi mʋ́a ɩwɩsʋ atsiápʋ́ beyéŋaín abʋsʋ abwi alatɔ pʋ́ abwi mbɔ́tɔ́.

Támɛ afúpʋ́á beyinkí mɩ́ ɔma, ahá ánɩ́ bʋmɔhɔ mɩ gyi, mbusuo abɔpʋ́, ahá amɔpʋ́, mbʋa atɔpʋ́, atɔ́ alapʋ́, ɩkpɩ atswɛ́pʋ pʋ́ afunupʋ fɛ́ɛ́ otsiákpá gyí ogyá paatɩ kpɔnkpɔntɩ, ogyá mʋ́a atonkodu ɩhɩ́ɛ́ detsií mʋ́tɔ́. Ɩ́nɩ gyí lowu nyɔɔsɩ amʋ nɩ.”
Ntɔ fʋtráa fʋgyo? Kʋsʋ kokoli anɩ Wíe, afʋha abʋbɔ fʋ́ asú, ɔfwɩ fʋ́ lakpan fɛ́ɛ́ lɛ.’
Amʋ́ nwunsʋ-imi bʋ ɩswɩ́ fɛ́ ɔtsɩ klɛ́. Amʋ́ ayín ɛ́ igyi fɛ́ gyatá klɛ́.
Ɩma alɛá anɩ Wíe osúmpʋ́ ɔbɔ́bwɛ ɔtrɛ́pʋ́. Mboún ilehián ánɩ́ ɔbɔ́wa awɩtɔlɛ há ɔhagyíɔha, ɔbɔ́bwɛ osunápʋ́ wankláán, otenyá klʋn há ahá ánɩ́ amʋ́ asʋ́n bʋ ɔnlɩn.
Ɩbʋ mʋ́tɔ́á mbʋ ɩfɔ́ mlɩ wá, támɛ ntosúsu mlɩ ɩwɩ brégyíbrɛ́. Ansɩ́ ɛ́ ɩdɛ mɩ́ gyí ánɩ́ mlɩtsie wankláán, mlɩlɩ́ɩ́ kínkíínkín Kristosʋ hógyitɔ.
Tsúfɛ́ Bulu ansɩ́ bʋ yilé abwɛpʋ́sʋ́. Ɔtɛyaa asʋ nú amʋ́ atɔ kʋlɩ́hɛ́. Támɛ ɔtɔkʋ́sʋ́ lɩ́ɩ́ lalahɛ abwɛpʋ́sʋ́.”

Apíóá anɩ Wíe tɔdwɛ́, ilehián ánɩ́ abɛ́da Bulu ɩpán mlɩ nwunsʋ brégyíbrɛ́. Tsúfɛ́ tsú brɛ́á ɔyɩ́ lɛlɩn ɔpá Bulu lɛ́lɛ mlɩ ánɩ́ ɔbɔ́tsʋn mʋ Ɔŋɛ́ ámʋ pʋ́ mʋ ɔnɔkwalɩ asʋ́n ámʋ́ʋ́ mlɩlahogyi amʋsʋ tɩn mlɩ ɩwɩ, pʋ́hɔ mlɩ nkpa.
Ha lalahɛ ɔbwɛpʋ́ ɔyɔ mʋ lalahɛbwɛsʋ. Ifintɔ otsiápʋ́ otsía mʋ ifintɔ, yilé ɔbwɛpʋ́ ɛ́ ɔkɩta mʋ yilébwɛtɔ. Ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, mɔ́pʋ mʋ ɩwɩ há Bulu osíi mʋ ɩwɩ ha Bulu.”
Mʋ́ʋ́ Petro lɛ́lɛ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mlɩtɔ okugyíɔkʋ ɔdámli klʋntɔ, abɔ mlɩ asú Yesu Kristo dátɔ́, mɛ́nɩ Bulu obési mlɩ lakpan kíé mlɩ, há mlɩ Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ.
Mlɩkɩ ánɩ́ ɔhaa mɔ́ɔpʋ lalahɛ ká mʋ ba ɩkɔ. Mboún mlɩbwɛ yilé há aba pʋ́ ahá fɛ́ɛ́.
Alɩ kɛ́n ayin ɛ́ besi atsɩ wá dɩ fɛ́ alɩá bʋtɔbwɛ́ mʋ́ yáɩ́, bʋda aba wá nɩ́. Hakpanla anfɩ bwɛ sʋ Bulu lɛ́bɩtɩ́ amʋ́ ɩsʋ ánɩ́ lɛkanáa ha amʋ́, bʋdɛ mʋ́ wúun nɩ.
Mʋ́ sʋ ɩwá mlɩ ɔdwɛ, ansɩ́ igyi anɩ fɛ́ɛ́.
Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩdamli klʋntɔ, amlɩyinki ba Bulu wá, mɛ́nɩ obési mlɩ lakpan fɛ́ɛ́ kíé mlɩ, wá mlɩ ɔwʋnlɩ́n pɔpwɛ,
Bʋméefin mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ aklʋn, tsúfɛ́ oklún ma ɩnʋ.
Ɔhá ánɩ́ olegyi mɩ́ ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ, nu mɩ́ obugya bʋ nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá. Nɔ́kʋsʋ́a mʋ tsú afúlitɔ ɛkɛ tráhɛ amʋ.
Yesu lɛ́lɛ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Nɩ́ megyí Bulu lɛ́ha fʋ́ ɔkpa á, tɛkɩ fʋma túmi kʋkʋ mɩ́sʋ́. Ɩ́nɩ sʋ ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɔpʋ mɩ́ wá fʋ́ ɩbɩtɔ ámʋ lakpan dʋn fʋ́ klɛ́.”
Alɩ́ hógyi igyi nɩ́. Hógyi oduá yilébwɛ há fʋ́ bá ɩma mʋ́tɔ́ á, igyi hógyi wúhɛ́.

Mose Mbla ámʋ mɛ́talɩ́ lɛ́ anɩ tsú anɩ lakpantɔ. Tsúfɛ́ anɩ tsiátɔ́ dada amʋ́ʋ́ ɩtɛhá anɩtɔbwɛ́ lakpan ámʋ ɩmɛha anɩmégyí mbla ámʋ atosunáhɛ́sʋ. Támɛ Bulu lɔ́tsʋn ɔkpa pɔpwɛsʋ hɔ anɩ. Ɔlɔwa mʋ Bi onutó lɛ́bá fɛ́ nyankpʋsa ánɩ́ ɔtɔbwɛ́ lakpan, támɛ mʋ mʋ́ ɔmɔbwɛ lakpan. Bulu lɔ́tsʋn mʋ lowusʋ mɔ́ anɩ tsiátɔ́ dada amʋ́ʋ́ lakpan legyi mʋ́sʋ́ ámʋ.
Támɛ nɩ́ ɩlɛba ánɩ́ mlɩdɛ́ ipianwúun yilébwɛ sʋ kʋ́ráá á, nwun láwá mlɩ olú. Opúni mátsií mlɩ, mlɩmánya ɔhaa ɛ́ ifú.
Akwɩɩ́pʋ́, mlɩmáwa mlɩ abí ɔblɔ́, mɛ́nɩ ɩwɩ móowu amʋ́.
Ɔlɔkplʋ́n kʋ́klʋ́kʋ́ʋ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Babilon labwíé! Wúlu yílé Babilon labwíé! Ɩlamlí ɔŋɛ laláhɛ ɔtsan-ɔtsan fɛ́ɛ́ oŋaínkpá. Ɩlabwɛ́ isia há mbubwi laláhɛ pʋ́ mbwɩkɩ́tá-atɔ laláhɛ fɛ́ɛ́.

Ma gyí ofunupʋ kpɔnkpɔntɩ ánfɩ? Mʋgyí ɔhá ánɩ́ olekiná ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Megyí Yesu gyí Kristo, (ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu ladá mʋ ofúli amʋ).” Idesuná ánɩ́ alakíná Ɔsɩ́ Bulu mʋa mʋ Bi Yesu Kristo amʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ mʋgyí Kristo olupʋ́ ámʋ nɩ.
Mʋ́ sʋ ɔhá ánɩ́ obégyi alɩ bodobodo anfɩ, nu ntá tsú anɩ Wíe ɛwɛ ánfɩtɔ mábú ɔkpasʋ á, alagyi anɩ Wíe ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ pʋ́ mʋ obugya amʋ ɩwɩ pɔ́n.
Fʋ́ ɔha mimláhɛ, fʋdekléá fówun ánɩ́ hógyiá ɩtamabwɛ́ yilé igyi hógyi kpaalɩ?
Mʋ́ sʋ Yuda lɛ́kpa Romafɔ ɩsá akɔpʋ́ pʋ́ Bulu ɔtswɛ́kpa agyópʋ akʋá Bulu igyí ahapʋ́ dɛhɛn pʋ́ Farisifɔ bɔwa, bɔyɔ ɩnʋ. Bʋdɛ mbia, nkandɩ́ɛ pʋ́ akɔtɔ́.
Támɛ anɩ Wíe bʋ ɔnɔkwalɩ. Ɔbɔ́wa mlɩ ɔwʋnlɩ́n, hɔ mlɩ lɛ́ lalahɛ Ɔbwɛpʋ́ ámʋ ɩbɩtɔ.
Brɛ́á bɛlɛ mʋ mʋ wóyítɔ́ a, Farao mʋ bi tsɩ́hɛ́ lótsu mʋ, pʋ́ mʋ bwɛ́ mʋ bi alɩɩ, ɔlɛdan.

Ɩnʋ Bulu-ɔbɔpʋ amʋ lótsu ɔhɩ́ɛ́n blanwébi ámʋ, ɔlɛlɛ ogyá afɔdɩɛ-asubwi ámʋsʋ wá mʋ́tɔ́, fɩn mʋ́ dá ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ. Ɩnʋ nyankpʋ lɔ́wa ɩbɩ fwɩ bɩ. Odekpie, ɔpráda dɛpʋtɩ́, ɔmɛ ɔtsan-ɔtsan dɛlɩ́ɩn kʋ́klʋ́kʋ́ʋ́, ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ ɛ́ dɛkpɩnkɩ́ kpakpakpakpa.
Tsúfɛ́ alapʋ́ mʋ mbʋatɔ-ntá ámʋ dá ɔmá-ɔmá fɛ́ɛ́ ɔnɔ́. Mʋa ɔyɩ́tɔ́ awíe fɛ́ɛ́ batɔ́ mbʋa. Ibíá agyípʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ banyá ɩwɩ tsú nkpa ámʋ́ʋ́ olegyi amʋtɔ.”
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ́ Yudafɔ ámʋ bɛkɩtá mɩ́ brɛ́á mbʋ Bulu ɔtswɛ́kpa ɩnʋ bɛɛ bɔ́mɔ mɩ́ nɩ́.
Békiná ɔnɔkwalɩ asʋ́n ámʋ yóbuo ɔtɛ.
támɛ mlɩtɔ akʋ bʋmɔhɔ mʋ́sʋ́ gyi.” Yesu lówun amʋ́á bʋmɔhɔ mʋ́sʋ́ gyi pʋ́ ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔbɛ́lɛ mʋ há yáɩ́ dodoodo.
Yesu lɛ́bláa mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ nébia bodobodo, pʋ́dá oputsútɔ́ há ámʋ gyí mʋ nɩ.” Ɩnʋ olebia bodobodo pʋ́dá oputsútɔ́ há Yuda, ogyi Simon Iskariot mʋ bi.

Timoteo, kɩ́tá ɩtɔ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lahá fʋ́ ámʋ wankláán. Asʋ́n ánɩ́ ɩma asɩ, imosuná Bulusúm mádalɩ fʋ́ ɔnɔ́. Máwa ɩwɩ mimlá nwɛ́ɛngyí ánɩ́ ɩtamasúná Bulusúmtɔ́. Akʋ bʋtɔwá afunu bɛɛ, asʋ́nbɩ igyi.

Ɩ́nɩ lɛ́ha Paulo mʋa Silas ɩwɩ lɔ́wa Yudafɔ ámʋ olu. Mʋ́ sʋ bɛkpa aha laláhɛ akʋ buo ɩwɩ tsú brɔnʋsʋ, bɔpʋ ahá tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ yɛ́han agywɩɩn wúlu amʋtɔ. Betsií yɔ́ oyin ɔkʋá bʋtɛtɩ́ mʋ Yason wóyítɔ́, bʋdɛ Paulo mʋa Silas dunká abʋbɩtɩa amʋ́ ba ɔdɔm amʋ ansɩ́tɔ́.

Mʋ́ sʋ nɩ́ ɔkʋ owun mʋ ba Okristoyin dɛ́ lakpan bwɛ á, ɔbɔ́ɔ mpáɩ ha mʋ. Bulu ɔbɛ́ha mʋ nkpa. Ahá ánɩ́ amʋ́ lakpan mɛ́ɛkpa amʋ́ wá lowutɔ asʋ́n ndɛblɩ́. Lakpan kʋ bʋ ɩnʋá ɩtɛkpá ɔhá wá lowutɔ. Megyí ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔbwɛ́ lakpan ámʋ odu mbɛ́ɛ mlɩbɔ́ɔ mpáɩ ha.
Ɔnɔkwalɩ ndɛ mlɩ bláa. Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔlɔhɔ ɔhá ánɩ́ nɔwa sumbí lahɔ mɩ. Alɩ kɛ́n ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔlɔhɔ mɩ lahɔ mɩ́ Sɩ́ ámʋ ɔlɔwa mɩ́ sɩ́sɩ́ ámʋ ɛ́ nɩ́.”
Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩha ada Bulu ɩpán. Tsúfɛ́ iwíegyí ánɩ́ ɩmɛ́ɛkpɩnkɩ́ abénya tsú mʋ wá. Mlɩha abu mʋ, anya mʋ ifú, mɛ́nɩ abégyi mʋ ansɩ́.

Yudafɔ akʋ ɛ́ bʋbʋ nsɩnɛ́ ɩnʋ bʋna bʋdeki gya ɔŋɛ laláhɛ lɛ́ ahátɔ. Bɔwa klʋn bɛɛ, bɔ́pʋ anɩ Wíe Yesu dá gya ɔŋɛ laláhɛ lɛ́ ahátɔ. Mʋ́ sʋ bɔkplʋ́n wa ɔŋɛ laláhɛ bɛɛ, “Dalɩ Yesu amʋ́ʋ́ Paulo dɛ́ mʋ ɩwɩ asʋ́n ɔkan da ámʋ dátɔ́.”
Paulo ɛ́ lɛ́kpa Silas buo ɩwɩ, Antiokia ahógyipʋ amʋ bɔpʋ amʋ́ wá Bulu ɩbɩtɔ, bɔpʋ ɔkpa.
Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩkɩ wankláán, mɛ́nɩ mlɩ gyumagyihɛ mɔ́ɔbwɛ kpaalɩ, fɛ́kɩ mlénya mlɩ ɩkɔká fɛ́ɛ́.

Bulu adansɩfɔ ámʋ bʋbʋ túmiá bɛ́talɩ́ há nyankpʋ omóotswie nkɛá bɔ́pʋblɩ́ Bulu asʋ́n ámʋ fɛ́ɛ́. Bʋbʋ túmiá bɛ́talɩ́ há ntsu kugyíkʋ bɛ́damlí obugya. Bɛ́talɩ́ lɛ́ asʋn wunhɛ kugyíkʋ ɛ́ ba ɔsʋlʋ́sʋ brégyíbrɛ́á bʋdeklé.
Fʋma ogyíkpá ntɛ́ɛ ɔlɩɩ́kpá anɩ gyumagyihɛ anfɩtɔ, tsúfɛ́ fʋ́ klʋntɔ mɛtɩn Bulu ansɩ́tɔ́.
Mɩ́ klɛ́ igyi fʋ́ klɛ́, fʋ́ klɛ́ ɛ́ igyi mɩ́ klɛ́. Fatsʋn amʋ́sʋ́ lɛ́ mɩ́ numnyam ɔwan.
Amʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ badámlí ɔma há Bulu, ámʋ́ fɛ́ɛ́ bafwɩ́. Yilé ɔbwɛpʋ́ ɔkʋkʋ má ɩnʋ. Ɔbakʋ́lɛ kʋ́ráá mɛ́dalɩ mʋ́tɔ́.”
Mlɩmábwɛ awʋnsɩ́pʋ́. Mlɩmátsu ɩwɩ. Mboún mlɩba ɩwɩasɩ, amlɩtsu mʋ́ ánɩ́ mlɩ aba bʋdʋn mlɩ.
Ɔha ɔkʋá ɔlɛlɩan Nyankpʋsa-Mʋ-Bi ámʋ lɩ́ɩ́ ɔkandɩ́ɛ-oyí ámʋ nsɩnɛ́. Ɔlɔwa ligá, ɔlɔpʋ sika pɛpɛ ɔfɛ́ tsan mʋ kántɔ́.
Tógyítɔ́á Bulu lalwɩ́ɩ́ mʋ́ méetsiá wúlu amʋtɔ. Mboún Bulu mʋa Okúfabi amʋ owíe obíá obétsiá ɩnʋ, mʋ asúmpʋ́ bósum mʋ.
Tógyítɔ́ ɔnɔ́mɔ lafʋn ta. Mʋ́ sʋ mlɩkɩta ɩwɩ, amlɩha mlɩ agywɩɩntɔ ɩdɩ, mɛ́nɩ mlɛ́talɩ́ bɔ́ mpáɩ.

Paulo mʋa Barnaba bɛlatsíá ntsusʋ-yibitɔ tsú ɩnʋ bowie Antiokia. Ɩnʋ gyí ɔtɩ́nɛ́á ahógyipʋ amʋ begyankpá klɩ́ ɔnɔ́ bɔ́ mpáɩ, ánɩ́ Bulu ɔwáa awɩtɔlɛ ha amʋ́, mɛ́nɩ bɔ́yɔ agyʋ́má ánfɩ bamɔ́ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ ánfɩ nɩ́.
Támɛ nɩ́ fetsiá ɔká á, fʋmɔkʋ́bwɛ́ lakpan. Nɩ́ obitebíá ɔmɔkʋ́tsía okúlu kɩ ɛ́ otsía a, ɔmɔkʋ́bwɛ́ lakpan. Asʋn wunhɛá ɩbɛ́ba tɛkɩ ndetsu kʋ́sʋ́ akúlu mʋ́a akásʋ́. Mʋ́ sʋ ndɛ ɩ́nɩ blɩ́.
Tsúfɛ́ megyí anɩa anyánkpʋ́sa dɛ́kɔ. Mboún anɩa ɔŋɛ́tɔ́ túmi laláhɛ, atúmipʋ pʋ́ ɔŋɛ laláhɛá bʋbʋ ɔyɩ́ klúnhɛ anfɩtɔ pʋ́ ɔtɩ́nɛgyíɔtɩ́nɛ́ dɛ́kɔ.
Nɩ́ mlɩtɔ ɔkʋ léhián nyánsa á, ɔkʋ́lɩ Bulu. Ɔbɛ́ha mʋ faan. Ɔmɔ́ɔwa mʋ pɛ́lɩtɔ, tsúfɛ́ Bulu tɔpʋ́ awɩtɔlɛ há ahá fɛ́ɛ́ nyánsa.
Mlɩmákiná tɔ́á Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ tekle bwɛ.*

Bɔpʋ tati tin tati-obu ámʋ ɔnɔ́, bɔpʋ ɩkʋlɛ ɛ́ ká mʋ́tɔ́. Bɛtɩ obu gyankpapʋ amʋtɔ bɛɛ, Ɔwankɩ́kpá. Ɔkandɩ́ɛ-oyí ánɩ́ bʋtonywɛ́ nkandɩ́ɛ bian mʋ́sʋ́ pʋ́ ɔpʋ́nʋ́ ánɩ́ bodobodoá bapʋ́há Bulu igyí ɩdɩn mʋ́sʋ́ bʋ ɩnʋ.

Mʋ́ sʋ ndɛtɔɩ́ kplá fʋ́ mbɛ́ɛ, pʋ kɔ́ba bɔhɔ sika pɛpɛá bafwɩ́ mʋ́ ogyátɔ́ mɩ́ wá. Mʋ́ ɔbɛ́ha fénya atɔ́ onutónutó nɩ́. Ntráa ndɛ fʋ́ bláa mbɛ́ɛ, fʋbɔ́hɔ atadɩɛ futútú, afʋpʋtin fʋ́ pɛ́lɩ mʋ́a fʋ́ yayá ámʋ. Bɔhɔ afá da fʋ́ ansíbisʋ, mɛ́nɩ fówun atɔ́.
Mlɩlahɔ Bulu mʋ Bi ámʋ gyi. Mʋ́ sʋ ndɛ ɔwʋlʋ́ ánfɩ wanlɩ́n sɩ́sɩ́ mlɩ, mɛ́nɩ mlɛ́bɩ ánɩ́ mlɩbʋ nkpa ánɩ́ ɩtamatá.
Ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔdɛ mʋ onutó asʋ́n blɩ́ dɛ́ mʋ numnyam dunká. Támɛ nɩ́ ɔkʋ todúnká numnyam há ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔlɔwa mʋ sɩ́sɩ́ á, ɔnɔkwalɩpʋ ɔhá ámʋ gyí. Ɔtamawá afunu.
Támɛ anɩgyí fɛ́ nlɔ́ pwɛhɛ́ ánɩ́ siadɩɛ bʋ mʋ́tɔ́. Siadɩɛ ámʋ gyí wankɩ mʋ́a túmi ánfɩ ɩdɛwankɩ́ anɩ klʋntɔ. Idesuná ánɩ́ túmi kpɔnkpɔɔnkpɔntɩ ánfɩ imotsú anɩ, Bulu wá itsú.

Mɩ́ apíó adwɛpʋ́, mlɩmápʋ lalahɛ ká mlɩ aba ɩkɔ. Mlɩsi tógyítɔ́ ha Bulu. Tsúfɛ́ bɔwanlɩ́n wá Bulu asʋ́n ámʋtɔ bɛɛ, “Bulu ɔbɛ́ɛ, ‘Mɩ́, mlɩ Wíe tɛ́ká ɩkɔ. Mɩ́ ɔbɛ́ka ahá akɔ amʋ́ lakpan sʋ.’ ”
Yesu lɛ́lɛ mʋ́ ɔnɔ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Nɩ́ nɔwá mɩ́ ɩwɩ numnyam a, kpaalɩ ígyi. Mɩ́ Sɩ́ gyí ɔhá ánɩ́ ɔtɔwá mɩ́ numnyam. Mʋ mlɩdɛ́blɩ́ mlɩaa ogyi mlɩ Bulu nɩ́.
Máyintá Bulu gyumagyihɛ fʋ́ atogyihɛ sʋ. Ɔkpa bʋ ɩnʋá abɛ́talɩ́ gyi tógyítɔ́, támɛ nɩ́ ɔkʋ dɛ́ tɔ́á ɩbɛ́ha mʋ ba ɔbɔ́bwɛ lakpan bwɛ mʋ́ á, ɩma alɛ.
Ayin ánfɩ bɔpʋ́ ɔhráda kɩ́klɩ afá ámʋ mántá fúli amʋ ɩwɩ fɛ́ alɩá Yudafɔ bʋtɔbwɛ́ amʋ́ afúli asa bʋtopúlá amʋ́.
Mlɩlósú ha obu adɩpʋ́. Brɛ́á ahá bɔpʋ ɔwʋnlɩ́n swɩ́ɩ́ mlɩ atɔ́ á, mlɩlési há amʋ́ ansigyísʋ́. Tsúfɛ́ mlɩyin ánɩ́ mlɩbʋ atɔ́á ɩbʋ alɛ́ dʋn mʋ́, ibétsiá brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́tɔ́.
“Dawid anfɩ abí-anátɔ́ Bulu labɛlɛ Yesu tsú há Israelfɔ ɔbɛ́ɛ, ɔbwɛ́ɛ amʋ́ Ɔlɛpʋ́ fɛ́ alɩá ɔlɛhɩɛ yáɩ́.
Támɛ fɛ́ alɩá bɔwanlɩ́n wá Bulu asʋ́n ámʋtɔ á, “Tɔ́á ansíbi mɔkʋ́wun kɩ, asʋ mɔ́kʋ́nú kɩ, ɩmɔkʋ́ba nyankpʋsa agywɩɩntɔ ɛ́ kɩ a, mʋ́ Bulu lalá yáɩ́ há mʋ adwɛpʋ́ nɩ́.”
Bulu lɔ́kʋsʋ́a Kristo tsú afúlitɔ lɛ́lɛ́. Mʋ́ sʋ nɩ́ mʋ Ɔŋɛ́ bʋ mlɩtɔ á, mʋ́mʋ́ ɔbɔ́tsʋn Ɔŋɛ́ ámʋsʋ há mlɩ nyankpʋsa-oyí ámʋ́ʋ́ ibówu ámʋ nkpa pɔpwɛ.
Ɔŋɛ́ ámʋ totsúlá há anɩ ánɩ́ lɛ́lɛ́ á, Bulu abí anɩgyí.
Mlɩmámlɛ́ mlɩ ɩwɩ. Ɔhaa tamamlɛ́ Bulu. Ɔhagyíɔha ɔbɔ́kpɔtɩ́ tɔ́á olodu.

Séi á, mlɩlawun ánɩ́ Bulu bʋ awɩtɔlɛ, támɛ mʋ asʋ́n bʋ ɔnlɩn. Ɔbʋ ɔnlɩn ahá ánɩ́ badɩda hógyitɔsʋ. Támɛ alawá awɩtɔlɛ há mlɩ. Ɔbɔ́wa awɩtɔlɛ há mlɩ nɩ́ mlɩ ansɩ́ dɩn mʋsʋ. Nɩ́ megyí alɩ á, ɔbɛ́bɩtɩ́ mlɩ ɩsʋ mlɩ ɛ́.

Apíó aba, mlɩnya klʋn tsia gyo anɩ Wíe Yesu Kristo ɩbá. Mlɩkɩ alɩá ɔdɔtɔpʋ tenyá klʋn tsíá gyo nyankpʋ gyankpapʋ mʋ́a tráhɛ, pʋ́ alɩá otetsíá gyo brɛ́á ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ amʋ ɩbɛ́ha atɔ pɔpwɛ bówie wóyí.
Anɩ Wíe owúun Onesiforo wóyítɔ́ ahá nwɛ, tsúfɛ́ mʋlétsiá wá mɩ́ ansigyí. Omenya mɩ́ obudɩ pɛ́lɩ.
Ɩ́nɩ sʋ mɩ́ abí adwɛpʋ́, mlɩtsia Kristotɔ. Fówun nɩ́ ɔbá á, pɛ́lɩ mɛ́ɛkɩtá anɩ, abɛ́talɩ́ fia mʋ.
Mʋ́ sʋ ndɛ mlɩ bláa mbɛ́ɛ, mlɩha Ɔŋɛ Wankɩ́hɛ́ amʋ ɔkpa mlɩ. Mʋ́mʋ́ mlɩmɔ́ɔbwɛ tɔ́á mlɩ tsiátɔ́ dada tekle.
Asʋ́n ánfɩ ɩbʋ mʋ́tɔ́, ilehián ánɩ́ ɔhagyíɔha ɔbɔ́hɔ mʋ́sʋ́ gyí. Mʋ́gyí, Kristo Yesu lɛ́ba ɔyɩ́tɔ́ bɛlɛ lakpan abwɛpʋ́. Mɩ́gyí amʋ́tɔ́ ɔlaláhɛ nɩ.
Mɩ́ asʋ́n tráhɛ-tráhɛ gyí, apíó, mlɩtsʋn anɩa anɩ Wíenyɔ ɩkʋlɛbwɛsʋ amlɩha mʋ ɔwa mlɩ ɔwʋnlɩ́n tsu mʋ túmi kpɔnkpɔntɩ ámʋtɔ.
Mʋ́ sʋ nɩ́ fʋkɩ fɛɛ fʋlɩɩ́ kínkíínkín Kristo hógyitɔ á, kɩ wankláán, mɛ́nɩ fʋmɛ́ɛdɩda.
Mʋ afɔdɩɛ kʋlɛ pɛ́ ámʋ ɩlahá ahá ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lapʋ́ amʋ́ bwɛ́ mʋ klɛ amʋ bafʋn ha brɛ́ fɛ́ɛ́, ɔlala kʋkʋʋkʋ ɩtráa ma amʋ́ ɩwɩ.
Ɩnʋ á, Yudafɔ ahandɛ amʋ bɛtrá kʋlá abwi bɛɛ abʋtswɩ da Yesu mɔ.
Támɛ ndekléá mlɩnúu mʋ́ asɩ ánɩ́ oyingyíoyin bʋ Kristo asɩ, ɔtsɩgyíɔtsɩ bʋ oyin asɩ, fɛ́ alɩá Kristo ɛ́ bʋ Bulu asɩ.
Bɔbwɛ amʋ́tɔ́ akʋ ahinlá, pɩ́tɩ́ amʋ́ mplɩ. Bɔwa amʋ́ akʋ ɩkan, pʋ́ amʋ́ tswɩ obu.
Anɩ ɔkpakɩ́ɩ anfɩ lakɩ́tá anɩ yáɩ́ fɛ́ alɩá ɔtan tɛkɩ́tá obu lɩ́ɩ́. Anɩ ɔkpakɩ́ɩ anfɩ tɛkpá anɩ, anɩtɔtsʋn tati ámʋ́ʋ́ isian ɔsʋ́sʋ́ Ɔwankɩ́kpátɔ Ɔwankɩ́kpá obu-ɔnɔ́ ámʋtɔ wíé mʋ́tɔ́.
Mlɩmágyi mba. Labi kʋkʋ ɩma mʋ́tɔ́. Mboún mlɩlɛ amʋ́ bwɛhɛ́ ɔwan.

Apíó adwɛpʋ́, mlɩmátrá blɩ́ mlɩ aba ɩwɩ asʋ́n. Mlɩmátrá tsii aba, kpɔ́ɩ́ aba. Ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔlɛlɛ mʋ ba ɩlá ntɛ́ɛ gyi mʋ asʋ́n á, ilosuná ánɩ́ ɔdɛblɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, Bulu mbla ámʋ ɩma alɛ. Ɩ́nɩ désuná ánɩ́ alatsú mʋ ɩwɩ ánɩ́ ɔdʋn mbla ámʋ. Nɩ́ ɔdʋn mbla ámʋ a, mʋ́mʋ́ ɔmɛdɛ́ Bulu mbla ámʋ bu.

Abutó wʋlɩhɛ fútútú wankláán dúanyɔ bɔpʋbwɛ́ aklʋn amʋ. Ɩklʋn amʋ kugyíkʋ igyi butóbi fútútú kʋlɛ. Sika pɛpɛá tɔtɔ mɛfráa mʋ́, igyi fɛ́ gláasɩ bɔpʋwá abrɔnʋ wúlu amʋtɔ. Fɛ́talɩ́ kɩ tsʋn mʋ́tɔ́.
Támɛ Kristo lɔ́bwɛ obí ɔnɔkwalɩpʋá ɔdɛ Bulu wóyísʋ́ kɩ́ɩ. Bulu wóyítɔ́ abí anɩgyí, nɩ́ anɩlɔ́wa klʋn kɩ́tá mʋ ɔkpakɩ́tɔ kínkíínkín yɔ́fʋn mʋ́ ɔnɔ́mɔkɛ́.
Mlɩdwɛ ahá tsu mlɩ klʋntɔ. Mlɩkisi lalahɛ kugyíkʋ. Mlɩkɩta yilébwɛtɔ kínkíínkín.

Ɔsʋlʋ́ʋ lɛ́kpɩnkɩ́ kpukpukpukpu alɩ brɛ́ ámʋtɔ kɛ́n. Nɩ́ beye wúlu amʋtɔ idú á, iku kʋlɛ fɛ́ɛ́ lobwie bun ɔsʋlʋ́tɔ gbloo. Ahá mpɩ́m-sienɔ́ (7,000) bowu ɔsʋlʋ́kpɩnkɩ́ ámʋtɔ. Ifú lɛhɩɛ kɩtá atráhɛ amʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ bɔwa ɔsʋ́sʋ́ Bulu numnyam.
Nsɩnɛ́ ɔlapʋ́ tamalɩ́ɩ́ há ɔbakʋ́lɛ, támɛ ɔbakʋ́lɛ Bulu gyí.
Mʋ́ sʋ Pilato lɛ́fɩtɛ́ mʋ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Fʋmɛ́ɛkplá mɩ́? Fʋmeyín ánɩ́ mbʋ túmiá nɛ́talɩ́ sí fʋ́ ntɛ́ɛ nɛ́talɩ́ há bɛda fʋ́ mántá oyikpalíhɛsʋ mɔ́ fʋ́?”
Bulu asʋ́n ánɩ́ ɔdɛkláa ɔwʋlʋ́ ámʋtɔ gyí: “Ɔlɔbwɛ díín fɛ́ kufa ánɩ́ bapʋ́ bɛya ɔmɔkpá. Ɔmobwií mʋ nnonyɔ. Ɔlɔbwɛ díín fɛ́ alɩá kufa tɔbwɛ́ nɩ́ bʋdɛ mʋ ɩwɩ imi dɩnkɩ́.
Brɛ́á bɛbláa Bulu bɛɛ ɔyáɩ awíe ha amʋ́ á, Bulu lɛ́yaɩ́ Kis mʋ bi Saulo owíe há amʋ́. Saulo otsú Benyamin abusuantɔ. Olegyi iwíe nfí adʋana (40).
Tɔ́á sʋá ndɛ ɩ́nɩ blɩ́ gyí, ahá tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ bakʋ́sʋ́ lɩ́ɩ́ atosunáhɛ́ wankláán ámʋsʋ, bʋdɛ asʋ́n ánɩ́ ɩma labi pʋmlɛ́ ahá. Títriu ketétɩ́ɩn mblasʋ agyípʋ́ amʋ dɛ́ ɩ́nɩ bwɛ nɩ́.
Ɔyɩ́tɔ́ mbwɩ ɔtsan-ɔtsan, mbwɩá bʋbʋ ayín, támɛ bʋtɛká abɔnɔ pʋ́ ɔyɩ́tɔ́ mbubwi fɛ́ɛ́ bʋbʋ ɔhráda ámʋtɔ.
Nawá ahá ánfɩ numnyam amʋ́ʋ́ fɔwa mɩ́ ámʋ, mɛ́nɩ bɔ́bwɛ kʋlɛ fɛ́ alɩá ntsu tamatsʋn mɩ́á fʋnyɔ nsɩnɛ́.
Kɩta ɔnɔkwalɩ asʋ́n ámʋ́ʋ́ nosuná fʋ́ ámʋtɔ. Yɔ mʋ́sʋ́ afʋhɔ Kristo gyi tsɩa. Dwɛ fʋ́ aba, tsúfɛ́ fʋ́a Kristo Yesunyɔ mlɩlabwɛ́ kʋlɛ.
Yudafɔ bʋtɔfwɩ́ ɩwɩ amʋ́ amándɩ́ɛ́ ɔkpasʋ. Mʋ́ sʋ bɔpʋ awʋndɩ akpɔnkpɔɔnkpɔntɩ asie yáɩ́ wóyí ámʋtɔ.
Mlɩlabwɛ agywɩɩn wankláán, amlɩsi lakpan bwɛ. Tsúfɛ́ mlɩtɔ akʋ bʋtépí bʋmeyín Bulu. Ndɛ asʋ́n ánfɩ wanlɩ́n sɩ́sɩ́ mlɩ pʋ́sʋ́pa mlɩ.
Mlɩba ɩwɩasɩ, amlɩlwii. Mlɩnya klʋn ha aba, amlɩdwɛ aba.
Mlɩprɩ akʋ lɛ ogyá ámʋtɔ, pʋhɔ amʋ́ nkpa. Mlɩwun akʋ nwɛ ifúsʋ́. Mlɩkɩ wankláán ánɩ́ amʋ́ lalahɛ amʋ ɩmɛ́ɛtsankɩ́ mlɩ.
Anɩyin ánɩ́ Bulu tɛhá tógyítɔ́ tɔwá alɛ́ há mʋ adwɛpʋ́. Amʋ́gyí ahá ánɩ́ mʋ onutó ɔlɛtɩ mʋ nhɩhɩɛ́ ɔnɔ́ nɩ́.

Támɛ mlɩ mʋ́ á, ɔhagyíɔha lanú alɩá mlɩlapʋ́ mlɩ ɩwɩ há Kristo. Mʋ́ sʋ ɩbʋ mɩ ɔdwɛ, ansɩ́ dɛ mɩ́ gyi wankláán mlɩ sʋ. Támɛ ndekléá mlɩtɩ́ɩn ansɩ́, amlɩbɩ tɔ́á ɩbʋ alɛ́. Mlɩmáwa ɩbɩ lalahɛtɔ.

Sika pɛpɛ afɔdɩɛ-asubwi bʋ ɩnʋ. Bulu Ntam-dáka ánɩ́ bɔpʋ sika pɛpɛ píatá mʋ́ ɩwɩ fɛ́ɛ́ ɛ́ itsie ɩnʋ. Bʋtɔwá ɔhɩ́ɛ́n ogyá afɔdɩɛ-asubwi ámʋsʋ. Atoku asa bʋ́ʋ Bulu Ntam-dáka ámʋtɔ. Mʋ́gyí, sika pɛpɛ ɔlankabi ánɩ́ atogyihɛ kʋá bɛtɩ mʋ́ mana bʋ mʋ́tɔ́, Aaron oyi yiáhɛ́ amʋ́ʋ́ ɩlɔpɔɩ́ ámʋ pʋ́ abwi pɛ́tɛ́plɛ́ anyɔ ámʋ́ʋ́ Bulu lɔ́wanlɩ́n mʋ mbla dɩ́nká mʋ́sʋ́ ámʋ ɛ́ bʋ mʋ́tɔ́.
Séi mɛ́, tɔkʋ bʋ ɩnʋá abótsu ɩwɩ mʋ́sʋ́? Tɔtɔ má ɩnʋ. Ntogyi sʋ́ anɩmɛ́ɛtalɩ́ tsú ɩwɩ? Mose Mbla ámʋ sʋ lóó? Ó-o! Anɩ hógyi sʋ anɩmɛ́ɛtalɩ́ tsú ɩwɩ.
Fʋmohogyi ánɩ́ mbʋ mɩ́ Sɩ́ ámʋtɔ, mʋ ɛ́ ɔbʋ mɩtɔ? Asʋ́n ánfɩ ndɛ mlɩ bláa anfɩ motsú mɩ́ onutó wá. Mboún mɩ́ Sɩ́ ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔbʋ mɩtɔ ámʋ dɛ́ mʋ agyʋ́má yɔ.
Ɩnʋ ɔdɔm amʋ botu bun Paulo mʋa Silasʋ. Asʋ́n agyípʋ́ amʋ bɛha bɛɛ bʋwɔ́ɩ amʋ́ atadɩɛ, abʋnwɛn amʋ́ mplɩ.
Mbla pɔpwɛ ndɛwa há mlɩ mbɛ́ɛ, mlɩdwɛ aba. Alɩ ámʋ́ʋ́ nɔdwɛ mlɩ ámʋ a, alɩ kɛ́n mlɩpʋ́ ɔdwɛ ámʋ dwɛ mlɩ aba nɩ́.
Anɩ ɔyʋlʋ́ʋ anfɩ igyi fɛ́ kantankpa ánɩ́ anɩtsie mʋ́tɔ́. Nɩ́ bobwíé mʋ́ á, Bulu ɔbɛ́ha anɩ obu bámbá ɔsʋ́sʋ́. Mʋ́mʋ́ á, megyí nyankpʋsa léyi mʋ́. Mʋ onutó léyi mʋ́, imóobwie ɛkɛkɛɛkɛ.
Yesu lɔ́kplʋn blɩ́ ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Megyí mɩ́ nkʋlɛ ɔhagyíɔha ánɩ́ ɔlɔhɔ mɩ gyi déhógyi. Ɔhá ámʋ́ʋ́ ɔlɔwa mɩ́ sɩ́sɩ́ ámʋ ɛ́.
Mʋ́ʋ́ Anania lɛ́bláa anɩ Wíe ɔbɛ́ɛ, “Mɩ́ Wíé, nanú oyin ánfɩ ɩwɩ asʋ́n. Alɩá ɔdɛpʋ lalahɛ gyi fʋ́ ahá ánɩ́ bʋbʋ Yerusalem.
Tsúfɛ́ ahá bɔ́bwɛ awʋnsɩ́pʋ́, bɔ́bwɛ kɔ́ba adwɛpʋ́. Bɔ́hɔ amʋ́ ɩwɩsʋ gyi, bótsu ɩwɩ, bésia ahá, bʋmóonu amʋ́ akwɩɩ́pʋ́ asʋ́n, bʋméeyi ahá ayɛ, amʋ́ ɩwɩ mɛ́ɛtɩn,
Ɩna Yesu Kristo obugya amʋ́ʋ́ ɩlɔwʋlɩ́ asɩ ámʋsʋ Bulu lési anɩ lakpan kíé anɩ, tsú anɩ ánɩ́ anɩ asʋ́n da ɔkpa. Kristo sʋ ɔbɛ́lɛ anɩ kokooko. Ɔmɛ́ɛbɩtɩ́ anɩ ɩsʋ lakpan abwɛpʋ́ ɩsʋ-ɔbɩtɩ́kɛ́ amʋ.
Séi ɩ́nɩá namlí Okristoyin sʋ nabɩ́ ánɩ́ atogyihɛ kʋkʋ má ɩnʋá mʋ ɩwɩ mɛtɩn. Támɛ nɩ́ Kristoyin ɔkʋ lóhógyi ánɩ́ tɔkʋ ɩwɩ mɛtɩn a, mʋ́mʋ́ mʋ wá mʋ́ ɩwɩ mɛtɩn.
Nɩ́ fɔpʋ́ asʋ́n ánfɩ tswɩ apíó ámʋ ansɩ́tɔ́ á, fɔ́bwɛ Kristo Yesu osúmbi wankláán ánɩ́ bapʋ́ hógyi amʋtɔ asʋ́n, pʋ́ atosunáhɛ́ wankláán ámʋ bʋ́lá fʋ́, fʋdɛ mʋ́tɔ́.
